atk-s0514a1:399_3: paññāvuddhippatte paṇḍite. Nipuṇeti sukhumakāraṇajānanasamatthe. Evaṃkaroti yo puggalo
atk-s0514a1:399_4: evaṃ vuttappakāre puggale sevati bhajati payirupāsati, pāḷiṃ uggaṇhāti, punappunaṃ
atk-s0514a1:399_5: atthaṃ pucchati, pāsāṇe lekhaṃ khaṇanto viya kañcananāḷiyā sīhavasaṃ sampaṭicchanto
atk-s0514a1:399_6: viya ohitasoto sakkaccaṃ subhāsitāni suṇāti, ayaṃ evaṃkaro macco paññavā hotīti.
atk-s0514a1:400_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto pācīnalokadhātuto sūriyaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya paññāya paṭipadaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0514a1:400_1: idāni tassā paññāya guṇaṃ kathento “sa paññavā”tiādimāha. Tattha kāmaguṇeti kāmakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0514a1:400_2: hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccato, diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena
atk-s0514a1:400_3: dukkhato, aṭṭhanavutiyā rogamukhānaṃ kāme nissāya uppattisambhavena rogato ca avekkhati
atk-s0514a1:400_4: oloketi, so evaṃ vipassī etehi kāraṇehi kāmānaṃ aniccāditaṃ passanto “kāme nissāya
atk-s0514a1:400_5: uppajjanakadukkhānaṃ anto natthi, kāmānaṃ pahānameva sukha”nti viditvā dukkhesu kāmesu
atk-s0514a1:400_6: mahabbhayesu chandaṃ pajahāti. Sa vītarāgoti, “sakka, so puggalo evaṃ vītarāgo navāghātavatthuvasena
atk-s0514a1:400_7: uppajjanakasabhāvadosaṃ vinetvā mettacittaṃ bhāveyya, appamāṇasattārammaṇattā appamāṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:400_8: taṃ bhāvetvā aparihīnajjhāno agarahito brahmaloke uppajjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:401: Evaṃ mahāsatte kāmānaṃ dosaṃ kathenteyeva tesaṃ tiṇṇampi rājūnaṃ sabalakāyānaṃ tadaṅgappahānena pañcakāmaguṇarāgo pahīno. Taṃ ñatvā mahāsatto tesaṃ pahaṃsanavasena gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:404: Kāliṅgarājassa ca uggatassa, sabbesa vo kāmarāgo pahīno”ti.
atk-s0514a1:405: Tattha mahatthiyanti mahatthaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ mahājutikaṃ. Tavamaṭṭhakāti tava aṭṭhakā. Pahīnoti tadaṅgappahānena pahīno.
atk-s0514a1:406: Taṃ sutvā rājāno mahāsattassa thutiṃ karontā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a1:409: Karohi okāsamanuggahāya, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavemā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:410: Tattha anuggahāyāti pabbajjatthāya okāsaṃ no karohi. Yathā mayaṃ pabbajitvā tava gatiṃ nipphattiṃ abhisambhavema pāpuṇeyyāma, tayā paṭividdhaguṇaṃ paṭivijjheyyāmāti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:411: Atha nesaṃ okāsaṃ karonto mahāsatto itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:413: “Karomi okāsamanuggahāya, tathā hi vo kāmarāgo pahīno;
atk-s0514a1:414: Pharātha kāyaṃ vipulāya pītiyā, yathā gatiṃ me abhisambhavethā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:415: Tattha pharātha kāyanti jhānapītiyā vipulāya kāyaṃ pharathāti.
atk-s0514a1:418: “Sabbaṃ karissāma tavānusāsaniṃ, yaṃ yaṃ tuvaṃ vakkhasi bhūripañña;
atk-s0514a1:419: Pharāma kāyaṃ vipulāya pītiyā, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavemā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:420: Atha nesaṃ sabalakāyānaṃ mahāsatto pabbajjaṃ dāpetvā isigaṇaṃ uyyojento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:422: “Katāya vacchassa kisassa pūjā, gacchantu bhonto isayo sādhurūpā;
atk-s0514a1:423: Jhāne ratā hotha sadā samāhitā, esā ratī pabbajitassa seṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:424: Tattha gacchantūti attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni gacchantu.
atk-s0514a1:425_0: Isayo tassa sarabhaṅgasatthuno vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā vanditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā
atk-s0514a1:425_1: sakāni vasanaṭṭhānāni gamiṃsu. Sakkopi uṭṭhāyāsanā mahāsattassa thutiṃ katvā añjaliṃ
atk-s0514a1:425_2: paggayha sūriyaṃ namassanto viya mahāsattaṃ namassamāno sapariso pakkāmi. Etamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:428: Te vedajātā anumodamānā, pakkāmu devā devapuraṃ yasassino.
atk-s0514a1:430: “Gāthā imā atthavatī subyañjanā, subhāsitā isinā paṇḍitena;
atk-s0514a1:431: Yo kocimā aṭṭhikatvā suṇeyya, labhetha pubbāpariyaṃ visesaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:432: Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṃ visesaṃ, adassanaṃ maccurājassa gacche”ti.
atk-s0514a1:433_0: Tattha paramatthasaṃhitāti aniccādidīpanena nibbānanissitā. Gāthā imāti idaṃ satthā
atk-s0514a1:433_1: sarabhaṅgasatthuno nibbānadāyakaṃ subhāsitaṃ vaṇṇento āha. Tattha atthavatīti nibbānadāyakaṭṭhena
atk-s0514a1:433_2: paramatthanissitā. Subyañjanāti parisuddhabyañjanā. Subhāsitāti sukathitā. Aṭṭhikatvāti
atk-s0514a1:433_3: attano atthikabhāvaṃ katvā atthiko hutvā sakkaccaṃ suṇeyya. Pubbāpariyanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:433_4: pubbaviseso, dutiyajjhānaṃ aparaviseso. Dutiyajjhānaṃ pubbaviseso, tatiyajjhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:433_5: aparavisesoti evaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticatumaggavasena pubbāparabhāvena ṭhitaṃ visesaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:433_6: Adassananti pariyosāne aparavisesaṃ arahattaṃ labhitvā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇeyya. Nibbānappatto
atk-s0514a1:433_7: hi puggalo maccurājassa adassanaṃ gato nāma hotīti.
atk-s0514a1:434: Evaṃ satthā arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi moggallānassa āḷāhane pupphavassaṃ vassī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānento āha –
atk-s0514a1:437: Pabbato anuruddho ca, kaccāyano ca devalo;
atk-s0514a1:445_0: Athabravīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:445_1: Vatthu indriyajātake vitthāritameva. Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:445_2: bhikkhu, ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī”ti
atk-s0514a1:445_3: vatvā “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti vutte “bhikkhu esā itthī tuyhaṃ anatthakārikā, tvaṃ etaṃ
atk-s0514a1:445_4: nissāya jhānaṃ nāsetvā tīṇi saṃvaccharāni mūḷho visaññī nipajjitvā uppannāya saññāya
atk-s0514a1:446_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0514a1:446_1: vayappatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane vanamūlaphalāhāro
atk-s0514a1:446_2: yāpesi. Athekā migī tassa passāvaṭṭhāne sambhavamissakaṃ tiṇaṃ khāditvā udakaṃ pivi.
atk-s0514a1:446_3: Ettakeneva ca tasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā tato paṭṭhāya katthaci
atk-s0514a1:446_4: agantvā tattheva tiṇaṃ khāditvā assamassa sāmanteyeva vicarati. Mahāsatto pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0514a1:446_5: taṃ kāraṇaṃ aññāsi. Sā aparabhāge manussadārakaṃ vijāyi. Mahāsatto taṃ puttasinehena
atk-s0514a1:446_6: paṭijaggi, “isisiṅgo”tissa nāmaṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ mahāsatto viññutappattaṃ pabbājetvā
atk-s0514a1:446_7: attano mahallakakāle taṃ ādāya nārivanaṃ nāma gantvā, “tāta, imasmiṃ himavante imehi
atk-s0514a1:446_8: pupphehi sadisā itthiyo nāma honti, tā attano vasaṃ gate mahāvināsaṃ pāpenti, na
atk-s0514a1:446_9: tāsaṃ vasaṃ nāma gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovaditvā aparabhāge brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:447_0: Isisiṅgopi jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavantappadese vāsaṃ kappesi. Ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo
atk-s0514a1:447_1: ahosi. Athassa sīlatejena sakkassa bhavanaṃ kampi, sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0514a1:447_2: “ayaṃ maṃ sakkattā cāveyya, ekaṃ accharaṃ pesetvā sīlamassa bhindāpessāmī”ti sakaladevalokaṃ
atk-s0514a1:447_3: upaparikkhanto attano aḍḍhateyyakoṭisaṅkhānaṃ paricārikānaṃ majjhe ekaṃ alambusaṃ
atk-s0514a1:447_4: nāma accharaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ tassa sīlaṃ bhindituṃ samatthaṃ adisvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:447_5: tassa sīlabhedaṃ kātuṃ āṇāpesi. Tamatthaṃ āvikaronto satthā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:451_0: Tattha brahāti mahā. Vatrabhūti vatrassa nāma asurassa abhibhavitā. Jayataṃ pitāti
atk-s0514a1:451_1: jayantānaṃ jayappattānaṃ sesānaṃ tettiṃsāya devaputtānaṃ pitukiccasādhanena pitā.
atk-s0514a1:451_2: Parābhetvāti hadayaṃ bhinditvā olokento viya taṃ “paṭibalā aya”nti ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:452: Paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisinno taṃ alambusaṃ pakkosāpetvā idamāha –
atk-s0514a1:456_0: Tattha misseti taṃ ālapati, idañca tassā nāmaṃ, sabbā panitthiyo purise kilesamissanena
atk-s0514a1:456_1: missanato “missā”ti vuccanti, tena sādhāraṇena guṇanāmenālapanto evamāha. Isippalobhaneti
atk-s0514a1:456_2: isīnaṃ palobhanasamatthe. Isisiṅganti tassa kira matthake migasiṅgākārena dve cūḷā
atk-s0514a1:457: Iti sakko “gaccha isisiṅgaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano vasaṃ ānetvā sīlamassa bhindā”ti alambusaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:460: Nibbānābhirato vuddho, tassa maggāni āvarā”ti. – vacanaṃ āha;
atk-s0514a1:461_0: Tattha purāyanti ayaṃ tāpaso vattasampanno ca brahmacariyavā ca, so panesa dīghāyukatāya
atk-s0514a1:461_1: nibbānasaṅkhāte magge abhirato guṇavuddhiyā ca vuddho. Tasmā yāva esa amhe nātikkamati,
atk-s0514a1:461_2: na abhibhavitvā imamhā ṭhānā cāveti, tāvadeva tvaṃ gantvā tassa devalokagamanāni
atk-s0514a1:461_3: maggāni āvara, yathā idha nāgacchati, evaṃ karohīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:468: Tāsampi hotu pariyāyo, tāpi yantu palobhanā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:469_0: Tattha kimeva tvanti kiṃ nāmetaṃ tvaṃ karosīti dīpeti. Mameva tuvaṃ sikkhasīti imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:469_1: sakaladevaloke mameva tuvaṃ ikkhasi, aññaṃ na passasīti adhippāyena vadati. Sa-kāro
atk-s0514a1:469_2: panettha byañjanasandhikaro. Isippalobhane gacchāti kiṃkāraṇā maññeva evaṃ vadesīti
atk-s0514a1:469_3: adhippāyo. Pavarā cevāti mayā uttaritarā ceva. Asoketi sokarahite. Nandaneti nandijanake.
atk-s0514a1:472: “Addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, santi aññāpi accharā;
atk-s0514a1:473: Tādisiyo pavarā ceva, asoke nandane vane.
atk-s0514a1:475: “Na tā evaṃ pajānanti, pāricariyaṃ pumaṃ gatā;
atk-s0514a1:480_0: Tattha pumaṃ gatāti purisaṃ upasaṅkamantā samānā purisapalobhinipāricariyaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0514a1:480_1: Vaṇṇarūpenāti sarīravaṇṇena ceva rūpasampattiyā ca. Savasamānayissasīti taṃ tāpasaṃ
atk-s0514a1:481: Taṃ sutvā alambusā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:484: Vibhemi cetaṃ āsāduṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0514a1:488_0: Tattha na vāhanti na ve ahaṃ. Vibhemīti bhāyāmi. Āsādunti āsādituṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0514a1:488_1: – nāhaṃ, deva, tayā pesitā na gamissāmi, apicāhaṃ taṃ isiṃ sīlabhedanatthāya allīyituṃ
atk-s0514a1:488_2: bhāyāmi, uggatejo hi soti. Āsādiyāti āsādetvā. Mohasaṃsāranti mohena saṃsāraṃ, mohena
atk-s0514a1:488_3: isiṃ palobhetvā saṃsāraṃ āpannā vaṭṭadukkhe patiṭṭhitā sattā gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā.
atk-s0514a1:488_4: Tasmāti tena kāraṇena. Lomāni haṃsayeti ahaṃ lomāni uṭṭhapemi, “tassa kirāhaṃ sīlaṃ
atk-s0514a1:488_5: bhindissāmī”ti cintayamānāya me lomāni pahaṃsantīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:497: Aggiṭṭhaṃ parimajjantaṃ, isisiṅgaṃ upāgamī”ti. – imā abhisambuddhagāthā;
atk-s0514a1:498_0: Tattha pakkāmīti tena hi, devarāja, āvajjeyyāsi manti attano sayanagabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a1:498_1: alaṅkaritvā isisiṅgaṃ kilesena missituṃ icchantī pakkāmi, bhikkhave, sā accharā tassa
atk-s0514a1:498_2: assamaṃ gatāti. Bimbijālakasañchannanti rattaṅkuravanena sañchannaṃ. Pātova pātarāsamhīti,
atk-s0514a1:498_3: bhikkhave, pātarāsavelāya pātova pageyeva atipageva. Udaṇhasamayaṃ patīti sūriyuggamanavelāyameva.
atk-s0514a1:498_4: Aggiṭṭhanti aggisālaṃ. Rattiṃ padhānamanuyuñjitvā pātova nhatvā udakakiccaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:498_5: paṇṇasālāyaṃ thokaṃ jhānasukhena vītināmetvā nikkhamitvā aggisālaṃ sammajjantaṃ taṃ
atk-s0514a1:498_6: isisiṅgaṃ sā upāgami, itthivilāsaṃ dassentī tassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:508: Gamanā kāmanīyā te, harantiyeva me mano.
atk-s0514a1:511: Vimaṭṭhā tuyhaṃ sussoṇī, akkhassa phalakaṃ yathā.
atk-s0514a1:526: Āyatā ca visālā ca, nettā tava sudassanā.
atk-s0514a1:535: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:536_0: Tattha vicittahatthābharaṇāti vicittehi hatthābharaṇehi samannāgatā. Hemacandanagandhinīti
atk-s0514a1:536_2: Vilaggāti saṃkhittamajjhā. Mudukāti mudu sukhumālā. Suddhāti nimmalā. Suppatiṭṭhitāti
atk-s0514a1:536_3: samaṃ pathaviṃ phusantā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. Gamanāti gacchamānā. Kāmanīyāti kantā
atk-s0514a1:536_4: kāmitabbayuttakā. Harantiyeva me manoti ete evarūpena paramena itthivilāsena caṅkamantiyā
atk-s0514a1:536_5: tava pādā mama cittaṃ harantiyeva. Vimaṭṭhāti visālā. Sussoṇīti sundarasoṇī. Akkhassāti
atk-s0514a1:536_6: sundaravaṇṇassa akkhassa suvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya visālā te soṇīti vadati. Uppalasseva
atk-s0514a1:536_7: kiñjakkhāti nīluppalakaṇṇikā viya. Kaṇhañjanassevāti sukhumakaṇhalomacittattā evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:537_0: “Duvidhā”tigāthaṃ thane vaṇṇayanto āha. Te hi dve hutvā ure jātā vaṇṭassa abhāvā
atk-s0514a1:537_1: avaṇṭā, ure laggā eva hutvā suṭṭhu nikkhantattā sādhupaccudā, payassa dhāraṇato payodharā,
atk-s0514a1:537_2: apatitāti na patitā, amilātatāya vā alambanatāya vā na anto paviṭṭhāti apatitā, suvaṇṇaphalake
atk-s0514a1:537_3: ṭhapitasuvaṇṇamayavaṭṭaalābuno aḍḍhena sadisatāya aḍḍhalābusamā thanā. Eṇeyyakā yathāti
atk-s0514a1:537_4: eṇīmigassa hi dīghā ca vaṭṭā ca gīvā sobhati yathā, evaṃ tava gīvā thokaṃ dīghā.
atk-s0514a1:537_5: Kambutalābhāsāti suvaṇṇāliṅgatalasannibhā gīvāti attho. Paṇḍarāvaraṇāti dantāvaraṇā.
atk-s0514a1:537_6: Catutthamanasannibhāti catutthamano vuccati catutthamanavatthubhūtā jivhā. Abhirattabhāvena
atk-s0514a1:537_7: jivhāsadisaṃ te oṭṭhapariyosānanti vadati. Uddhaggāti heṭṭhimadantā. Adhaggāti uparimadantā.
atk-s0514a1:537_8: Dumaggaparimajjitāti dantakaṭṭhaparimajjitā parisuddhā. Duvijāti dvijā. Nelasambhūtāti
atk-s0514a1:538_0: Apaṇḍarāti kaṇhā. Lohitantāti rattapariyantā. Jiñjūkaphalasannibhāti rattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a1:538_1: jiñjukaphalasadisā. Sudassanāti passantānaṃ atittikarā pañcapasādasamannāgatā. Nātidīghāti
atk-s0514a1:538_2: pamāṇayuttā. Susammaṭṭhāti suṭṭhu sammaṭṭhā. Kanakabyāsamocitāti kanakabyā vuccati
atk-s0514a1:538_3: suvaṇṇaphaṇikā, tāya gandhatelaṃ ādāya paharitā suracitā. Kasigorakkhāti iminā kasiñca
atk-s0514a1:538_4: gorakkhañca nissāya jīvanakasatte dasseti. Yā gatīti yattakā nipphatti. Parakkantanti
atk-s0514a1:538_5: yattakaṃ isīnaṃ parakkantaṃ, vitthārīkatā imasmiṃ himavante yattakā isayo vasantīti
atk-s0514a1:538_6: attho. Na te samasamanti tesu sabbesu ekampi rūpalīḷāvilāsādisamatāya tayā samānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:538_7: na passāmi. Ko vā tvanti idaṃ tassā itthibhāvaṃ jānanto purisavohāravasena pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:539: Evaṃ pādato paṭṭhāya yāva kesā attano vaṇṇaṃ bhāsante tāpase alambusā tuṇhī hutvā tassā kathāya yathānusandhiṃ gatāya tassa sammūḷhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:543: Ehi taṃ upagūhissaṃ, ratīnaṃ kusalo bhavā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:544: Tattha kassapevaṃ gate satīti kassapagotta evaṃ tava citte pavatte sati pañhakālo na hoti. Sammāti vayassa, piyavacanālapanametaṃ. Ratīnanti pañcakāmaguṇaratīnaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:545_0: Evaṃ vatvā alambusā cintesi – “nāyaṃ mayi ṭhitāya hatthapāsaṃ āgamissati, gacchantī
atk-s0514a1:545_1: viya bhavissāmī”ti. Sā itthimāyākusalatāya tāpasaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā āgatamaggābhimukhī
atk-s0514a1:549: Atha naṃ tāpaso gacchantiṃ disvā “ayaṃ gacchatī”ti attano dandhaparakkamaṃ mandagamanaṃ chinditvā vegena dhāvitvā kesesu hatthena parāmasi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:555: Cavitamhi brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositā.
atk-s0514a1:572: “Na juhe na jape mante, aggihuttaṃ pahāpitaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:573: Ko nu me pāricariyāya, pubbe cittaṃ palobhayi.
atk-s0514a1:575: “Araññe me viharato, yo me tejā ha sambhutaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:577_0: Tattha ajjhappattoti sampatto. Tamudāvatta kalyāṇīti taṃ kese parāmasitvā ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:577_1: isiṃ udāvattitvā nivattitvā kalyāṇadassanā sā suṭṭhu sobhanā. Palissajīti āliṅgi.
atk-s0514a1:577_2: Cavitamhi brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositāti, bhikkhave, tassa isino tāvadeva
atk-s0514a1:577_3: jhānaṃ antaradhāyi. Tasmiṃ tamhā jhānā brahmacariyā cavite yathā taṃ sakkena patthitaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:577_4: tatheva ahosi. Atha sakkassa patthanāya samiddhabhāvaṃ viditvā sā devakaññā tositā,
atk-s0514a1:578_0: Manasā agamāti sā taṃ āliṅgitvā ṭhitā “aho vata sakko pallaṅkaṃ me peseyyā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0514a1:578_1: pavattena manasā indaṃ agamā. Nandane vaneti nandijananasamatthatāya nandanavanasaṅkhāte
atk-s0514a1:578_2: tāvatiṃsabhavane vasantaṃ. Devakuñjaroti devaseṭṭho. Pahiṇīti pesesi. “Pāhiṇī”tipi
atk-s0514a1:578_3: pāṭho. Sopavāhananti saparivāraṃ. Sauttaracchadapaññāsanti paññāsāya uttaracchadehi
atk-s0514a1:578_5: taṃ isisiṅgaṃ tattha dibbapallaṅke nisinnā sā ure katvā dhāresi. Tīṇi vassānīti ekamuhuttaṃ
atk-s0514a1:578_6: viya manussagaṇanāya tīṇi vassāni taṃ ure nipajjāpetvā tattha nisinnā dhāresi.
atk-s0514a1:579_0: Vimadoti nimmado vigatasaññabhāvo. So hi tīṇi saṃvaccharāni visañño sayitvā pacchā
atk-s0514a1:579_1: paṭiladdhasañño pabujjhi. Tasmiṃ pabujjhamāne hatthādiphandanaṃ disvāva alambusā
atk-s0514a1:579_2: tassa pabujjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pallaṅkaṃ antaradhāpetvā sayampi antarahitā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:579_3: Addasāsīti so assamapadaṃ olokento “kena nu khomhi sīlavināsaṃ pāpito”ti cintetvā
atk-s0514a1:579_4: mahantena saddena paridevamāno addasāsi. Haritarukkheti aggiyāyanasaṅkhātaṃ aggisālaṃ
atk-s0514a1:579_5: samantā parivāretvā ṭhite haritapattarukkhe. Navapattavananti taruṇehi navapattehi
atk-s0514a1:580_0: Na juhe na jape manteti ayamassa paridevanagāthā. Pahāpitanti hāpitaṃ, pa-kāro upasaggamattaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:580_1: Pāricariyāyāti ko nu kilesapāricariyāya ito pubbe mama cittaṃ palobhayīti paridevati.
atk-s0514a1:580_2: Yo me tejā ha sambhutanti ha-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Yo mama samaṇatejena sambhūtaṃ jhānaguṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:580_3: nānāratanaparipuṇṇaṃ mahantaṃ mahaṇṇave nāvaṃ viya gaṇhi, vināsaṃ pāpesi, ko nāmesoti paridevatīti.
atk-s0514a1:581: Taṃ sutvā alambusā cintesi – “sacāhaṃ na kathessāmi, ayaṃ me abhisapissati, handassa kathessāmī”ti. Sā dissamānena kāyena ṭhatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:584: Avadhiṃ cittaṃ cittena, pamādo tvaṃ na bujjhasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:585: So tassā kathaṃ sutvā pitarā dinnaovādaṃ saritvā “pitu vacanaṃ akatvā mahāvināsaṃ pattomhī”ti paridevanto catasso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:591: Iccānusāsi maṃ tāto, yathā maṃ anukampako.
atk-s0514a1:597: Puna vā tādiso hessaṃ, maraṇaṃ me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:598_0: Tattha imānīti imāni vacanāni. Kamalāsadisitthiyoti kamalā vuccati nāripupphalatā,
atk-s0514a1:598_1: tāsaṃ pupphasadisā itthiyo. Tāyo bujjhesi māṇavāti māṇava tvaṃ tāyo jāneyyāsi, ñatvā
atk-s0514a1:598_2: dassanapathaṃ agantvā palāpeyyāsīti yāni evarūpāni vacanāni tadā maṃ tāto anusāsati,
atk-s0514a1:598_3: imāni kira tānīti. Uregaṇḍāyoti uramhi dvīhi gaṇḍehi samannāgatā. Tāyo bujjhesi,
atk-s0514a1:598_4: māṇavāti, māṇava, tāyo attano vasaṃ gate vināsaṃ pāpentīti tvaṃ jāneyyāsi. Nākanti
atk-s0514a1:598_5: nākariṃ. Jhāyāmīti pajjhāyāmi paridevāmi. Dhiratthu jīvitena meti dhiratthu garahitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:598_6: mama jīvitaṃ, jīvitena me ko attho. Puna vāti tathā karissāmi, yathā puna vā tādiso
atk-s0514a1:598_7: bhavissāmi, naṭṭhaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā vītarāgo bhavissāmi, maraṇaṃ vā me bhavissatīti.
atk-s0514a1:599: So kāmarāgaṃ pahāya puna jhānaṃ uppādesi. Athassa samaṇatejaṃ disvā jhānassa ca uppāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā alambusā bhītā khamāpesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:604: “Mā me kujjha mahāvīra, mā me kujjha mahāise;
atk-s0514a1:605: Mahā attho mayā ciṇṇo, tidasānaṃ yasassinaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:606: Tayā pakampitaṃ āsi, sabbaṃ devapuraṃ tadā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:607: Atha naṃ so “khamāmi te, bhadde, yathāsukhaṃ gacchā”ti vissajjento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:610: Tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, gaccha kaññe yathāsukha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:611: Sā taṃ vanditvā teneva suvaṇṇapallaṅkena devapuraṃ gatā. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā tisso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:613: “Tassa pāde gahetvāna, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:621: Patīto sumano vitto, devindo adadā vara”nti.
atk-s0514a1:622: Tattha okkamivāti dīpakaṃ viya. “Patīto”tiādīhi tuṭṭhākārova dassito adadā varanti āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitāya tuṭṭho varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:623: Sā tassa santike varaṃ gaṇhantī osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:626: Nisippalobhikā gacche, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare”ti.
atk-s0514a1:627: Tassattho – “sakka devarāja, sace me tvaṃ varaṃ ado, puna isipalobhikāya na gaccheyyaṃ, mā maṃ etadatthāya pahiṇeyyāsi, etaṃ varaṃ vare yācāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:628_0: Satthā tassa bhikkhuno imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0514a1:628_1: saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā alambusā purāṇadutiyikā
atk-s0514a1:628_2: ahosi, isisiṅgo ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu, pitā mahāisi pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0514a1:632_0: Ariyāvakāsosīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tadā
atk-s0514a1:632_1: hi satthā uposathike upāsake sampahaṃsetvā “porāṇakapaṇḍitā mahatiṃ nāgasampattiṃ
atk-s0514a1:632_2: pahāya uposathavāsaṃ upavasiṃsuyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:633_0: Atīte rājagahe magadharājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto tassa rañño aggamahesiyā
atk-s0514a1:633_1: kucchimhi nibbatti, “duyyodhano”tissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni
atk-s0514a1:633_2: uggaṇhitvā āgantvā pitu sippaṃ dassesi. Atha naṃ pitā rajje abhisiñcitvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:633_3: pabbajitvā uyyāne vasi. Bodhisatto divasassa tikkhattuṃ pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. Tassa
atk-s0514a1:633_4: mahālābhasakkāro udapādi. So teneva palibodhena kasiṇaparikammamattampi kātuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0514a1:633_5: cintesi – “mahā me lābhasakkāro, na sakkā mayā idha vasantena imaṃ jaṭaṃ chindituṃ,
atk-s0514a1:633_6: puttassa me anārocetvāva aññattha gamissāmī”ti. So kañci ajānāpetvā uyyānā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0514a1:633_7: magadharaṭṭhaṃ atikkamitvā mahisakaraṭṭhe saṅkhapāladahato nāma nikkhantāya kaṇṇaveṇṇāya
atk-s0514a1:633_8: nadiyā nivattane candakapabbataṃ upanissāya paṇṇasālaṃ katvā tattha vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:633_9: katvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā uñchācariyāya yāpesi. Tamenaṃ saṅkhapālo nāma nāgarājā
atk-s0514a1:633_10: mahantena parivārena kaṇṇaveṇṇanadito nikkhamitvā antarantarā upasaṅkamati. So tassa
atk-s0514a1:633_11: dhammaṃ desesi. Athassa putto pitaraṃ daṭṭhukāmo gataṭṭhānaṃ ajānanto anuvicārāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:633_12: “asukaṭṭhāne nāma vasatī”ti ñatvā tassa dassanatthāya mahantena parivārena tattha
atk-s0514a1:633_13: gantvā ekamante khandhavāraṃ nivāsetvā katipayehi amaccehi saddhiṃ assamapadābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:634_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhapālo mahantena parivārena dhammaṃ suṇanto nisīdi. So taṃ rājānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:634_1: āgacchantaṃ disvā isiṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Rājā pitaraṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0514a1:634_2: katvā nisīditvā pucchi – “bhante, katararājā nāmesa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgato”ti. Tāta,
atk-s0514a1:634_3: saṅkhapālanāgarājā nāmesoti. So tassa sampattiṃ nissāya nāgabhavane lobhaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:634_4: katipāhaṃ vasitvā pitu bhikkhāhāraṃ nibaddhaṃ dāpetvā attano nagarameva gantvā catūsu
atk-s0514a1:634_5: dvāresu dānasālāyo kāretvā sakalajambudīpaṃ saṅkhobhento dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā
atk-s0514a1:634_6: uposathakammaṃ katvā nāgabhavanaṃ patthetvā āyupariyosāne nāgabhavane nibbattitvā
atk-s0514a1:634_7: saṅkhapālanāgarājā ahosi. So gacchante kāle tāya sampattiyā vippaṭisārī hutvā tato
atk-s0514a1:634_8: paṭṭhāya manussayoniṃ patthento uposathavāsaṃ vasi. Athassa nāgabhavane vasantassa
atk-s0514a1:634_9: uposathavāso na sampajjati, sīlavināsaṃ pāpuṇāti. So tato paṭṭhāya nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0514a1:634_10: kaṇṇaveṇṇāya nadiyā avidūre mahāmaggassa ca ekapadikamaggassa ca antare ekaṃ vammikaṃ
atk-s0514a1:634_11: parikkhipitvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samādinnasīlo “mama cammamaṃsādīhi atthikā cammamaṃsādīni
atk-s0514a1:634_12: harantū”ti attānaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā vammikamatthake nipanno samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0514a1:634_13: cātuddase pannarase vasitvā pāṭipade nāgabhavanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0514a1:635_0: Tasmiṃ ekadivasaṃ evaṃ sīlaṃ samādiyitvā nipanne paccantagāmavāsino soḷasa janā “maṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:635_1: āharissāmā”ti āvudhahatthā araññe vicarantā kiñci alabhitvā nikkhantā taṃ vammikamatthake
atk-s0514a1:635_2: nipannaṃ disvā “mayaṃ ajja godhāpotakampi na labhimhā, imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ vadhitvā
atk-s0514a1:635_3: khādissāmā”ti cintetvā “mahā kho panesa gayhamāno palāyeyya, yathānipannameva taṃ
atk-s0514a1:635_4: bhogesu sūlehi vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmā”ti sūlāni ādāya upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:635_5: Bodhisattassa sarīraṃ mahantaṃ ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasumanapupphadāmaṃ
atk-s0514a1:635_6: viya jiñjukaphalasannibhehi akkhīhi jayasumanapupphasadisena ca sīsena samannāgataṃ
atk-s0514a1:635_7: ativiya sobhati. So tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ janānaṃ padasaddena bhogantarato sīsaṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0514a1:635_8: rattakkhīni ummīletvā te sūlahatthe āgacchante disvā cintesi – “ajja mayhaṃ manoratho
atk-s0514a1:635_9: matthakaṃ pāpuṇissati, ahaṃ attānaṃ dānamukhe niyyādetvā vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nipanno,
atk-s0514a1:635_10: ime mama sarīraṃ sattīhi koṭṭetvā chiddāvachiddaṃ karonte kodhavasena akkhīni ummīletvā
atk-s0514a1:635_11: na olokessāmī”ti attano sīlabhedabhayena daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhāya sīsaṃ bhogantareyeva pavesetvā
atk-s0514a1:635_12: nipajji. Atha naṃ te upagantvā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā kaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pothetvā tikhiṇasūlehi
atk-s0514a1:635_13: aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhitvā sakaṇṭakakāḷavettayaṭṭhiyo pahāramukhehi pavesetvā aṭṭhasu
atk-s0514a1:635_14: ṭhānesu kājenādāya mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu, mahāsatto sūlehi vijjhanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:635_15: ekaṭṭhānepi kodhavasena akkhīni ummīletvā te na olokesi. Tassa aṭṭhahi kājehi ādāya
atk-s0514a1:635_16: nīyamānassa sīsaṃ olambetvā bhūmiyaṃ pahari. Atha naṃ “sīsamassa olambatī”ti mahāmagge
atk-s0514a1:635_17: nipajjāpetvā taruṇasūlena nāsāpuṭaṃ vijjhitvā rajjukaṃ pavesetvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0514a1:635_18: kājakoṭiyaṃ laggitvā punapi ukkhipitvā maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:636_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe videharaṭṭhe mithilanagaravāsī āḷāro nāma kuṭumbiko pañca sakaṭasatāni
atk-s0514a1:636_1: ādāya sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto te bhojaputte bodhisattaṃ tathā gaṇhitvā gacchante
atk-s0514a1:636_2: disvā tesaṃ soḷasannampi soḷasahi vāhagoṇehi saddhiṃ pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake
atk-s0514a1:636_3: sabbesaṃ nivāsanapārupanāni bhariyānampi nesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni datvā vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:636_4: Atha so nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā mahantena parivārena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0514a1:636_5: āḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāgabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ ādāya nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0514a1:636_6: tīhi nāgakaññāsatehi saddhiṃ mahantamassa yasaṃ datvā dibbehi kāmehi santappesi.
atk-s0514a1:636_7: Āḷāro nāgabhavane ekavassaṃ vasitvā dibbakāme paribhuñjitvā “icchāmahaṃ, samma, pabbajitu”nti
atk-s0514a1:636_8: nāgarājassa kathetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre gahetvā nāgabhavanato himavantappadesaṃ
atk-s0514a1:636_9: gantvā pabbajitvā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā aparabhāge cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā
atk-s0514a1:636_10: rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājadvāraṃ agamāsi. Atha
atk-s0514a1:636_11: naṃ bārāṇasirājā disvā iriyāpathe pasīditvā pakkosāpetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:636_12: nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhojetvā aññatarasmiṃ nīce āsane nisinno vanditvā tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:639: Kathaṃ nu vittāni pahāya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sapaññā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:640_0: Tattha ariyāvakāsosīti niddosasundarasarīrāvakāsosi, abhirūposīti attho. Pasannanettoti
atk-s0514a1:640_1: pañcahi pasādehi yuttanetto. Kulamhāti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā seṭṭhikulā
atk-s0514a1:640_2: vā pabbajitosīti maññāmi. Kathaṃ nūti kena kāraṇena kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā dhanañca
atk-s0514a1:640_3: upabhoge ca pahāya gharā nikkhamitvā pabbajitosi sapañña paṇḍitapurisāti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:641: Tato paraṃ tāpasassa ca rañño ca vacanappaṭivacanavasena gāthānaṃ sambandho veditabbo –
atk-s0514a1:644: Disvāna puññāna mahāvipākaṃ, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0514a1:646: “Na kāmakāmā na bhayā na dosā, vācaṃ musā pabbajitā bhaṇanti;
atk-s0514a1:647: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, sutvāna me jāyihitippasādo.
atk-s0514a1:650: Pavaḍḍhakāyaṃ uragaṃ mahantaṃ, ādāya gacchante pamodamāne.
atk-s0514a1:652: “Sohaṃ samāgamma janinda tehi, pahaṭṭhalomo avacamhi bhīto;
atk-s0514a1:653: Kuhiṃ ayaṃ nīyati bhīmakāyo, nāgena kiṃ kāhatha bhojaputtā.
atk-s0514a1:655: “Nāgo ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto;
atk-s0514a1:656: Sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsaṃ, na tvaṃ rasaññāsi videhaputta.
atk-s0514a1:658: “Ito mayaṃ gantvā sakaṃ niketaṃ, ādāya satthāni vikopayitvā;
atk-s0514a1:659: Maṃsāni bhokkhāma pamodamānā, mayañhi ve sattavo pannagānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:661: “Sace ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto;
atk-s0514a1:662: Dadāmi vo balibaddāni soḷasa, nāgaṃ imaṃ muñcatha bandhanasmā.
atk-s0514a1:664: “Addhā hi no bhakkho ayaṃ manāpo, bahū ca no uragā bhuttapubbā;
atk-s0514a1:665: Karoma te taṃ vacanaṃ aḷāra, mittañca no hohi videhaputta.
atk-s0514a1:667: “Tadāssu te bandhanā mocayiṃsu, yaṃ natthuto paṭimokkassa pāse;
atk-s0514a1:668: Mutto ca so bandhanā nāgarājā, pakkāmi pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:670: “Gantvāna pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ, puṇṇehi nettehi palokayī maṃ;
atk-s0514a1:671: Tadāssahaṃ piṭṭhito anvagacchiṃ, dasaṅguliṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā.
atk-s0514a1:673: “Gaccheva kho tvaṃ taramānarūpo, mā taṃ amittā punaraggahesuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:674: Dukkho hi luddehi punā samāgamo, adassanaṃ bhojaputtāna gaccha.
atk-s0514a1:676: “Agamāsi so rahadaṃ vippasannaṃ, nīlobhāsaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ sutitthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:677: Samotataṃ jambuhi vetasāhi, pāvekkhi nittiṇṇabhayo patīto.
atk-s0514a1:679: “So taṃ pavissa nacirassa nāgo, dibbena me pāturahū janinda;
atk-s0514a1:680: Upaṭṭhahī maṃ pitaraṃva putto, hadayaṅgamaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇanto.
atk-s0514a1:682: “Tvaṃ mesi mātā ca pitā aḷāra, abbhantaro pāṇadado sahāyo;
atk-s0514a1:683: Sakañca iddhiṃ paṭilābhakosmi, aḷāra passa me nivesanāni;
atk-s0514a1:685_1: Puññānanti tena katapuññānaṃ mahantaṃ vipākaṃ disvā kammañca phalañca paralokañca
atk-s0514a1:685_2: saddahitvā pavattāya saddhāya ahaṃ pabbajito. Na kāmakāmāti na vatthukāmenapi bhayenapi
atk-s0514a1:685_3: dosenapi musā bhaṇanti. Jāyihitīti, bhante, tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mayhampi pasādo
atk-s0514a1:685_4: somanassaṃ jāyissati. Vāṇijjanti vāṇijjakammaṃ karissāmīti gacchanto. Pathe addasāsimhīti
atk-s0514a1:685_5: pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ purato sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto mahāmagge janapadamanusse
atk-s0514a1:685_6: addasaṃ. Pavaḍḍhakāyanti vaḍḍhitakāyaṃ. Ādāyāti aṭṭhahi kājehi gahetvā. Avacamhīti
atk-s0514a1:685_7: abhāsiṃ. Bhīmakāyoti bhayajanakakāyo. Bhojaputtāti luddaputtake piyasamudācārenālapati.
atk-s0514a1:685_8: Videhaputtāti videharaṭṭhavāsitāya āḷāraṃ ālapiṃsu. Vikopayitvāti chinditvā. Mayañhi
atk-s0514a1:685_9: vo sattavoti mayaṃ pana nāgānaṃ verino nāma. Bhojanatthāti bhojanatthāya. Mittañca
atk-s0514a1:685_10: no hohīti tvaṃ amhākaṃ mitto hohi, kataguṇaṃ jāna.
atk-s0514a1:686_0: Tadāssu teti, mahārāja, tehi bhojaputtehi evaṃ vutte ahaṃ tesaṃ soḷasa vāhagoṇe nivāsanapārupanāni
atk-s0514a1:686_1: pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake bhariyānañca nesaṃ vatthālaṅkāraṃ adāsiṃ, atha te saṅkhapālanāgarājānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:686_2: bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā attano kakkhaḷatāya sakaṇṭakakāḷavettalatāya koṭiyaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a1:686_3: ākaḍḍhituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Athāhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā akilamentova asinā tā
atk-s0514a1:686_4: latā chinditvā dārakānaṃ kaṇṇavedhato vaṭṭinīharaṇaniyāmena adukkhāpento saṇikaṃ
atk-s0514a1:686_5: nīhariṃ, tasmiṃ kāle te bhojaputtā yaṃ bandhanaṃ assa natthuto pavesetvā pāse paṭimokkaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:686_6: tasmā bandhanā taṃ uragaṃ mocayiṃsu. Tassa nāsato saha pāsena taṃ rajjukaṃ nīhariṃsūti
atk-s0514a1:686_7: dīpeti. Iti te uragaṃ vissajjetvā thokaṃ gantvā “ayaṃ urago dubbalo, matakāle naṃ
atk-s0514a1:687_0: Puṇṇehīti sopi muhuttaṃ pācīnābhimukho gantvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi maṃ palokayi. Tadāssahanti
atk-s0514a1:687_1: tadā assa ahaṃ. Gacchevāti evaṃ taṃ avacanti vadati. Rahadanti kaṇṇaveṇṇadahaṃ. Samotatanti
atk-s0514a1:687_2: ubhayatīresu jamburukkhavetasarukkhehi otataṃ vitataṃ. Nittiṇṇabhayo patītoti so
atk-s0514a1:687_3: kira taṃ dahaṃ pavisanto āḷārassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā yāva naṅguṭṭhā otari, udake
atk-s0514a1:687_4: paviṭṭhaṭṭhānamevassa nibbhayaṃ ahosi, tasmā nittiṇṇabhayo patīto haṭṭhatuṭṭho pāvekkhīti.
atk-s0514a1:687_5: Pavissāti pavisitvā. Dibbena meti nāgabhavane pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā mayi kaṇṇaveṇṇatīraṃ
atk-s0514a1:687_6: anatikkanteyeva dibbena parivārena mama purato pāturahosi. Upaṭṭhahīti upāgami. Abbhantaroti
atk-s0514a1:687_7: hadayamaṃsasadiso. Tvaṃ mama bahupakāro, sakkāraṃ te karissāmi. Passa me nivesanānīti
atk-s0514a1:687_8: mama nāgabhavanaṃ passa. Masakkasāraṃ viyāti masakkasāro vuccati osakkanaparisakkanābhāvena
atk-s0514a1:687_9: ghanasāratāya ca sinerupabbatarājā. Ayaṃ tattha māpitaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0514a1:688: Mahārāja! Evaṃ vatvā so nāgarājā uttari attano nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:690: “Taṃ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, asakkharā ceva mudū subhā ca;
atk-s0514a1:691: Nīcattiṇā apparajā ca bhūmi, pāsādikā yattha jahanti sokaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:694: Pakkā ca pesī ca phalā suphullā, niccotukā dhārayantī phalānī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:695_0: Tattha asakkharāti yā tattha bhūmi pāsāṇasakkhararahitā mudu subhā kañcanarajatamaṇimayā
atk-s0514a1:695_2: Apparajāti paṃsurahitā. Yattha jahanti sokanti yattha paviṭṭhamattāva nissokā honti.
atk-s0514a1:695_3: Anāvakulāti na avakulā akhāṇumā upari ukkulavikulabhāvarahitā vā samasaṇṭhitā. Veḷuriyūpanīlāti
atk-s0514a1:695_4: veḷuriyena upanīlā, tasmiṃ nāgabhavane veḷuriyamayā pasannasalilā nīlobhāsā anekavaṇṇakamaluppalasañchannā
atk-s0514a1:695_5: pokkharaṇīti attho. Catuddisanti tassā pokkharaṇiyā catūsu disāsu. Pakkā cāti tasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:695_6: ambavane ambarukkhā pakkaphalā ca aḍḍhapakkaphalā ca taruṇaphalā ca phullitāyevāti
atk-s0514a1:695_7: attho. Niccotukāti channampi utūnaṃ anurūpehi pupphaphalehi samannāgatāti.
atk-s0514a1:697: Tesaṃ vanānaṃ naradeva majjhe, nivesanaṃ bhassarasannikāsaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:704: Sahassathambhaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, yatthassa bhariyā mahesī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:706: “Ekā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya veḷuriyamayaṃ mahagghaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:709: “Tato maṃ urago hatthe gahetvā, nisīdayī pāmukhaāsanasmiṃ;
atk-s0514a1:710: Idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, bhavañhi me aññataro garūnaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:712: “Aññā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya vāriṃ upasaṅkamitvā;
atk-s0514a1:713: Pādāni pakkhālayī me janinda, bhariyāva bhattū patino piyassa.
atk-s0514a1:715: “Aparā ca nārī taramānarūpā, paggayha sovaṇṇamayāya pātiyā;
atk-s0514a1:716: Anekasūpaṃ vividhaṃ viyañjanaṃ, upanāmayī bhatta manuññarūpaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:718: “Turiyehi maṃ bhārata bhuttavantaṃ, upaṭṭhahuṃ bhattu mano viditvā;
atk-s0514a1:719: Tatuttariṃ maṃ nipatī mahantaṃ, dibbehi kāmehi anappakehī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:720_0: Tattha nivesananti pāsādo. Bhassarasannikāsanti pabhassaradassanaṃ. Rajataggaḷanti
atk-s0514a1:720_1: rajatadvārakavāṭaṃ. Maṇīmayāti evarūpā tattha kūṭāgārā ca gabbhā ca. Paripūrāti sampuṇṇā.
atk-s0514a1:720_2: So saṅkhapāloti, mahārāja, ahaṃ evaṃ tasmiṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇente taṃ daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0514a1:720_3: ahosiṃ, atha maṃ tattha netvā so saṅkhapālo hatthe gahetvā taramāno veḷuriyathambhehi
atk-s0514a1:720_4: sahassathambhaṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa mahesī ahosi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ netīti
atk-s0514a1:720_5: dīpeti. Ekā cāti mayi pāsādaṃ abhiruḷhe ekā itthī aññehi maṇīhi jātimahantehi upetaṃ
atk-s0514a1:720_6: subhaṃ veḷuriyāsanaṃ tena nāgarājena avuttāva. Abbhihāsīti abhihari, attharīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0514a1:721_0: Pāmukhaāsanasminti pamukhāsanasmiṃ, uttamāsane nisīdāpesīti attho. Garūnanti mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0514a1:721_1: me tvaṃ aññataroti evaṃ vatvā nisīdāpesi. Vividhaṃ viyañjananti vividhaṃ byañjanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:721_2: Bhatta manuññarūpanti bhattaṃ manuññarūpaṃ. Bhāratāti rājānaṃ ālapati. Bhuttavantanti
atk-s0514a1:721_3: bhuttāviṃ katabhattakiccaṃ. Upaṭṭhahunti anekasatehi turiyehi gandhabbaṃ kurumānā
atk-s0514a1:721_4: upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Bhattu mano viditvāti attano patino cittaṃ jānitvā. Tatuttarinti tato
atk-s0514a1:721_5: gandhabbakaraṇato uttariṃ. Maṃ nipatīti so nāgarājā maṃ upasaṅkami. Mahantaṃ dibbehīti
atk-s0514a1:721_6: mahantehi uḷārehi dibbehi kāmehi tehi ca anappakehi.
atk-s0514a1:725: Aḷāra etāssu te kāmakārā, dadāmi te tā paricārayassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:726_0: Tattha sabbattamajjhāti sabbā attamajjhā, pāṇinā gahitappamāṇamajjhāti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:726_2: attho. Paricārayassūti tā attano pādaparicārikā karohīti vatvā tīhi itthisatehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:730: Nāgassidaṃ kinti kathañca laddhaṃ, kathajjhagamāsi vimānaseṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:732: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:734_0: Tattha dibbarasānubhutvāti dibbe kāmaguṇarase anubhavitvā. Tadāssuhanti tadā assu
atk-s0514a1:734_1: ahaṃ. Nāgassidanti bhadramukhassa saṅkhapālanāgarājassa idaṃ sampattijātaṃ kinti
atk-s0514a1:734_2: kiṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā kathañca katvā laddhaṃ, kathametaṃ vimānaseṭṭhaṃ tvaṃ ajjhagamāsi,
atk-s0514a1:734_3: iti naṃ ahaṃ pucchiṃ. Adhiccaladdhanti ahetunā laddhaṃ. Pariṇāmajaṃ teti kenaci tava
atk-s0514a1:734_4: atthāya pariṇāmitattā pariṇāmato jātaṃ. Sayaṃkatanti kārake pakkosāpetvā ratanāni datvā kāritanti.
atk-s0514a1:737: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:738: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:740: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a1:741: Akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:744: So ittaraṃ jīvitaṃ saṃviditvā, asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:746: “Annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ;
atk-s0514a1:747: Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
atk-s0514a1:750: Acchādanaṃ sayanamathannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha.
atk-s0514a1:752: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a1:753: Teneva me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, pahūtabhakkhaṃ bahuannapānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:754: Naccehi gītehi cupetarūpaṃ, ciraṭṭhitikaṃ na ca sassatāyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:757: Kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, hatthattamāgacchi vanibbakānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:759: “Bhayaṃ nu te anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūlaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:760: Kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, kilesamāpajji vanibbakānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:762: “Na me bhayaṃ anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:766: Athāgamuṃ soḷasa bhojaputtā, rajjuṃ gahetvāna daḷhañca pāsaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:768: “Bhetvāna nāsaṃ atikassa rajjuṃ, nayiṃsu maṃ samparigayha luddā;
atk-s0514a1:771: “Ekāyane taṃ pathe addasaṃsu, balena vaṇṇena cupetarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:772: Siriyā paññāya ca bhāvitosi, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
atk-s0514a1:774: “Na puttahetū na dhanassa hetū, na āyuno cāpi aḷāra hetu;
atk-s0514a1:775: Manussayoniṃ abhipatthayāno, tasmā parakkama tapo karomi.
atk-s0514a1:781: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, seyyo ito kena manussaloko.
atk-s0514a1:783: “Aḷāra nāññatra manussalokā, suddhīva saṃvijjati saṃyamo vā;
atk-s0514a1:784: Ahañca laddhāna manussayoniṃ, kāhāmi jātimaraṇassa antaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:786: “Saṃvaccharo me vasato tavantike, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi;
atk-s0514a1:787: Āmantayitvāna palemi nāga, cirappavuṭṭhosmi ahaṃ janinda.
atk-s0514a1:789: “Puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca, niccānusiṭṭhā upatiṭṭhathetaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:790: Kaccinnu taṃ nābhisapittha koci, piyañhi me dassanaṃ tuyhaṃ aḷāra.
atk-s0514a1:792: “Yathāpi mātū ca pitū agāre, putto piyo paṭivihito vaseyya;
atk-s0514a1:793: Tatopi mayhaṃ idhameva seyyo, cittañhi te nāga mayī pasannaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:795: “Maṇī mamaṃ vijjati lohitaṅko, dhanāharo maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a1:796: Ādāya tvaṃ gaccha sakaṃ niketaṃ, laddhā dhanaṃ taṃ maṇimossajassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:797_0: Tattha kiṃ te vatanti kiṃ tava vatasamādānaṃ. Brahmacariyanti seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Opānabhūtanti
atk-s0514a1:797_1: catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjitabbavibhavaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:797_2: Na ca sassatāyanti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ samānampi ce taṃ mayhaṃ sassataṃ na hotīti me katheti.
atk-s0514a1:798_0: Appānubhāvāti bhojaputte sandhāyāha. Hantīti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu sūlehi vijjhantā kiṃkāraṇā
atk-s0514a1:798_1: haniṃsu. Kiṃ paṭiccāti kiṃ sandhāya tvaṃ tadā tesaṃ hatthattaṃ āgacchi vasaṃ upagato.
atk-s0514a1:798_2: Vanibbakānanti bhojaputtā idha “vanibbakā”ti vuttā. Tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūlanti
atk-s0514a1:798_3: kiṃ nu tava tejo bhojaputte disvā tadā bhayaṃ mahantaṃ anvagataṃ, udāhu visaṃ dantamūlaṃ
atk-s0514a1:798_4: na anvagataṃ. Kilesanti dukkhaṃ. Vanibbakānanti bhojaputtānaṃ santike, bhojaputte nissāyāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:799_0: Tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantunti mama visatejo aññassa tejena abhihantumpi na sakkā.
atk-s0514a1:799_2: dhammāni. Sukittitānīti suvaṇṇitāni sukathitāni. Kinti katvā? Samuddavelāva duraccayānīti
atk-s0514a1:799_3: tehi samuddavelā viya sappurisehi jīvitatthampi duraccayānīti vaṇṇitāni, tasmā ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:799_4: sīlabhedabhayena khantimettādisamannāgato hutvā mama kopassa sīlavelantaṃ atikkamituṃ na adāsinti āha.
atk-s0514a1:800_0: “Imissā pana saṅkhapāladhammadesanāya dasapi pāramiyo labbhanti. Tadā hi mahāsattena
atk-s0514a1:800_1: sarīrassa pariccattabhāvo dānapāramī nāma hoti, tathārūpenāpi visatejena sīlassa
atk-s0514a1:800_2: abhinnatā sīlapāramī, nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ nekkhammapāramī,
atk-s0514a1:800_3: ‘idañcidañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti saṃvidahanaṃ paññāpāramī, adhivāsanavīriyaṃ vīriyapāramī,
atk-s0514a1:800_4: adhivāsanakhanti khantipāramī, saccasamādānaṃ saccapāramī, ‘mama sīlaṃ na bhindissāmī’ti
atk-s0514a1:800_5: adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramī, anuddayabhāvo mettāpāramī, vedanāya majjhattabhāvo upekkhāpāramī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:801_0: Athāgamunti athekadivasaṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā soḷasa bhojaputtā khararajjuñca
atk-s0514a1:801_1: daḷhapāsañca sūlāni ca gahetvā mama santikaṃ āgatā. Bhetvānāti mama sarīraṃ aṭṭhasu
atk-s0514a1:801_2: ṭhānesu bhinditvā sakaṇṭakakāḷavettalatā pavesetvā. Nāsaṃ atikassa rajjunti thokaṃ
atk-s0514a1:801_3: gantvā sīsaṃ me olambantaṃ disvā mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā puna nāsampi me bhinditvā
atk-s0514a1:801_4: vaṭṭarajjuṃ atikassa āvunitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ laggetvā samantato pariggahetvā maṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:802_0: Addasaṃsūti, samma saṅkhapāla, te bhojaputtā ekāyane ekagamane jaṅghapadikamagge
atk-s0514a1:802_1: taṃ balena ca vaṇṇena ca upetarūpaṃ passiṃsu, tvaṃ pana issariyasobhaggasiriyā ca
atk-s0514a1:802_2: paññāya ca bhāvito vaḍḍhito, so tvaṃ evarūpo samānopi kimatthaṃ tapaṃ karosi, kimicchanto
atk-s0514a1:802_3: uposathavāsaṃ vasasi, sīlaṃ rakkhasi. “Addasāsi”ntipi pāṭho, ahaṃ ekāyane mahāmagge
atk-s0514a1:802_4: taṃ addasinti attho. Abhipatthayānoti patthento. Tasmāti yasmā manussayoniṃ patthemi,
atk-s0514a1:803_0: Surositoti suṭṭhu manulitto. Itoti imamhā nāgabhavanā manussaloko kena uttaritaro.
atk-s0514a1:803_1: Suddhīti maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātā visuddhi. Saṃyamoti sīlaṃ. Idaṃ so manussalokeyeva
atk-s0514a1:803_2: buddhapaccekabuddhānaṃ uppattiṃ sandhāyāha. Kāhāmīti attano appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:803_3: karonto jātijarāmaraṇassantaṃ karissāmīti. Evaṃ, mahārāja, so saṅkhapālo manussalokaṃ
atk-s0514a1:803_4: vaṇṇesi. Saṃvaccharo meti evaṃ, mahārāja, tasmiṃ manussalokaṃ vaṇṇente ahaṃ pabbajjāya
atk-s0514a1:803_5: sinehaṃ katvā etadavocaṃ. Tattha upaṭṭhitosmīti annapānena ceva dibbehi ca kāmaguṇehi
atk-s0514a1:803_6: pariciṇṇo mānito asmi. Palemīti paremi gacchāmi. Cirappavuṭṭhosmīti ahaṃ manussalokato cirappavuṭṭho asmi.
atk-s0514a1:804_0: Nābhisapitthāti kacci nu kho mama puttādīsu koci taṃ na akkosi na paribhāsīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:804_1: “Nābhisajjethā”tipi pāṭho, na kopesīti attho. Paṭivihitoti paṭijaggito. Maṇī mamanti
atk-s0514a1:804_2: sace, samma āḷāra, gacchasiyeva, evaṃ sante mama lohitaṅko dhanahārako sabbakāmadado
atk-s0514a1:804_3: maṇi saṃvijjati, taṃ uḷāraṃ maṇiratanaṃ ādāya tava gehaṃ gaccha, tattha imassānubhāvena
atk-s0514a1:804_4: yāvadicchakaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā puna imaṃ maṇiṃ ossajassu, ossajanto ca aññattha anossajitvā
atk-s0514a1:804_5: attano udakacāṭiyaṃ ossajeyyāsīti vatvā mayhaṃ maṇiratanaṃ upanesīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:805_0: Evaṃ vatvā āḷāro “athāhaṃ, mahārāja, nāgarājānaṃ etadavocaṃ – ‘samma, nāhaṃ dhanenatthiko,
atk-s0514a1:805_1: pabbajituṃ pana icchāmī’ti pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ yācitvā teneva saddhiṃ nāgabhavanā
atk-s0514a1:805_2: nikkhamitvā taṃ nivattetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitomhī”ti vatvā rañño dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0514a1:808: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0514a1:810: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuddhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0514a1:811: Etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:812_0: Tattha saddhāyāti kammañca phalañca nibbānañca saddahitvā. Dumapphalānīva patantīti
atk-s0514a1:812_1: yathā rukkhaphalāni pakkānipi apakkānipi patanti, tathā māṇavā daharā ca vuddhā ca
atk-s0514a1:812_2: patanti. Apaṇṇakanti aviraddhaṃ niyyānikaṃ. Sāmaññameva seyyoti pabbajjāva uttamāti
atk-s0514a1:815: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0514a1:816: Nāgañca sutvāna tavañcaḷāra, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:817: Tattha ye bahuṭhānacintinoti ye bahūni kāraṇāni jānanti. Nāgañcāti tathā appamādavihārinaṃ nāgarājānañca tava ca vacanaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0514a1:820: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0514a1:821: Nāgañca sutvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:822_0: Evaṃ so rañño dhammaṃ desetvā tattheva cattāro vassānamāse vasitvā puna himavantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:822_1: gantvā yāvajīvaṃ cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokūpago ahosi. Saṅkhapālopi
atk-s0514a1:822_2: yāvajīvaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasitvā rājā ca dānādīni puññāni karitvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0514a1:823: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā pitā tāpaso kassapo ahosi, bārāṇasirājā ānando, āḷāro sāriputto, saṅkhapālanāgarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0514a1:827_0: Āmantayāmi nigamanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nekkhammapāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:827_1: Paccuppannavatthu mahānāradakassapajātakasadisameva. Atīte pana bārāṇasī sudassanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:827_2: nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, tattha brahmadatto nāma rājā ajjhāvasi. Bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā
atk-s0514a1:827_3: kucchimhi nibbatti, dasamāsaccayena mātukucchito nikkhami. Tassa pana puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ
atk-s0514a1:827_4: mukhaṃ ahosi, tenassa “somakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So viññutaṃ patto sutavittako
atk-s0514a1:827_5: savanasīlo ahosi, tena naṃ “sutasomo”ti sañjāniṃsu. So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni
atk-s0514a1:827_6: uggahetvā āgato pitu santakaṃ setacchattaṃ labhitvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi, mahantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:827_7: issariyaṃ ahosi. Tassa candādevippamukhāni soḷasa itthisahassāni ahesuṃ. So aparabhāge
atk-s0514a1:827_8: puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhanto gharāvāse anabhirato araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:828_0: So ekadivasaṃ kappakaṃ āmantetvā “yadā me, samma, sirasmiṃ palitaṃ passeyyāsi, tadā
atk-s0514a1:828_1: me āroceyyāsī”ti āha. Kappako tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā aparabhāge palitaṃ disvā
atk-s0514a1:828_2: ārocetvā “tena hi naṃ, samma kappaka, uddharitvā mama hatthe patiṭṭhapehī”ti vutte
atk-s0514a1:828_3: suvaṇṇasaṇḍāsena uddharitvā rañño hatthe ṭhapesi. Taṃ disvā mahāsatto “jarāya me
atk-s0514a1:828_4: sarīraṃ abhibhūta”nti bhīto taṃ palitaṃ gahetvāva pāsādā otaritvā mahājanassa dassanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a1:828_5: paññatte rājapallaṅke nisīditvā senāpatippamukhāni asītiamaccasahassāni purohitappamukhāni
atk-s0514a1:828_6: saṭṭhibrāhmaṇasahassāni aññe ca raṭṭhikajānapadanegamādayo bahū jane pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:828_7: “sirasmiṃ me palitaṃ jātaṃ, ahaṃ mahallakosmi, mama pabbajitabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti vatvā
atk-s0514a1:831: Sirasmiṃ palitaṃ jātaṃ, pabbajjaṃ dāni rocaha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:832: Tattha āmantayāmīti jānāpemi. Rocahanti “rocemi ahaṃ, tassa me, bhonto! Pabbajitabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:833: Taṃ sutvā tesu eko visāradappatto hutvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:835: “Abhuṃ me kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, sallaṃ me deva urasi kappesi;
atk-s0514a1:836: Sattasatā te bhariyā, kathaṃ nu te tā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:837_0: Tattha abhunti avaḍḍhiṃ. Urasi kappesīti urasmiṃ sunisitadhotasattiṃ cāresi. Sattasatāti
atk-s0514a1:837_1: samajātikā khattiyakaññā sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ nu te tā bhavissantīti tā tava
atk-s0514a1:837_2: bhariyā tayi pabbajite anāthā nippaccayā kathaṃ bhavissanti, etā anāthā katvā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0514a1:842: Tattha paññāyihintīti attano kammena paññāyissanti. Ahaṃ etāsaṃ kiṃ homi, sabbāpetā daharā, yo añño rājā bhavissati, taṃ etā gamissantīti.
atk-s0514a1:843_0: Amaccādayo bodhisattassa paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ asakkontā tassa mātu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:843_1: ārocesuṃ. Sā turitaturitā āgantvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, tāta, pabbajitukāmosī”ti vatvā
atk-s0514a1:845: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te homahaṃ mātā;
atk-s0514a1:846: Yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi deva.
atk-s0514a1:848: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yaṃ taṃ ahaṃ vijāyissaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:849: Yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:850_0: Tattha dulladdhanti yaṃ etaṃ mayā labhantiyā puttaṃ jammaṃ laddhaṃ dulladdhaṃ. Yaṃ
atk-s0514a1:850_1: meti yena kāraṇena mayi nānappakārakaṃ vipalantiyā tvaṃ pabbajituṃ icchasi, tena
atk-s0514a1:850_2: kāraṇena tādisassa puttassa labhanaṃ mama dulladdhaṃ nāmāti.
atk-s0514a1:851: Bodhisatto evaṃ paridevamānāyapi mātarā saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi. Sā roditvā kanditvā sayameva ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Athassa pitu ārocesuṃ. So āgantvā ekaṃ tāva gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:853: “Ko nāmeso dhammo, sutasoma kā ca nāma pabbajjā;
atk-s0514a1:854: Yaṃ no amhe jiṇṇe, anapekkho pabbajasi devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:855_0: Tattha yaṃ no amheti yaṃ tvaṃ amhākaṃ putto samāno amhe jiṇṇe paṭijaggitabbakāle
atk-s0514a1:855_1: appaṭijaggitvā papāte silaṃ pavaṭṭento viya chaḍḍetvā anapekkho pabbajasi, tena taṃ
atk-s0514a1:855_2: vadāmi ko nāmeso tava dhammoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0514a1:856_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto tuṇhī ahosi. Atha naṃ pitā, “tāta sutasoma, sacepi te mātāpitūsu
atk-s0514a1:856_1: sineho natthi, puttadhītaro te bahū taruṇā, tayā vinā vattituṃ na sakkhissanti, tesaṃ
atk-s0514a1:859: Mañjū tepitaṃ apassantā, maññe dukkhaṃ nigacchantī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:860: Tattha mañjūti madhuravacanā. Nigacchantīti nigacchissanti kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ paṭilabhissantīti maññāmi.
atk-s0514a1:864: Mañjūhi sabbehipi tumhehi, cirampi ṭhatvā vināsabhāvo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:865_0: Tattha sabbehipi tumhehīti, tāta, na kevalaṃ putteheva, atha kho tumhehipi aññehipi
atk-s0514a1:865_1: sabbasaṅkhārehi ciraṃ ṭhatvāpi dīghamaddhānaṃ ṭhatvāpi vināsabhāvova niyato. Sakalasmimpi
atk-s0514a1:865_2: hi lokasannivāse ekasaṅkhāropi nicco nāma natthīti.
atk-s0514a1:866_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto pitu dhammakathaṃ kathesi. So tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:866_1: Athassa sattasatānaṃ bhariyānaṃ ārocayiṃsu. Tā ca pāsādā oruyha tassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0514a1:868: “Chinnaṃ nu tuyhaṃ hadayaṃ, adu te karuṇā ca natthi amhesu;
atk-s0514a1:869: Yaṃ no vikandantiyo, anapekkho pabbajasi devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:870_0: Tassattho – sāmi sutasoma, amhe vidhavā katvā gacchantassa appamattakassapi sinehassa
atk-s0514a1:870_1: abhāvena tava hadayaṃ amhesu chinnaṃ nu, udāhu karuṇāya abhāvena kāruññaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0514a1:870_2: yaṃ no evaṃ vikandantiyo pahāya pabbajasīti.
atk-s0514a1:871: Mahāsatto tāsaṃ pādamūle parivattitvā paridevamānānaṃ paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:873: “Na ca mayhaṃ chinnaṃ hadayaṃ, atthi karuṇāpi mayhaṃ tumhesu;
atk-s0514a1:875: Tattha saggañcāti ahaṃ saggañca patthayanto yasmā ayaṃ pabbajjā nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitā, tasmā pabbajissāmi, tumhe mā cintayitthāti tā assāsesi.
atk-s0514a1:876: Athassa aggamahesiyā ārocesuṃ. Sā garubhārā paripuṇṇagabbhāpi samānā āgantvā mahāsattaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā tisso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:878: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te ahaṃ bhariyā;
atk-s0514a1:879: Yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi deva.
atk-s0514a1:881: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te ahaṃ bhariyā;
atk-s0514a1:882: Yaṃ me kucchipaṭisandhiṃ, anapekkho pabbajasi deva.
atk-s0514a1:884: “Paripakko me gabbho, kucchigato yāva naṃ vijāyāmi;
atk-s0514a1:885: Māhaṃ ekā vidhavā, pacchā dukkhāni addakkhi”nti.
atk-s0514a1:886_0: Tattha yaṃ meti yasmā mama vilapantiyā tvaṃ anapekkho pabbajasi, tasmā yaṃ mayā tava
atk-s0514a1:886_1: santikā aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ dulladdhameva āsi. Dutiyagāthāya yasmā maṃ
atk-s0514a1:886_2: tvaṃ kucchipaṭisandhiṃ pahāya anapekkho pabbajasi, tasmā yaṃ mayā tava bhariyattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:886_3: laddhaṃ, taṃ dulladdhaṃ meti attho. Yāva nanti yāvāhaṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ vijāyāmi, tāva adhivāsehīti.
atk-s0514a1:889: “Paripakko te gabbho, kucchigato iṅgha tvaṃ vijāyassu;
atk-s0514a1:891_0: Tattha puttanti, bhadde, tava gabbho paripakkoti jānāmi, tvaṃ pana vijāyamānā puttaṃ
atk-s0514a1:891_1: vijāyissasi, na dhītaraṃ, sā tvaṃ sotthinā vijāyassu puttaṃ, ahaṃ pana saddhiṃ tayā
atk-s0514a1:892_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī “ito dāni paṭṭhāya, deva, amhākaṃ
atk-s0514a1:892_1: sirī nāma natthī”ti ubhohi hatthehi hadayaṃ dhārayamānā assūni muñcantī mahāsaddena
atk-s0514a1:892_2: paridevi. Atha naṃ samassāsento mahāsatto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:894: “Mā tvaṃ cande rudi, mā soci vanatimiramattakkhi;
atk-s0514a1:896_0: Tattha mā tvaṃ cande rudīti, bhadde candādevi, tvaṃ mā rodi mā soci. Vanatimiramattakkhīti
atk-s0514a1:897: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī pāsādaṃ āruyha rodamānā nisīdi. Atha naṃ bodhisattassa jeṭṭhaputto disvā “kiṃ nu kho me mātā rodantī nisinnā”ti taṃ pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:899: “Ko taṃ amma kopesi, kiṃ rodasi pekkhasi ca maṃ bāḷhaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:901_0: Tattha kopesīti, amma! Ko nāma taṃ kopesi, ko te appiyaṃ akāsi. Pekkhasi cāti maṃ
atk-s0514a1:901_1: bāḷhaṃ pekkhantī kiṃkāraṇā rodasīti adhippāyo. Kaṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemīti aghātetabbampi
atk-s0514a1:901_2: kaṃ ghātemi attano ñātīnaṃ udikkhamānānaññeva, akkhāhi meti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:904: “Na hi so sakkā hantuṃ, vijitāvī yo maṃ tāta kopesi;
atk-s0514a1:905: Pitā te maṃ tāta avaca, anapekkho ahaṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:906_0: Tattha vijitāvīti, tāta, yo maṃ imissā pathaviyā vijitāvī kopesi, appiyasamudācārena
atk-s0514a1:906_1: me hadaye kopañca sokañca pavesesi, so tayā hantuṃ na sakkā, mañhi, tāta, tava pitā
atk-s0514a1:906_2: “ahaṃ rajjasiriñca tañca pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajissāmī”ti avaca, idaṃ me rodanakāraṇanti.
atk-s0514a1:907: So tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “amma! Kiṃ nāma tvaṃ kathesi, nanu evaṃ sante mayaṃ anāthā nāma bhavissāmā”ti paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:909: “Yohaṃ pubbe niyyāmi, uyyānaṃ mattakuñjare ca yodhemi;
atk-s0514a1:910: Sutasome pabbajite, kathaṃ nu dāni karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:911_0: Tassattho – yo ahaṃ pubbe catuājaññayuttaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathaṃ abhiruyha
atk-s0514a1:911_1: uyyānaṃ gacchāmi, mattakuñjare ca yodhemi, aññehi ca assakīḷādīhi kīḷāmi, svāhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:912_0: Athassa kaniṭṭhabhātā sattavassiko te ubhopi rodante disvā mātaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0514a1:912_1: “amma! Kiṃkāraṇā tumhe rodathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “tena hi mā rodatha,
atk-s0514a1:912_2: ahaṃ tātassa pabbajituṃ na dassāmī”ti ubhopi te assāsetvā dhātiyā saddhiṃ pāsādā
atk-s0514a1:912_3: oruyha pitu santikaṃ gantvā, “tāta, tvaṃ kira amhe akāmake pahāya ‘pabbajāmī’ti vadasi,
atk-s0514a1:912_4: ahaṃ te pabbajituṃ na dassāmī”ti pitaraṃ gīvāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:914: “Mātucca me rudantyā, jeṭṭhassa ca bhātuno akāmassa;
atk-s0514a1:915: Hatthepi te gahessaṃ, na hi gacchasi no akāmāna”nti.
atk-s0514a1:916_0: Mahāsatto cintesi – “ayaṃ me paripanthaṃ karoti, kena nu kho naṃ upāyena paṭikkamāpeyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:916_1: Tato dhātiṃ oloketvā, “amma! Dhāti handimaṃ maṇikkhandhapiḷandhanaṃ, taveso hotu
atk-s0514a1:916_2: hatthe, puttaṃ apanehi, mā me antarāyaṃ karī”ti sayaṃ puttaṃ hatthe gahetvā apanetuṃ
atk-s0514a1:918: “Uṭṭhehi tvaṃ dhāti, imaṃ kumāraṃ ramehi aññattha;
atk-s0514a1:919: Mā me paripanthamakāsi, saggaṃ mama patthayānassā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:920: Tattha imaṃ kumāranti, amma! Dhāti tvaṃ uṭṭhehi, imaṃ kumāraṃ apanetvā āgantvā imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā aññattha naṃ abhiramehīti.
atk-s0514a1:921: Sā lañjaṃ labhitvā kumāraṃ saññāpetvā ādāya aññattha gantvā paridevamānā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:923: “Yaṃ nūnimaṃ dadeyyaṃ pabhaṅkaraṃ, ko nu me imināttho;
atk-s0514a1:924: Sutasome pabbajite, kiṃ nu menaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:925_0: Tassattho – yaṃ nūna ahaṃ imaṃ lañjatthāya gahitaṃ pabhaṅkaraṃ suppabhāsaṃ maṇiṃ
atk-s0514a1:925_1: dadeyyaṃ, ko nu mayhaṃ sutasomanarinde pabbajite iminā attho, kiṃ nu menaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:925_2: ahaṃ tasmiṃ pabbajite imaṃ labhissāmi, labhantīpi ca kiṃ nu kho etaṃ karissāmi, passatha me kammanti.
atk-s0514a1:926: Tato mahāsenagutto cintesi – “ayaṃ rājā “gehe me dhanaṃ manda’nti saññaṃ karoti maññe, bahubhāvamassa kathessāmī”ti. So uṭṭhāya vanditvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:928: “Koso ca tuyhaṃ vipulo, koṭṭhāgārañca tuyhaṃ paripūraṃ;
atk-s0514a1:929: Pathavī ca tuyhaṃ vijitā, ramassu mā pabbaji devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:932: “Koso ca mayhaṃ vipulo, koṭṭhāgārañca mayhaṃ paripūraṃ;
atk-s0514a1:933: Pathavī ca mayhaṃ vijitā, taṃ hitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:934: Taṃ sutvā tasmiṃ apagate kulavaḍḍhanaseṭṭhi nāma uṭṭhāya vanditvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:936: “Mayhampi dhanaṃ pahūtaṃ, saṅkhyātuṃ nopi deva sakkomi;
atk-s0514a1:937: Taṃ te dadāmi sabbampi, ramassu mā pabbaji devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:940: “Jānāmi dhanaṃ pahūtaṃ, kulavaḍḍhana pūjito tayā casmi;
atk-s0514a1:942_0: Taṃ sutvā kulavaḍḍhane apagate mahāsatto somadattaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ āmantetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:942_1: ahaṃ pañjarapakkhitto vanakukkuṭo viya ukkaṇṭhito, maṃ gharāvāse anabhirati abhibhavati,
atk-s0514a1:942_2: ajjeva pabbajissāmi, tvaṃ imaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjā”ti rajjaṃ niyyādento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:946: Taṃ sutvā sopi pabbajitukāmo taṃ dīpento itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:948: “Idañca tuyhaṃ rucitaṃ, sutasoma ajjeva dāni tvaṃ pabbaja;
atk-s0514a1:949: Ahampi pabbajissāmi, na ussahe tayā vinā ahaṃ ṭhātu”nti.
atk-s0514a1:950: Atha naṃ so paṭikkhipitvā upaḍḍhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:952: “Na hi sakkā pabbajituṃ, nagare na hi paccati janapade cā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:953_0: Tattha na hi paccatīti idāneva tāva mama pabbajjādhippāyaṃ sutvāva imasmiṃ dvādasayojanike
atk-s0514a1:953_1: sudassananagare ca sakalajanapade ca na paccati, koci uddhane aggiṃ na jāleti, amhesu
atk-s0514a1:953_2: pana dvīsu pabbajitesu anāthāva raṭṭhavāsino bhavissanti, tasmā na hi sakkā tayā
atk-s0514a1:954: Taṃ sutvā mahājano mahāsattassa pādamūle parivattitvā paridevanto upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:956: Tato mahāsatto “alaṃ mā socayittha, ahaṃ cirampi ṭhatvā tumhehi vinā bhavissāmi, uppannasaṅkhāro hi nicco nāma natthī”ti mahājanassa dhammaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:959: Evaṃ suparittake jīvite, na ca pamajjituṃ kālo.
atk-s0514a1:966_0: Tattha upanīyatidaṃ maññeti, tāta, “idaṃ jīvitaṃ upanīyatī”ti ahaṃ maññāmi. Aññesu
atk-s0514a1:966_1: suttesu upasaṃharaṇattho upaniyyanattho, idha pana pariyādānattho. Tasmā yathā parittaṃ
atk-s0514a1:966_2: udakaṃ rajakānaṃ khāracaṅkavāre pakkhittaṃ sīghaṃ pariyādiyati, tathā jīvitampi.
atk-s0514a1:966_3: Evaṃ suparittake jīvite taṃ parittakaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ gahetvā vicarantānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:966_4: na puññakiriyāya pamajjituṃ kālo, appamādova kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamettha attho. Andhabālā
atk-s0514a1:966_5: pamajjantīti ajarāmarā viya hutvā gūthakalale sūkarā viya hutvā kāmapaṅke nimujjantā
atk-s0514a1:967_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā pubbakaṃ nāma pāsādaṃ āruyha sattamāya
atk-s0514a1:967_1: bhūmiyā ṭhito khaggena cūḷaṃ chinditvā “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ kiñci na homi, attano rājānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:967_2: gaṇhathā”ti saveṭhanaṃ cūḷaṃ mahājanassa antare khipi. Taṃ gahetvā mahājano bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:967_3: parivaṭṭento parivaṭṭento paridevi. Tasmiṃ ṭhāne mahantaṃ rajaggaṃ uṭṭhahi. Paṭikkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:967_4: ṭhitajano taṃ oloketvā “raññā cūḷaṃ chinditvā saveṭhanā cūḷā mahājanassa antare khittā
atk-s0514a1:967_5: bhavissati, tenāyaṃ pāsādassa avidūre rajavaṭṭi uggatā”ti paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:970: Maññe no kesā chinnā, yasassino dhammarājassā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:971_0: Tattha ūhaññateti uṭṭhahati. Rajagganti rajakkhandho. Avidūreti ito amhākaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato
atk-s0514a1:971_1: avidūre. Pubbakamhīti pubbakapāsādassa samīpe. Maññe noti amhākaṃ dhammarājassa kesā
atk-s0514a1:972_0: Mahāsatto paricārikaṃ pesetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre āharāpetvā kappakena kesamassuṃ
atk-s0514a1:972_1: ohārāpetvā alaṅkāraṃ sayanapiṭṭhe pātetvā rattapaṭānaṃ dasāni chinditvā tāni kāsāyāni
atk-s0514a1:972_2: nivāsetvā mattikāpattaṃ vāmaaṃsakūṭe laggetvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya mahātale aparāparaṃ
atk-s0514a1:972_3: caṅkamitvā pāsādā otaritvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajji. Gacchantaṃ pana naṃ na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0514a1:972_4: Athassa sattasatā khattiyakaññā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā taṃ adisvā ābharaṇabhaṇḍameva
atk-s0514a1:972_5: disvā otaritvā avasesānaṃ soḷasasahassānaṃ itthīnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ piyasāmiko
atk-s0514a1:972_6: sutasomamahissaro pabbajito”ti mahāsaddena paridevamānāva bahi nikkhamiṃsu. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:972_7: khaṇe mahājano tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ aññāsi, sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā “rājā kira
atk-s0514a1:972_8: no pabbajito”ti rājadvāre sannipati, mahājano “idha rājā bhavissati, ettha bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0514a1:972_9: pāsādādīni rañño paribhogaṭṭhānāni gantvā rājānaṃ adisvā –
atk-s0514a1:1022_0: Tattha vītikiṇṇoti sovaṇṇapupphehi ca nānāmālyehi ca samokiṇṇo. Parikiṇṇoti parivārito.
atk-s0514a1:1022_1: Itthāgārehīti dāsiyo upādāya itthiyo itthāgārā nāma. Ñātisaṅghenāti amaccāpi idha
atk-s0514a1:1022_2: ñātayo eva. Kūṭāgāranti sattaratanavicitto sayanakūṭāgāragabbho. Asokavanikāti asokavanabhūmi.
atk-s0514a1:1022_3: Sabbakālikāti sabbakālaparibhogakkhamā niccapupphitā vā. Uyyānanti nandanavanacittalatāvanasadisaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1022_4: uyyānaṃ. Sabbakālikanti chasupi utūsu uppajjanakapupphaphalasañchannaṃ. Kaṇikāravanādīsu
atk-s0514a1:1022_5: sabbakālikanti sabbakāle supupphitaphalitameva. Sañchannāti nānāvidhehi jalajathalajakusumehi
atk-s0514a1:1022_6: suṭṭhu sañchannā. Aṇḍajehi vītikiṇṇāti sakuṇasaṅghehi okiṇṇā.
atk-s0514a1:1023: Evaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu paridevitvā mahājano puna rājaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā –
atk-s0514a1:1025: “Rājā vo kho pabbajito, sutasomo rajjaṃ imaṃ pahatvāna;
atk-s0514a1:1027_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā attano ghare vibhavaṃ pahāya puttadhītaro hatthesu gahetvā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0514a1:1027_1: bodhisattasseva santikaṃ agamāsi, tathā mātāpitaro puttadārā soḷasasahassā ca nāṭakitthiyo.
atk-s0514a1:1027_2: Sakalanagaraṃ tucchaṃ viya ahosi, janapadavāsinopi tesaṃ pacchato pacchato gamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1027_3: Bodhisatto dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā himavantābhimukho pāyāsi. Athassa abhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1027_4: ñatvā sakko vissakammaṃ āmantetvā, “tāta vissakamma, sutasomamahārājā abhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1027_5: nikkhanto, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, samāgamo ca mahā bhavissati, gaccha himavantapadese
atk-s0514a1:1027_6: gaṅgātīre tiṃsayojanāyāmaṃ pañcadasayojanavitthataṃ assamapadaṃ māpehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0514a1:1027_7: So tathā katvā tasmiṃ assamapade pabbajitaparikkhāre paṭiyādetvā ekapadikamaggaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1028_0: Mahāsatto tena maggena gantvā taṃ assamapadaṃ pavisitvā paṭhamaṃ sayaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0514a1:1028_1: pacchā sese pabbājesi, aparabhāge bahū pabbajiṃsu. Tiṃsayojanikaṃ ṭhānaṃ paripūri.
atk-s0514a1:1028_2: Vissakammena pana assamamāpitaniyāmo ca bahūnaṃ pabbajitaniyāmo ca bodhisattassa
atk-s0514a1:1028_3: assamapadasaṃvidahitaniyāmo ca hatthipālajātake āgatanayeneva veditabbo. Tattha mahāsatto
atk-s0514a1:1028_4: yassa yasseva kāmavitakkādi micchāvitakko uppajjati, taṃ taṃ ākāsena upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:1031: Mā vo kāmā haniṃsu, rammañhi sudassanaṃ nagaraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1033: “Mettacittañca bhāvetha, appamāṇaṃ divā ca ratto ca;
atk-s0514a1:1035_0: Tattha ratikīḷitānīti kāmaratiyo ca kāyavācākhiḍḍāvasena pavattakīḷitāni ca. Mā vo
atk-s0514a1:1035_1: kāmā haniṃsūti mā tumhe vatthukāmakilesakāmā haniṃsu. Rammaṃ hīti sudassananagaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:1035_2: nāma ramaṇīyaṃ, taṃ mā anussarittha. Mettacittanti idaṃ desanāmattameva, so pana
atk-s0514a1:1035_3: cattāropi brahmavihāre ācikkhi. Appamāṇanti appamāṇasattārammaṇaṃ. Agacchitthāti
atk-s0514a1:1036: Sopi isigaṇo tassovāde ṭhatvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosīti sabbaṃ hatthipālajātake āgatanayeneva kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1037_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi tathāgato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1037_1: nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1037_2: candādevī rāhulamātā, jeṭṭhaputto sāriputto, kaniṭṭhaputto rāhulo, dhāti khujjuttarā,
atk-s0514a1:1037_3: kulavaḍḍhanaseṭṭhi kassapo, mahāsenagutto moggallāno, somadattakumāro ānando, sesaparisā
atk-s0514a1:1046_0: Uddayhate janapadoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabba
atk-s0514a1:1046_1: kathesi. Kathento ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ “kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī”ti pucchitvā “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti
atk-s0514a1:1046_2: vutte “na esā kho, bhikkhu, idāneva tava anatthakārikā, pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya
atk-s0514a1:1046_3: jhānā parihāyitvā mahāvināsaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:1047_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālakule
atk-s0514a1:1047_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto uggahitasippo isipabbajjaṃ pabbijitvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā
atk-s0514a1:1047_2: himavantapadese vāsaṃ kappesi. Alambusājātake vuttanayeneva taṃ paṭicca ekā migī
atk-s0514a1:1047_3: gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi, “isisiṅgo”tvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi. Atha naṃ pitā
atk-s0514a1:1047_4: vayappattaṃ pabbājetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. So nacirasseva jhānābhiññā uppādetvā
atk-s0514a1:1047_5: jhānasukhena kīḷi, ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo ahosi. Tassa sīlatejena sakkassa bhavanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1047_6: kampi. Sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “upāyenassa sīlaṃ bhindissāmī”ti tīṇi saṃvaccharāni
atk-s0514a1:1047_7: sakalakāsiraṭṭhe vuṭṭhiṃ nivāresi, raṭṭhaṃ aggidaḍḍhaṃ viya ahosi. Sasse asampajjamāne
atk-s0514a1:1047_8: dubbhikkhapīḷitā manussā sannipatitvā rājaṅgaṇe upakkosiṃsu. Atha ne rājā vātapāne
atk-s0514a1:1047_9: ṭhito “kiṃ eta”nti pucchi. “Mahārāja, tīṇi saṃvaccharāni devassa avassantattā sakalaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1047_10: uddayhati, manussā dukkhitā, devaṃ vassāpehi, devā”ti. Rājā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1048_0: Tasmiṃ kāle sakko aḍḍharattasamaye tassa sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā ekobhāsaṃ katvā vehāse
atk-s0514a1:1048_1: aṭṭhāsi. Rājā taṃ disvā “kosi tva”nti pucchi. “Sakkohamasmī”ti. “Kenatthenāgatosī”ti?
atk-s0514a1:1048_2: “Vassati te, mahārāja, raṭṭhe devo”ti? “Na vassatī”ti. “Jānāsi panassa avassanakāraṇa”nti?
atk-s0514a1:1048_3: “Na jānāmi, sakkā”ti. “Mahārāja, himavantapadese isisiṅgo nāma tāpaso paṭivasati
atk-s0514a1:1048_4: ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo. So nibaddhaṃ deve vassante kujjhitvā ākāsaṃ olokesi,
atk-s0514a1:1048_5: tasmā devo na vassatī”ti. “Idāni panettha kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Tassa tape bhinne devo
atk-s0514a1:1048_6: vassissatī”ti. “Ko panassa tapaṃ bhindituṃ samattho”ti? “Dhītā te, mahārāja, niḷinikā
atk-s0514a1:1048_7: samatthā, taṃ pakkosāpetvā ‘asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gantvā tāpasassa tapaṃ bhindāhī’ti
atk-s0514a1:1048_8: pesehī”ti. Evaṃ so rājānaṃ anusāsitvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Rājā punadivase amaccehi
atk-s0514a1:1048_9: saddhiṃ mantetvā dhītaraṃ pakkosāpetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1051: Ehi niḷinike gaccha, taṃ me brāhmaṇamānayā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1052: Tattha taṃ meti taṃ mama anatthakāriṃ brāhmaṇaṃ attano vasaṃ ānehi, kilesarativasenassa sīlaṃ bhindāhīti.
atk-s0514a1:1057: Tattha dukkhakkhamāti ahaṃ, mahārāja, dukkhassa khamā na homi, addhānampi na jānāmi, sāhaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:1060: “Phītaṃ janapadaṃ gantvā, hatthinā ca rathena ca;
atk-s0514a1:1065_0: Tattha dārusaṅghāṭayānenāti, amma, niḷinike na tvaṃ padasā gamissasi, phītaṃ pana
atk-s0514a1:1065_1: subhikkhaṃ khemaṃ attano janapadaṃ hatthivāhanehi ca rathavāhanehi ca gantvā tato
atk-s0514a1:1065_2: parampi ajjhokāse paṭicchannena vayhādinā udakaṭṭhāne nāvāsaṅkhātena dārusaṅghāṭayānena
atk-s0514a1:1065_3: gaccha. Vaṇṇarūpenāti evaṃ akilamamānā gantvā tava vaṇṇena ceva rūpasampadāya ca
atk-s0514a1:1066_0: Evaṃ so dhītarā saddhiṃ akathetabbampi raṭṭhaparipālanaṃ nissāya kathesi. Sāpi “sādhū”ti
atk-s0514a1:1066_1: sampaṭicchi. Athassā sabbaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā amaccehi saddhiṃ uyyojesi. Amaccā
atk-s0514a1:1066_2: taṃ ādāya paccantaṃ patvā tattha khandhāvāraṃ nivāsāpetvā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:1066_3: vanacarakena desitena maggena himavantaṃ pavisitvā pubbaṇhasamaye tassa assamapadassa
atk-s0514a1:1066_4: samīpaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto puttaṃ assamapade nivāsāpetvā sayaṃ phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0514a1:1066_5: araññaṃ paviṭṭho hoti. Vanacarako sayaṃ assamaṃ agantvā tassa pana dassanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a1:1066_6: ṭhatvā niḷinikāya taṃ dassento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1072: Maññe no aggiṃ hāpeti, isisiṅgo mahiddhiko”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1073_0: Tattha kadalīsaṅkhātā dhajā paññāṇaṃ assāti kadalīdhajapaññāṇo. Ābhujīparivāritoti
atk-s0514a1:1073_1: bhujapattavanaparikkhitto. Saṅkhātoti eso aggi assa isisiṅgassa jhānena saṅkhāto
atk-s0514a1:1073_2: paccakkhagato jalati. Maññe no agginti aggiṃ no hāpeti juhati paricaratīti maññāmi.
atk-s0514a1:1074_0: Amaccāpi bodhisattassa araññaṃ paviṭṭhavelāya assamaṃ parivāretvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a1:1074_1: rājadhītaraṃ isivesaṃ gāhāpetvā suvaṇṇacīrakena nivāsanapārupanaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārehi
atk-s0514a1:1074_2: alaṅkaritvā tantubaddhaṃ cittageṇḍukaṃ gāhāpetvā assamapadaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ bahi rakkhantā
atk-s0514a1:1074_3: aṭṭhaṃsu. Sā tena geṇḍukena kīḷantī caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ otari. Tasmiṃ khaṇe isisiṅgo paṇṇasāladvāre
atk-s0514a1:1074_4: pāsāṇaphalake nisinno hoti. So taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā bhītatasito uṭṭhāya paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1074_5: pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Sāpissa paṇṇasāladvāraṃ gantvā kīḷiyeva. Satthā tañca tato uttari
atk-s0514a1:1074_6: ca atthaṃ pakāsento tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1084_0: Tattha geṇḍukenassāti assa isisiṅgassa assamadvāre geṇḍukena kīḷati. Vidaṃsayantīti
atk-s0514a1:1084_1: dassentī. Guyhaṃ pakāsitāni cāti guyhañca rahassaṅgaṃ pakāsitāni ca pākaṭāni mukhahatthādīni.
atk-s0514a1:1084_2: Abravīti so kira paṇṇasālāya ṭhatvā cintesi – “sacāyaṃ yakkho bhaveyya, paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1084_3: pavisitvā maṃ murumurāpetvā khādeyya, nāyaṃ yakkho, tāpaso bhavissatī”ti assamā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0514a1:1086: “Ambho ko nāma so rukkho, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1087: Dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na taṃ ohāya gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1088_0: Tattha yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalanti yassa tava rukkhassa evaṃgatikaṃ manoramaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1088_1: Ko nāma so rukkhoti citrageṇḍukassa adiṭṭhapubbattā “rukkhaphalena tena bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0514a1:1092: Bahavo tādisā rukkhā, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1093: Dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na maṃ ohāya gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1094: Tattha samīpe gandhamādaneti gandhamādanapabbate mama assamassa samīpe. Yassa tevaṃgatanti yassa evaṃgataṃ, ta-kāro byañjanasandhikaroti.
atk-s0514a1:1095: Iti sā musāvādaṃ abhāsi. Itaropi saddahitvā “tāpaso eso”ti saññāya paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1097: “Etū bhavaṃ assamimaṃ adetu, pajjañca bhakkhañca paṭiccha dammi;
atk-s0514a1:1098: Idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, ito bhavaṃ mūlaphalāni bhuñjatū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1099_0: Tattha assamimanti assamaṃ imaṃ bhavaṃ pavisatu. Adetūti yathāsannihitaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjatu.
atk-s0514a1:1099_1: Pajjanti pādabbhañjanaṃ. Bhakkhanti madhuraphalāphalaṃ. Paṭicchāti paṭiggaṇha. Idamāsananti
atk-s0514a1:1100_0: Tassā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kaṭṭhattharaṇe nisīdantiyā suvaṇṇacīrake dvidhā gate sarīraṃ
atk-s0514a1:1100_1: appaṭicchannaṃ ahosi. Tāpaso mātugāmasarīrassa adiṭṭhapubbattā taṃ disvā “vaṇṇo eso”ti saññāya evamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1103: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1104_0: Tattha supicchitanti dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ samāgamakāle suphusitaṃ sippipuṭamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1104_1: Subhalakkhaṇena hi asamannāgatāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvāṭadhātukaṃ hoti, samannāgatāya abbhunnataṃ
atk-s0514a1:1104_2: sippipuṭamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ. Kaṇharivappakāsatīti ubhosu passesu kāḷakaṃ viya khāyati.
atk-s0514a1:1104_3: Kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭhanti tava uttamaṅgaṃ liṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ na paññāyati, kiṃ
atk-s0514a1:1104_4: nu taṃ tava sarīrasaṅkhāte kose paviṭṭhanti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:1107: “Ahaṃ vane mūlaphalesanaṃ caraṃ, āsādayiṃ acchaṃ sughorarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1108: So maṃ patitvā sahasājjhapatto, panujja maṃ abbahi uttamaṅgaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1110: “Svāyaṃ vaṇo khajjati kaṇḍuvāyati, sabbañca kālaṃ na labhāmi sātaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1111: Paho bhavaṃ kaṇḍumimaṃ vinetuṃ, kurutaṃ bhavaṃ yācito brāhmaṇattha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1112_0: Tattha āsādayinti ghaṭṭesiṃ, āgacchantaṃ disvā leḍḍunā paharinti attho. Patitvāti
atk-s0514a1:1112_1: upadhāvitvā. Sahasājjhappattoti mamaṃ sahasā ajjhappatto sampatto. Panujjāti atha
atk-s0514a1:1112_2: maṃ potetvā. Abbahīti mukhena mama uttamaṅgaṃ luñcitvā pakkāmi, tato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:1112_3: ṭhāne vaṇo jāto. Svāyanti so ayaṃ tato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ vaṇo khajjati ceva kaṇḍuvañca
atk-s0514a1:1112_4: karoti, tappaccayā sāhaṃ sabbakālaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ na labhāmi. Pahoti pahu
atk-s0514a1:1112_5: samattho. Brāhmaṇatthanti bhavaṃ mayā yācito imaṃ brāhmaṇassa atthaṃ karotu, idaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1113: So tassā musāvādaṃ “sabhāvo”ti saddahitvā “sace te evaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, karissāmī”ti taṃ padesaṃ oloketvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1115: “Gambhīrarūpo te vaṇo salohito, apūtiko vaṇagandho mahā ca;
atk-s0514a1:1116: Karomi te kiñci kasāyayogaṃ, yathā bhavaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1117: Tattha salohitoti rattobhāso. Apūtikoti pūtimaṃsarahito. Vaṇagandhoti thokaṃ duggandho. Kasāyayoganti ahaṃ keci rukkhakasāye gahetvā tava ekaṃ kasāyayogaṃ karomīti.
atk-s0514a1:1120: “Na mantayogā na kasāyayogā, na osadhā brahmacāri kamanti;
atk-s0514a1:1121: Yaṃ te mudu tena vinehi kaṇḍuṃ, yathā ahaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1122_0: Tattha kamantīti, bho brahmacāri, imasmiṃ mama vaṇe neva mantayogā, na kasāyayogā,
atk-s0514a1:1122_1: na pupphaphalādīni osadhāni kamanti, anekavāraṃ katehipi tehi etassa phāsukabhāvo
atk-s0514a1:1122_2: na bhūtapubbo. Yaṃ pana te etaṃ mudu aṅgajātaṃ, tena ghaṭṭiyamānasseva tassa kaṇḍu
atk-s0514a1:1122_3: na hoti, tasmā tena vinehi kaṇḍunti.
atk-s0514a1:1123_0: So “saccaṃ eso bhaṇatī”ti sallakkhetvā “methunasaṃsaggena sīlaṃ bhijjati, jhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1123_1: antaradhāyatī”ti ajānanto mātugāmassa adiṭṭhapubbattā methunadhammassa ca ajānanabhāvena
atk-s0514a1:1123_2: “bhesajja”nti vadantiyā tāya methunaṃ paṭisevi. Tāvadevassa sīlaṃ bhijji, jhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1123_3: parihāyi. So dve tayo vāre saṃsaggaṃ katvā kilanto hutvā nikkhamitvā saraṃ oruyha
atk-s0514a1:1123_4: nhatvā paṭippassaddhadaratho āgantvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ nisīditvā punapi taṃ “tāpaso”ti
atk-s0514a1:1125: “Ito nu bhoto katamena assamo, kacci bhavaṃ abhiramasi araññe;
atk-s0514a1:1126: Kacci nu te mūlaphalaṃ pahūtaṃ, kacci bhavantaṃ na vihiṃsanti vāḷā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1127: Tattha katamenāti ito katamena disābhāgena bhoto assamo. Bhavanti ālapanametaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1130: “Ito ujuṃ uttarāyaṃ disāyaṃ, khemā nadī himavatā pabhāvī;
atk-s0514a1:1131: Tassā tīre assamo mayha rammo, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
atk-s0514a1:1133: “Ambā ca sālā tilakā ca jambuyo, uddālakā pāṭaliyo ca phullā;
atk-s0514a1:1134: Samantato kimpurisābhigītaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
atk-s0514a1:1136: “Tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca mettha, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1137: Taṃ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
atk-s0514a1:1139: “Phalā ca mūlā ca pahūtamettha, vaṇṇena gandhena rasenupetā;
atk-s0514a1:1140: Āyanti ca luddakā taṃ padesaṃ, mā me tato mūlaphalaṃ ahāsu”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1141_0: Tattha uttarāyanti uttarāya. Khemāti evaṃnāmikā nadī. Himavatā pabhāvīti himavantato
atk-s0514a1:1141_1: pavattati. Ahoti patthanatthe nipāto. Uddālakāti vātaghātakā. Kimpurisābhigītanti
atk-s0514a1:1141_2: samantato parivāretvā madhurasaddena gāyantehi kimpurisehi abhigītaṃ. Tālā ca mūlā
atk-s0514a1:1141_3: ca phalā ca metthāti ettha mama assame pāsādikā tālarukkhā ca tesaññeva vaṇṇagandhādisampannā
atk-s0514a1:1141_4: kandasaṅkhātā mūlā ca phalā ca. Pahūtametthāti nānārukkhaphalā ca rukkhavallimūlā
atk-s0514a1:1141_5: ca pahūtā ettha. Mā me tatoti taṃ mama assamapadaṃ sambahulā luddakā āgacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:1141_6: mayā cettha āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ bahu madhurasamūlaphalāphalaṃ atthi, te mayi cirāyante
atk-s0514a1:1141_7: mūlaphalāphalaṃ hareyyuṃ. Te tato mama mūlaphalāphalaṃ mā hariṃsu, tasmā sacepi mayā
atk-s0514a1:1141_8: saddhiṃ āgantukāmo, ehi, no ce, ahaṃ gamissāmīti āha.
atk-s0514a1:1142: Taṃ sutvā tāpaso yāva pitu āgamanā adhivāsāpetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1144: “Pitā mamaṃ mūlaphalesanaṃ gato, idāni āgacchati sāyakāle;
atk-s0514a1:1145: Ubhova gacchāmase assamaṃ taṃ, yāva pitā mūlaphalato etū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1146: Tattha ubhova gacchāmaseti mama pitu ārocetvā ubhova gamissāma.
atk-s0514a1:1147_0: Tato sā cintesi – “ayaṃ tāva araññeva vaḍḍhitabhāvena mama itthibhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:1147_1: pitā panassa maṃ disvāva jānitvā ‘tvaṃ idha kiṃ karosī’ti kājakoṭiyā paharitvā sīsampi
atk-s0514a1:1147_2: me bhindeyya, tasmiṃ anāgateyeva mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭati, āgamanakammampi me niṭṭhita”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1147_3: Sā tassa āgamanūpāyaṃ ācikkhantī itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1149: “Aññe bahū isayo sādhurūpā, rājīsayo anumagge vasanti;
atk-s0514a1:1150: Teyeva pucchesi mamassamaṃ taṃ, te taṃ nayissanti mamaṃ sakāse”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1151_0: Tattha rājīsayoti, samma, mayā na sakkā cirāyituṃ, aññe pana sādhusabhāvā rājisayo
atk-s0514a1:1151_1: ca brāhmaṇisayo ca anumagge mama assamamaggapasse vasanti, ahaṃ tesaṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0514a1:1151_2: gamissāmi, tvaṃ te puccheyyāsi, te taṃ mama santikaṃ nayissantīti.
atk-s0514a1:1152_0: Evaṃ sā attano palāyanūpāyaṃ katvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā taṃ olokentameva “tvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1152_1: nivattā”ti vatvā āgamanamaggeneva amaccānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Te taṃ gahetvā khandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0514a1:1152_2: gantvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sakkopi taṃ divasameva tussitvā sakalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0514a1:1152_3: devaṃ vassāpesi, tato subhikkhaṃ janapadaṃ ahosi. Isisiṅgatāpasassapi tāya pakkantamattāya
atk-s0514a1:1152_4: eva kāye ḍāho uppajji. So kampanto paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā vākacīraṃ pārupitvā socanto
atk-s0514a1:1152_5: nipajji. Bodhisatto sāyaṃ āgantvā puttaṃ apassanto “kahaṃ nu kho gato”ti kājaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0514a1:1152_6: paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā taṃ nipannakaṃ disvā “tāta, kiṃ karosī”ti piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto
atk-s0514a1:1154: “Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni, na te udakamābhataṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1155: Aggīpi te na hāpito, kiṃ nu mandova jhāyasi.
atk-s0514a1:1157: “Bhinnāni kaṭṭhāni huto ca aggi, tapanīpi te samitā brahmacārī;
atk-s0514a1:1158: Pīṭhañca mayhaṃ udakañca hoti, ramasi tuvaṃ brahmabhūto puratthā.
atk-s0514a1:1161: Na me tuvaṃ ālapasī mamajja, naṭṭhaṃ nu kiṃ cetasikañca dukkha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1162_0: Tattha bhinnānīti araññato uddhaṭāni. Na hāpitoti na jalito. Bhinnānīti pubbe tayā
atk-s0514a1:1162_1: mamāgamanavelāya kaṭṭhāni uddhaṭāneva honti. Huto ca aggīti aggi ca huto hoti. Tapanīti
atk-s0514a1:1162_2: visibbanaaggisaṅkhātā tapanīpi te samitāva sayameva saṃvidahitāva hoti. Pīṭhanti
atk-s0514a1:1162_3: mama āsanatthāya pīṭhañca paññattameva hoti. Udakañcāti pādadhovanaudakampi upaṭṭhāpitameva
atk-s0514a1:1162_4: hoti. Brahmabhūtoti tuvampi ito puratthā seṭṭhabhūto imasmiṃ assame abhiramasi. Abhinnakaṭṭhosīti
atk-s0514a1:1162_5: so dāni ajja anuddhaṭakaṭṭhosi. Asiddhabhojanoti na te kiñci amhākaṃ kandamūlaṃ vā
atk-s0514a1:1162_6: paṇṇaṃ vā seditaṃ. Mamajjāti, mama putta, ajja na me tvaṃ ālapasi. Naṭṭhaṃ nu kinti
atk-s0514a1:1162_7: kiṃ nu te naṭṭhaṃ vā, kiṃ cetasikaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, akkhāhi me nipannakāraṇanti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:1163: So pitu vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:1169: Dve yamā gaṇḍā ure sujātā, suvaṇṇatindukanibhā pabhassarā.
atk-s0514a1:1171: “Mukhañca tassa bhusadassaneyyaṃ, kaṇṇesu lambanti ca kuñcitaggā;
atk-s0514a1:1172: Te jotare carato māṇavassa, suttañca yaṃ saṃyamanaṃ jaṭānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1174: “Aññā ca tassa saṃyamāni catasso, nīlā pītā lohitikā ca setā;
atk-s0514a1:1175: Tā piṃsare carato māṇavassa, tiriṭisaṅghāriva pāvusamhi.
atk-s0514a1:1177: “Na mikhalaṃ muñjamayaṃ dhāreti, na santhare no pana pabbajassa;
atk-s0514a1:1178: Tā jotare jaghanantare vilaggā, sateratā vijjurivantalikkhe.
atk-s0514a1:1181: Aghaṭṭitā niccakīḷaṃ karonti, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalāni tāni.
atk-s0514a1:1183: “Jaṭā ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, parosataṃ vellitaggā sugandhā;
atk-s0514a1:1184: Dvedhā siro sādhu vibhattarūpo, aho nu kho mayha tathā jaṭāssu.
atk-s0514a1:1186: “Yadā ca so pakirati tā jaṭāyo, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpā;
atk-s0514a1:1187: Nīluppalaṃ vātasameritaṃva, tatheva saṃvāti panassamo ayaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1189: “Paṅko ca tassa bhusadassaneyyo, netādiso yādiso mayhaṃ kāye;
atk-s0514a1:1190: So vāyati erito mālutena, vanaṃ yathā aggagimhe suphullaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1192: “Nihanti so rukkhaphalaṃ pathabyā, sucittarūpaṃ ruciraṃ dassaneyyaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1193: Khittañca tassa punarehi hatthaṃ, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalaṃ nu kho taṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1195: “Dantā ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, suddhā samā saṅkhavarūpapannā;
