atk-s0514a1:2637_4: kira mahāsatto abhirūpo ahosi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sobhaggappatto, so kira pubbe paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0514a1:2637_5: piṇḍapātanissandena buddhapaṭimākaraṇanissandena ca evaṃ tejavanto ahosi. Saṃgacchīti
atk-s0514a1:2637_6: athassa mātā mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahāsattassa bahuṃ
atk-s0514a1:2637_7: paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya paccuggamanaṃ katvā samāgacchi. Sopi mātarā saddhiṃyeva nagaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:2637_8: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sattāhaṃ chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā alaṅkatapāsādatalaṃ abhiruhi. Tepi
atk-s0514a1:2637_9: ubho jayampatikā samaggā ahesuṃ, tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ samaggā sammodamānā phītaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2638_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0514a1:2638_1: ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2638_2: kaniṭṭho ānando, khujjā khujjuttarā, pabhāvatī rāhulamātā, parisā buddhaparisā, kusarājā
atk-s0514a1:2642_0: Devatā nusi gandhabboti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0514a1:2642_1: kathesi. Vatthu sāmajātake vatthusadisaṃ. Tadā pana satthā “mā, bhikkhave, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0514a1:2642_2: ujjhāyittha, porāṇakapaṇḍitā sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ labhamānāpi taṃ aggahetvā mātāpitaro
atk-s0514a1:2643_0: Atīte bārāṇasī brahmavaḍḍhanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Tattha manojo nāma rājā rajjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2643_1: kāresi. Tattha aññataro asītikoṭivibhavo brāhmaṇamahāsālo aputtako ahosi. Tassa brāhmaṇī
atk-s0514a1:2643_2: teneva “bhoti puttaṃ patthehī”ti vuttā patthesi. Atha bodhisatto brahmalokā cavitvā
atk-s0514a1:2643_3: tassā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, jātassa cassa “soṇakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Tassa
atk-s0514a1:2643_4: padasā gamanakāle aññopi satto brahmalokā cavitvā tassāyeva kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:2643_5: gaṇhi, tassa jātassa “nandakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Tesaṃ uggahitavedānaṃ sabbasippesu
atk-s0514a1:2643_6: nipphattiṃ pattānaṃ vayappattānaṃ rūpasampadaṃ disvā brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āmantetvā
atk-s0514a1:2643_7: “bhoti puttaṃ soṇakumāraṃ gharabandhanena bandhissāmā”ti āha. Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0514a1:2643_8: puttassa tamatthaṃ ācikkhi. So “alaṃ, amma, mayhaṃ gharāvāsena, ahaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tumhe
atk-s0514a1:2643_9: paṭijaggitvā tumhākaṃ accayena himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajissāmī”ti āha. Sā brāhmaṇassa etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:2644_0: Te punappunaṃ kathentāpi tassa cittaṃ alabhitvā nandakumāraṃ āmantetvā “tāta, tena
atk-s0514a1:2644_1: hi tvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti vatvā “nāhaṃ bhātarā chaḍḍitakheḷaṃ sīsena ukkhipāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2644_2: ahampi tumhākaṃ accayena bhātarāva saddhiṃ pabbajissāmī”ti vutte tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a1:2644_3: “ime dve evaṃ taruṇāva kāme pajahanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mayaṃ, sabbeyeva pabbajissāmā”ti
atk-s0514a1:2644_4: cintetvā, “tātā, kiṃ vo amhākaṃ accayena pabbajjāya, idāneva sabbe mayaṃ pabbajissāmā”ti
atk-s0514a1:2644_5: rañño ārocetvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā dāsajanaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2644_6: dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā cattāropi janā brahmavaḍḍhananagarā nikkhamitvā himavantapadese
atk-s0514a1:2644_7: pañcapadumasañchannaṃ saraṃ nissāya ramaṇīye vanasaṇḍe assamaṃ māpetvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0514a1:2644_8: tattha vasiṃsu. Ubhopi bhātaro mātāpitaro paṭijaggiṃsu, tesaṃ pātova dantakaṭṭhañca
atk-s0514a1:2644_9: mukhadhovanañca datvā paṇṇasālañca pariveṇañca sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2644_10: upaṭṭhapetvā araññato madhuraphalāphalāni āharitvā mātāpitaro khādāpenti, uṇhena
atk-s0514a1:2644_11: vā sītena vā vārinā nhāpenti, jaṭā sodhenti, pādaparikammādīni tesaṃ karonti.
atk-s0514a1:2645_0: Evaṃ addhāne gate nandapaṇḍito “mayā ābhataphalāphalāneva paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro khādāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:2645_1: purato gantvā hiyyo ca parahiyyo ca gahitaṭṭhānato yāni vā tāni vā pātova āharitvā
atk-s0514a1:2645_2: mātāpitaro khādāpesi. Te tāni khāditvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathikā bhavanti. Soṇapaṇḍito
atk-s0514a1:2645_3: pana dūraṃ gantvā madhuramadhurāni supakkasupakkāni āharitvā upanāmesi. Atha naṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2645_4: “tāta, kaniṭṭhena te ābhatāni mayaṃ pātova khāditvā uposathikā jātā, na idāni no
atk-s0514a1:2645_5: attho”ti vadanti. Iti tassa phalāphalāni paribhogaṃ na labhanti vinassanti, punadivasesupi
atk-s0514a1:2645_6: tathevāti. Evaṃ so pañcābhiññatāya dūraṃ gantvāpi āharati, te pana na khādanti.
atk-s0514a1:2646_0: Atha mahāsatto cintesi – “mātāpitaro me sukhumālā, nando ca yāni vā tāni vā apakkaduppakkāni
atk-s0514a1:2646_1: phalāphalāni āharitvā khādāpeti, evaṃ sante ime na cīraṃ pavattissanti, vāressāmi
atk-s0514a1:2646_2: na”nti. Atha naṃ so āmantetvā “nanda, ito paṭṭhāya phalāphalaṃ āharitvā mamāgamanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2646_3: paṭimānehi, ubhopi ekatova khādāpessāmā”ti āha. So evaṃ vuttepi attano puññaṃ paccāsīsanto
atk-s0514a1:2646_4: na tassa vacanamakāsi. Mahāsatto “nando mama vacanaṃ akaronto ayuttaṃ karoti, palāpessāmi
atk-s0514a1:2646_5: naṃ, tato ekakova mātāpitaro paṭijaggissāmī”ti cintetvā “nanda, tvaṃ anovādako paṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2646_6: vacanaṃ na karosi, ahaṃ jeṭṭho, mātāpitaro mameva bhāro, ahameva nesaṃ paṭijaggissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2646_7: tvaṃ idha vasituṃ na lacchasi, aññattha yāhī”ti tassa accharaṃ pahari.
atk-s0514a1:2647_0: So tena palāpito tassa santike ṭhātuṃ asakkonto taṃ vanditvā mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:2647_1: tamatthaṃ ārocetvā attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kasiṇaṃ oloketvā taṃ divasameva pañca
atk-s0514a1:2647_2: abhiññāyo aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā cintesi – “ahaṃ sīnerupādato ratanavālukā
atk-s0514a1:2647_3: āharitvā mama bhātu paṇṇasālāya pariveṇe okiritvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi, evampi
atk-s0514a1:2647_4: na sobhissati, anotattato udakaṃ āharitvā mama bhātu paṇṇasālāya pariveṇe osiñcitvā
atk-s0514a1:2647_5: bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi, evampi na sobhissati, sace me bhātaraṃ devatānaṃ vasena
atk-s0514a1:2647_6: khamāpeyyaṃ, cattāro ca mahārājāno sakkañca ānetvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi, evampi
atk-s0514a1:2647_7: na sobhissati, sakalajambudīpe manojaṃ aggarājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā rājāno ānetvā khamāpessāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2647_8: evaṃ sante mama bhātu guṇo sakalajambudīpe avattharitvā gamissati, candimasūriyo
atk-s0514a1:2647_9: viya paññāyissatī”ti. So tāvadeva iddhiyā gantvā brahmavaḍḍhananagare tassa rañño
atk-s0514a1:2647_10: nivesanadvāre otaritvā ṭhito “eko kira vo tāpaso daṭṭhukāmo”ti rañño ārocāpesi. Rājā
atk-s0514a1:2647_11: “kiṃ pabbajitassa mayā diṭṭhena, āhāratthāya āgato bhavissatī”ti bhattaṃ pahiṇi,
atk-s0514a1:2647_12: so bhattaṃ na icchi. Taṇḍulaṃ pahiṇi, taṇḍulaṃ na icchi. Vatthāni pahiṇi, vatthāni
atk-s0514a1:2647_13: na icchi. Tambūlaṃ pahiṇi, tambūlaṃ na icchi. Athassa santike dūtaṃ pesesi, “kimatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2647_14: āgatosī”ti. So dūtena puṭṭho “rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahituṃ āgatomhī”ti āha. Rājā taṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a1:2647_15: “bahū mama upaṭṭhākā, attanova tāpasadhammaṃ karotū”ti pesesi. So taṃ sutvā “ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2647_16: tumhākaṃ attano balena sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ gahetvā dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2648_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā cintesi – “pabbajitā nāma paṇḍitā, kiñci upāyaṃ jānissantī”ti taṃ
atk-s0514a1:2648_1: pakkosāpetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā vanditvā “bhante, tumhe kira mayhaṃ sakalajambudīparajjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2648_3: antamaso khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ kassaci anuppādetvā tava dhanacchedaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2648_4: akatvā attano iddhiyāva gahetvā dassāmi, apica kevalaṃ papañcaṃ akatvā ajjeva nikkhamituṃ
atk-s0514a1:2648_5: vaṭṭatī”ti. So tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā senaṅgaparivuto nagarā nikkhami. Sace senāya
atk-s0514a1:2648_6: uṇhaṃ hoti, nandapaṇḍito attano iddhiyā chāyaṃ katvā sītaṃ karoti, deve vassante
atk-s0514a1:2648_7: senāya upari vassituṃ na deti, sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā vāreti, magge khāṇukaṇṭakādayo sabbaparissaye
atk-s0514a1:2648_8: antaradhāpeti, maggaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā sayaṃ ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0514a1:2649_0: Evaṃ senaṃ ādāya paṭhamaṃ kosalaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā nagarassāvidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:2649_1: “yuddhaṃ vā no detu setacchattaṃ vā”ti kosalarañño dūtaṃ pāhesi. So kujjhitvā “kiṃ
atk-s0514a1:2649_2: ahaṃ na rājā”ti “yuddhaṃ dammī”ti senāya purakkhato nikkhami. Dve senā yujjhituṃ
atk-s0514a1:2649_3: ārabhiṃsu. Nandapaṇḍito dvinnampi antare attano nisīdanaṃ ajinacammaṃ mahantaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:2649_4: pasāretvā dvīhipi senāhi khittasare cammeneva sampaṭicchi. Ekasenāyapi koci kaṇḍena
atk-s0514a1:2649_5: viddho nāma natthi, hatthagatānaṃ pana kaṇḍānaṃ khayena dvepi senā nirussāhā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2649_6: Nandapaṇḍito manojarājassa santikaṃ gantvā “mā bhāyi, mahārājā”ti assāsetvā kosalassa
atk-s0514a1:2649_7: santikaṃ gantvā “mahārāja, mā bhāyi, natthi te paripantho, tava rajjaṃ taveva bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:2649_8: kevalaṃ manojarañño vasavattī hohī”ti āha. So tassa saddahitvā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0514a1:2649_9: Atha naṃ manojassa santikaṃ netvā “mahārāja, kosalarājā te vase vattati, imassa rajjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2649_10: imasseva hotū”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ attano vase vattetvā dve senā
atk-s0514a1:2649_11: ādāya aṅgaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā aṅgaṃ gahetvā tato magadharaṭṭhanti etenupāyena sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0514a1:2649_12: rājāno attano vase vattetvā tato tehi parivuto brahmavaḍḍhananagarameva gato. Rajjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2649_13: gaṇhanto panesa sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ upari sattadivasādhikehi sattamāsehi gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:2649_14: So ekekarājadhānito nānappakāraṃ khajjabhojanaṃ āharāpetvā ekasatarājāno gahetvā
atk-s0514a1:2650_0: Nandapaṇḍito “yāva rājā sattāhaṃ issariyasukhaṃ anubhoti, tāvassa attānaṃ na dassessāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:2650_1: uttarakurumhi piṇḍāya caritvā himavante kañcanaguhādvāre sattāhaṃ vasi. Manojopi
atk-s0514a1:2650_2: sattame divase attano mahantaṃ sirivibhavaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ yaso na mayhaṃ mātāpitūhi,
atk-s0514a1:2650_3: na aññehi dinno, nandatāpasaṃ nissāya uppanno, taṃ kho pana me apassantassa ajja
atk-s0514a1:2650_4: sattamo divaso, kahaṃ nu kho me yasadāyako”ti nandapaṇḍitaṃ sari. So tassa anussaraṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2650_5: ñatvā āgantvā purato ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Rājā taṃ disvā cintesi – “ahaṃ imassa tāpasassa
atk-s0514a1:2650_6: devatābhāvaṃ vā manussabhāvaṃ vā na jānāmi, sace esa manusso bhaveyya, sakalajambudīparajjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2650_7: etasseva dassāmi. Atha devo, sakkāramassa karissāmī”ti. So taṃ vīmaṃsanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2653: Manussabhūto iddhimā, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:2654: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabhāvameva kathento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2656: “Nāpi devo na gandhabbo, nāpi sakko purindado;
atk-s0514a1:2658: Tattha bhāradhāti raṭṭhabhāradhāritāya naṃ evaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a1:2659: Taṃ sutvā rājā “manussabhūto kirāyaṃ mayhaṃ evaṃ bahupakāro, mahantena yasena naṃ santappessāmī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:2667: “Tato phītāni raṭṭhāni, vasino te bhavaṃ akā;
atk-s0514a1:2668: Tato ekasataṃ khatye, anuyante bhavaṃ akā.
atk-s0514a1:2674: “Atha vaṅge vā magadhe, mayaṃ bhoto dadāmase;
atk-s0514a1:2675: Atha vā assakāvantī, sumanā damma te mayaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2678: Sace te attho rajjena, anusāsa yadicchasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2679_0: Tattha katarūpamidanti katasabhāvaṃ. Veyyāvaccanti kāyaveyyāvatikakammaṃ. Anovassanti
atk-s0514a1:2679_1: avassaṃ, yathā devo na vassati, tathā katanti attho. Sītacchāyanti sītalaṃ chāyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2679_2: Vasino teti te raṭṭhavāsino amhākaṃ vasavattino. Khatyeti khattiye, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2679_3: pana ayameva pāṭho. Patītāssu mayanti tuṭṭhā mayaṃ. Vada taṃ bhañjamicchasīti bhañjanti
atk-s0514a1:2679_4: ratanassetaṃ nāmaṃ, varaṃ te dadāmi, yaṃ ratanaṃ icchasi, taṃ vadehīti attho. “Hatthiyāna”ntiādīhi
atk-s0514a1:2679_5: sarūpato taṃ taṃ ratanaṃ dasseti. Assakāvantīassakaraṭṭhaṃ vā avantiraṭṭhaṃ vā. Rajjenāti
atk-s0514a1:2679_6: sacepi te sakalajambudīparajjena attho, tampi te datvā ahaṃ phalakāvudhahattho tumhākaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2679_7: rathassa purato gamissāmīti dīpeti. Yadicchasīti etesu mayā vuttappakāresu yaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0514a1:2680: Taṃ sutvā nandapaṇḍito attano adhippāyaṃ āvikaronto āha –
atk-s0514a1:2682: “Na me atthopi rajjena, nagarena dhanena vā;
atk-s0514a1:2683: Athopi janapadena, attho mayhaṃ na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2684: “Sace te mayi sineho atthi, ekaṃ me vacanaṃ karohī”ti vatvā gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2687: Pitā mayhaṃ janettī ca, ubho sammanti assame.
atk-s0514a1:2690: Bhavantaṃ ajjhāvaraṃ katvā, soṇaṃ yācemu saṃvara”nti.
atk-s0514a1:2691_0: Tattha raṭṭheti rajje. Vijiteti āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne. Assamoti himavantāraññe eko assamo
atk-s0514a1:2691_1: atthi. Sammantīti tasmiṃ assame vasanti. Tesāhanti tesu ahaṃ. Kātaveti vattapaṭivattaphalāphalāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2691_2: puññaṃ kātuṃ na labhāmi, bhātā me soṇapaṇḍito nāma mamekasmiṃ aparādhe mā idha vasīti
atk-s0514a1:2691_3: maṃ palāpesi. Ajjhāvaranti adhiāvaraṃ te mayaṃ bhavantaṃ saparivāraṃ katvā soṇapaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2691_4: saṃvaraṃ yācemu, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ yācāmāti attho. “Yācemimaṃ vara”ntipi pāṭho, mayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2691_5: tayā saddhiṃ soṇaṃ yāceyyāma khamāpeyyāma, imaṃ varaṃ tava santikā gaṇhāmīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2694: “Karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, yaṃ maṃ bhaṇasi brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0514a1:2695: Etañca kho no akkhāhi, kīvanto hontu yācakā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2696: Tattha karomīti ahaṃ sakalajambudīparajjaṃ dadamāno ettakaṃ kiṃ na karissāmi, karomīti vadati. Kīvantoti kittakā.
atk-s0514a1:2700: Ime ca khattiyā sabbe, abhijātā yasassino;
atk-s0514a1:2701: Bhavañca rājā manojo, alaṃ hessanti yācakā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2702: Tattha jānapadāti gahapatī. Mahāsālā ca brāhmaṇāti sārappattā brāhmaṇā ca parosatāyeva. Alaṃ hessantīti pariyattā bhavissanti. Yācakāti mamatthāya soṇapaṇḍitassa khamāpakā.
atk-s0514a1:2705: “Hatthī asse ca yojentu, rathaṃ sannayha sārathi;
atk-s0514a1:2707: Assamaṃ taṃ gamissāmi, yattha sammati kosiyo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2708_0: Tattha yojentūti hatthārohā hatthī, assārohā ca asse kappentu. Rathaṃ sannayha sārathīti
atk-s0514a1:2708_1: sammasārathi tvampi rathaṃ sannayha. Ābandhanānīti hatthiassarathesu ābandhitabbāni
atk-s0514a1:2708_2: bhaṇḍāni ca gaṇhatha. Pādāsussārayaddhajeti rathe ṭhapitadhajapādāsu dhaje ussārayantu
atk-s0514a1:2708_3: ussāpentu. Kosiyoti yasmiṃ assame kosiyagotto vasatīti.
atk-s0514a1:2711: Agamā assamaṃ rammaṃ, yattha sammati kosiyo”ti. – ayaṃ abhisambuddhagāthā;
atk-s0514a1:2712_0: Tattha tato cāti, bhikkhave, evaṃ vatvā tato so rājā ekasatakhattiye gahetvā mahatiyā
atk-s0514a1:2712_1: senāya parivuto nandapaṇḍitaṃ purato katvā nagarā nikkhami. Caturaṅgīnīti caturaṅginiyā
atk-s0514a1:2712_2: senāya agamāsi, antaramagge vattamānopi avassaṃ gāmitāya evaṃ vutto. Catuvīsatiakkhobhaṇisaṅkhātena
atk-s0514a1:2712_3: balakāyena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannassa tassa nandapaṇḍito iddhānubhāvena aṭṭhusabhavitthataṃ
atk-s0514a1:2712_4: maggaṃ samaṃ māpetvā ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā senāya
atk-s0514a1:2712_5: parivuto alaṅkatahatthikkhandhe nisīditvā gacchantena raññā saddhiṃ dhammayuttakathaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2713_0: Athassa assamaṃ pāpuṇanadivase soṇapaṇḍito “mama kaniṭṭhassa atirekasattamāsasattadivasādhikāni
atk-s0514a1:2713_1: satta vassāni nikkhantassā”ti āvajjetvā “kahaṃ nu kho so etarahī”ti dibbena cakkhunā
atk-s0514a1:2713_3: khamāpetuṃ āgacchatī”ti disvā cintesi – “imehi rājūhi ceva parisāhi ca mama kaniṭṭhassa
atk-s0514a1:2713_4: bahūni pāṭihāriyāni diṭṭhāni, mamānubhāvaṃ ajānitvā ‘ayaṃ kūṭajaṭilo attano pamāṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2713_5: na jānāti, amhākaṃ ayyena saddhiṃ payojesī’ti maṃ vambhentā kathentā avīciparāyaṇā
atk-s0514a1:2713_6: bhaveyyuṃ, iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ nesaṃ dassessāmī”ti. So caturaṅgulamattena aṃsaṃ aphusantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2713_7: ākāse kājaṃ ṭhapetvā anotattato udakaṃ āharituṃ rañño avidūre ākāsena pāyāsi. Nandapaṇḍito
atk-s0514a1:2713_8: taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā attānaṃ dassetuṃ avisahanto nisinnaṭṭhāneyeva antaradhāyitvā
atk-s0514a1:2713_9: palāyitvā himavantaṃ pāvisi. Manojarājā pana taṃ ramaṇīyena isivesena tathā āgacchantaṃ disvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2717_0: Tattha kādambayoti kadambarukkhamayo. Aṃsaṃ asamphusaṃ etīti aṃsaṃ asamphusanto sayameva
atk-s0514a1:2717_1: āgacchati. Udahārāyāti udakaṃ āharituṃ gacchantassa kassa esa kājo evaṃ eti, ko nāma
atk-s0514a1:2725_0: Tattha sahitabbatoti sahitavato sīlācārasampanno eko tāpaso ahanti vadati. Bharāmīti
atk-s0514a1:2725_1: posemi. Atanditoti analaso hutvā. Pubbe katamanussaranti tehi pubbe kataṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2726: Taṃ sutvā rājā tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ kattukāmo anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2729: Maggaṃ no soṇa akkhāhi, yena gacchemu assama”nti.
atk-s0514a1:2731: Atha mahāsatto attano ānubhāvena assamapadagāmimaggaṃ māpetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2735_0: Tassattho – mahārāja, ayaṃ ekapadiko jaṅghamaggo, iminā gacchatha, yena disābhāgena
atk-s0514a1:2735_1: etaṃ meghavaṇṇaṃ supupphitakoviḷārasañchannaṃ vanaṃ dissati, ettha mama pitā kosiyagotto
atk-s0514a1:2747: Assamā nikkhamitvāna, sadvāramhi upāvisī”ti. – imā abhisambuddhagāthā;
atk-s0514a1:2748_0: Tattha pakkāmīti anotattaṃ agamāsi. Assamaṃ parimajjitvāti, bhikkhave, so isi vegena
atk-s0514a1:2748_1: anotattaṃ gantvā pānīyaṃ ādāya tesu rājūsu assamaṃ asampattesuyeva āgantvā pānīyaghaṭe
atk-s0514a1:2748_2: pānīyamāḷake ṭhapetvā “mahājano pivissatī”ti vanakusumehi vāsetvā sammajjaniṃ ādāya
atk-s0514a1:2748_3: assamaṃ sammajjitvā paṇṇasāladvāre pitu āsanaṃ paññāpetvā pavisitvā pitaraṃ jānāpesīti
atk-s0514a1:2749_0: Bodhisattassa mātā pana tassa pacchato nīcaṭṭhāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Mahāsatto nīcāsane
atk-s0514a1:2749_1: nisīdi. Nandapaṇḍitopi bodhisattassa anotattato pānīyaṃ ādāya assamaṃ āgatakāle rañño
atk-s0514a1:2749_2: santikaṃ āgantvā assamassa avidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsesi. Atha rājā nhatvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0514a1:2749_3: ekasatarājaparivuto nandapaṇḍitaṃ gahetvā mahantena sirisobhaggena bodhisattaṃ khamāpetuṃ
atk-s0514a1:2749_4: assamaṃ pāvisi. Atha naṃ tathā āgacchantaṃ bodhisattassa pitā disvā bodhisattaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0514a1:2749_5: sopissa ācikkhi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:2758: Yuvā kalāpasannaddho, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2761: Mukhañca rucirā bhāti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2770: Samantā parikīrenti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2786_0: Tattha jalantaṃrivāti jalantaṃ viya. Paṭipannānīti etāni tūriyāni kassa purato āgacchantīti
atk-s0514a1:2786_1: attho. Hāsayantāti tosentā. Kañcanapaṭṭenāti, tāta, kassa kañcanamayena vijjuvaṇṇena
atk-s0514a1:2786_2: uṇhīsapaṭṭena nalāṭanto parikkhittoti pucchati. Yuvāti taruṇo. Kalāpasannaddhoti
atk-s0514a1:2786_3: sannaddhasaratūṇīro. Ukkāmukhapahaṭṭhaṃ vāti kammārānaṃ uddhane pahaṭṭhaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2786_5: āvaraṇaṃ. Aṅgaṃ pariggayhāti aṅgaṃ pariggahetvā, sarīraṃ parikkhipitvāti attho. Vālabījanimuttamanti
atk-s0514a1:2786_6: vālabījaniṃ uttamaṃ. Carantīti sañcaranti. Chattānīti ājānīyapiṭṭhe nisinnānaṃ dhāritachattāni.
atk-s0514a1:2786_7: Parikīrentīti tassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu parikīrayanti. Caturaṅginīti etehi hatthiādīhi
atk-s0514a1:2786_8: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā. Akkhobhaṇīti khobhetuṃ na sakkā. Sāgarassevāti sāgarassa
atk-s0514a1:2786_9: ūmiyo viya apariyantā. Rājābhirājāti ekasatarājūnaṃ pūjito, tesaṃ vā adhiko rājāti
atk-s0514a1:2786_10: rājābhirājā. Jayataṃ patīti jayappattānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ jeṭṭhako. Ajjhāvaranti mamaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2791: Tattha isīnaṃ ajjhupāgamunti, bhikkhave, sabbepi te rājāno surabhicandanena anulittā uttamakāsikavatthadhārino sirasi patiṭṭhāpitaañjalī hutvā isīnaṃ santikaṃ upagatā.
atk-s0514a1:2792: Tato manojo rājā taṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2794: “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:2795: Kacci uñchena yāpetha, kacci mūlaphalā bahū.
atk-s0514a1:2798: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, kacci hiṃsā na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2799: Tato paraṃ ubhinnaṃ tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavasena kathitagāthā honti –
atk-s0514a1:2802: Atho uñchena yāpema, atho mūlaphalā bahū.
atk-s0514a1:2805: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, hiṃsā mayhaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0514a1:2814: Phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja rāja varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2817: Tato piva mahārāja, sace tvaṃ abhikaṅkhasi.
atk-s0514a1:2823: Suṇātu bhavaṃ vacanaṃ, nandassa parisāya cā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2824_0: Imā yebhuyyena pākaṭasambandhāyeva, yaṃ panettha apākaṭaṃ, tadeva vakkhāma. Pavedayāti
atk-s0514a1:2824_1: yaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne tava abhirucitaṃ atthi, taṃ no kathehīti vadati. Khuddakappānīti
atk-s0514a1:2824_2: etāni nānārukkhaphalāni khuddakamadhupaṭibhāgāni madhurāni. Varaṃ varanti ito uttamuttamaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2824_3: gahetvā bhuñja. Girigabbharāti anotattato. Sabbassa agghiyanti yena mayaṃ āpucchitā,
atk-s0514a1:2824_4: taṃ amhehi paṭiggahitaṃ nāma tumhehi ca dinnameva nāma, ettāvatā imassa janassa sabbassa
atk-s0514a1:2824_5: agghiyaṃ tumhehi kataṃ. Nandassāpīti amhākaṃ tāva sabbaṃ kataṃ, idāni pana nandapaṇḍito
atk-s0514a1:2824_6: kiñci vattukāmo, tassapi tāva vacanaṃ suṇātha. Ajjhāvaramhāti mayañhi na aññena kammena
atk-s0514a1:2824_7: āgatā, nandassa pana parisā hutvā tumhākaṃ khamāpanatthāya āgatāti vadati. Bhavanti
atk-s0514a1:2825: Evaṃ vutte nandapaṇḍito uṭṭhāyāsanā mātāpitaro ca bhātarañca vanditvā sakaparisāya saddhiṃ sallapanto āha –
atk-s0514a1:2828: Ime ca khattiyā sabbe, abhijātā yasassino;
atk-s0514a1:2829: Bhavañca rājā manojo, anumaññantu me vaco.
atk-s0514a1:2831: “Ye ca santi samītāro, yakkhāni idha massame;
atk-s0514a1:2835: So tyāhaṃ dakkhiṇā bāhu, tava kosiya sammato.
atk-s0514a1:2838: Vīra puññamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ, mā maṃ kosiya vāraya.
atk-s0514a1:2845: Maggo saggassa lokassa, yathā jānāsi tvaṃ ise.
atk-s0514a1:2848: Taṃ maṃ puññā nivāreti, ariyamaggāvaro naro”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2849_0: Tattha anumaññantūti anubujjhantu, sādhukaṃ sutvā paccakkhaṃ karontūti attho. Samītāroti
atk-s0514a1:2849_1: samāgatā. Araññe bhūtabhabyānīti asmiṃ himavantāraññe yāni bhūtāni ceva vuḍḍhimariyādappattāni
atk-s0514a1:2849_2: bhabyāni ca taruṇadevatāni, tānipi sabbāni mama vacanaṃ suṇantūti attho. “Namo katvānā”ti
atk-s0514a1:2849_3: idaṃ so parisāya saññaṃ datvā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nibbattadevatānaṃ namakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:2849_4: āha. Tassattho – ajja bahūhi devatāhi mama bhātikassa dhammakathāsavanatthaṃ āgatāhi
atk-s0514a1:2849_5: bhavitabbaṃ, ahaṃ vo namakkāro, tumhepi mayhaṃ sahāyā hothāti. So devatānaṃ añjaliṃ
atk-s0514a1:2849_6: paggahetvā parisaṃ jānāpetvā “isiṃ vakkhāmī”tiādimāha. Tattha isinti soṇapaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2849_7: sandhāya vadati. Sammatoti bhātaro nāma aṅgasamā honti, tasmā so te ahaṃ dakkhiṇā
atk-s0514a1:2849_8: bāhūti sammato. Tena me khamituṃ arahathāti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a1:2850_0: Vīrāti vīriyavanta mahāparakkama. Puññamidaṃ ṭhānanti idaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
atk-s0514a1:2850_1: puññaṃ saggasaṃvattanikakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontaṃ maṃ mā vārayāti vadati. Sabbhi hetanti
atk-s0514a1:2850_2: etañhi mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma paṇḍitehi upaññātaṃ upagantvā ñātañceva vaṇṇitañca.
atk-s0514a1:2850_3: Mametaṃ upanissajāti idaṃ tvaṃ mayhaṃ nissaja vissajjehi dehi. Uṭṭhānapāricariyāyāti
atk-s0514a1:2850_4: uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca. Katanti dīgharattaṃ tayā kusalaṃ kataṃ. Puññānīti idāni
atk-s0514a1:2850_5: ahaṃ mātāpitūsu puññāni kattukāmo. Mama lokadadoti tassa mama tvaṃ saggalokadado
atk-s0514a1:2850_6: hoti, ahañhi tesaṃ vattaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā devaloke aparimāṇaṃ yasaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2850_7: tassa me tvaṃ dāyako hohīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:2851_0: Tathevāti yathā tvaṃ jānāsi, tatheva aññepi manujā imissaṃ parisāyaṃ santi, te nānappakāre
atk-s0514a1:2851_1: dhamme idaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ vadanti. Kinti? Maggo saggassa
atk-s0514a1:2851_2: lokassāti. Sukhāvahanti uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca mātāpitūnaṃ sukhāvahaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0514a1:2851_3: manti taṃ maṃ evaṃ sammāpaṭipannampi bhātā soṇapaṇḍito tamhā puññā abhivāreti. Ariyamaggāvaroti
atk-s0514a1:2851_4: so evaṃ vārento ayaṃ naro mama piyadassanatāya ariyasaṅkhātassa vedalokassa maggāvaraṇo nāma hotīti.
atk-s0514a1:2852: Evaṃ nandapaṇḍitena vutte mahāsatto “imassa tāva tumhehi vacanaṃ sutaṃ, idāni mamapi suṇāthā”ti sāvento āha –
atk-s0514a1:2859: Cārittena ca sampannā, na te gacchanti duggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2861: “Mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, bhaginī ñāti bandhavā;
atk-s0514a1:2862: Sabbe jeṭṭhassa te bhārā, evaṃ jānāhi bhāradha.
atk-s0514a1:2866_0: Tattha bhāturajjhāvarāti mama bhātu parisā hutvā āgatā bhonto sabbepi rājāno mamapi
atk-s0514a1:2866_1: tāva vacanaṃ suṇantu. Parihāpayanti parihāpento. Dhammassāti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammassa
atk-s0514a1:2866_2: paveṇīdhammassa. Kusalāti chekā. Cārittena cāti ācārasīlena sampannā. Bhārāti sabbe
atk-s0514a1:2866_3: ete jeṭṭhena vahitabbā paṭijaggitabbāti tassa bhārā nāma. Nāviko viyāti yathā nāvāya
atk-s0514a1:2866_4: garuṃ bhāraṃ ādiyitvā samuddamajjhe nāvaṃ sotthinā netuṃ nāviko ussaheti vāyamati,
atk-s0514a1:2866_5: saha nāvāya sabbabhaṇḍañca jano ca tasseva bhāro hoti, tathā mameva sabbe ñātakā
atk-s0514a1:2866_6: bhāroti, ahañca te ussahāmi paṭijaggituṃ sakkomi, tañca jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammaṃ nappamajjāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2866_7: na kevalañca etesaññeva, sakalassapi lokassa jeṭṭho ca asmi, tasmā ahameva saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:2867_0: Taṃ sutvā sabbepi te rājāno attamanā hutvā “jeṭṭhabhātikassa kira avasesā bhārāti
atk-s0514a1:2867_1: ajja amhehi ñāta”nti nandapaṇḍitaṃ pahāya mahāsattaṃ sannissitā hutvā tassa thutiṃ
atk-s0514a1:2870: Evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayi.
atk-s0514a1:2874: Evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2875_0: Tattha adhigamāti mayaṃ ito pubbe jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammapaṭicchādake tame vattamānā
atk-s0514a1:2875_1: na jānāma, ajja jātavedato jālaṃva ñāṇaṃ adhigatā. Evameva noti yathā mahandhakāre
atk-s0514a1:2875_2: pabbatamatthake jalito jātavedo samantā ālokaṃ pharanto rūpāni dasseti, tathā no
atk-s0514a1:2875_3: bhavaṃ kosiyagotto dhammaṃ pavidaṃsayīti attho. Vāsudevoti vasudevo vasujotano, dhanapakāsanoti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2876_0: Iti mahāsatto ettakaṃ kālaṃ nandapaṇḍitassa pāṭihāriyāni disvā tasmiṃ pasannacitte
atk-s0514a1:2876_1: te rājāno ñāṇabalena tasmiṃ pasādaṃ bhinditvā attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā sabbeva attano
atk-s0514a1:2876_2: mukhaṃ ullokite akāsi. Atha nandapaṇḍito “bhātā me paṇḍito byatto dhammakathiko sabbepime
atk-s0514a1:2876_3: rājāno bhinditvā attano pakkhe kari, ṭhapetvā imaṃ añño mayhaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0514a1:2880_0: Tassatthā – sace tumhe mama evaṃ yācamānassa khamāpanatthāya paggahitaṃ añjaliṃ nāvabujjhatha
atk-s0514a1:2880_1: na paṭiggaṇhatha, tumheva mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahatha, ahaṃ pana tumhākaṃ baddhacaro
atk-s0514a1:2880_2: veyyāvaccakaro hessaṃ, rattindivaṃ analasabhāvena vuṭṭhito paricārako ahaṃ tumhe paṭijaggissāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:2881_0: Mahāsattassa pakatiyāpi nandapaṇḍite doso vā veraṃ vā natthi, atithaddhaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2881_1: kathentassa panassa mānahāpanatthaṃ niggahavasena tathā katvā idānissa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a1:2881_2: tuṭṭhacitto tasmiṃ pasādaṃ uppādetvā “idāni te khamāmi, mātāpitaro ca paṭijaggituṃ
atk-s0514a1:2884: Ariyo ariyasamācāro, bāḷhaṃ tvaṃ mama ruccasi.
atk-s0514a1:2887: Nāyaṃ bhāro bhāramato, ahu mayhaṃ kudācanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2893: Nandaṃ vo varatha eko, kaṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2894_0: Tattha ariyoti sundaro. Ariyasamācāroti sundarasamācāropi jāto. Bāḷhanti idāni tvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2894_1: mama ativiya ruccasi. Suṇāthāti amma tātā tumhe mama vacanaṃ suṇātha. Nāyaṃ bhāroti
atk-s0514a1:2894_2: ayaṃ tumhākaṃ paṭijagganabhāro na kadāci mama bhāramato ahu. Taṃ manti taṃ bhāroti
atk-s0514a1:2894_3: amaññitvāva maṃ tumhe upaṭṭhitaṃ samānaṃ. Upaṭṭhānāya yācatīti tumhe upaṭṭhātuṃ maṃ
atk-s0514a1:2894_4: yācati. Yo ve icchatīti mayhañhi tvaṃ me mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā upaṭṭhahāti vattuṃ
atk-s0514a1:2894_5: na yuttaṃ, tumhākaṃ pana santānaṃ brahmacārīnaṃ yo eko icchati, taṃ vadāmi kāmena
atk-s0514a1:2894_6: nandaṃ vo varatha, taṃ mama kaniṭṭhaṃ nandaṃ rocetha, tumhesu kaṃ esa upaṭṭhātu,
atk-s0514a1:2895_0: Athassa mātā āsanā vuṭṭhāya, “tāta soṇapaṇḍita, cirappavuttho te kaniṭṭho, evaṃ cirāgatampi
atk-s0514a1:2895_1: taṃ yācituṃ na visahāmi, mayañhi taṃ nissitā, idāni pana tayā anuññātā ahaṃ etaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2895_2: brahmacārinaṃ bāhāhi upagūhitvā sīse upasiṅghāyituṃ labheyya”nti imamatthaṃ pakāsentī gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2897: “Tayā tāta anuññātā, soṇa taṃ nissitā mayaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:2899_0: Atha mahāsatto “tena hi, amma, anujānāmi, tvaṃ gaccha, puttaṃ nandaṃ āliṅgitvā sīse
atk-s0514a1:2899_1: ghāyitvā cumbitvā tava hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpehī”ti āha. Sā tassa santikaṃ gantvā nandapaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2899_2: parisamajjheyeva āliṅgitvā sīsaṃ ghāyitvā cumbitvā hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpetvā mahāsattena
atk-s0514a1:2902: Cirassaṃ nandaṃ disvāna, hadayaṃ me pavedhati.
atk-s0514a1:2905: Udaggā sumanā homi, nando no āgato ayaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2911: Bhattucca mayhañca piyo, nando no pāvisī gharaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2913: “Pitupi nando suppiyo, yaṃ nando nappavase gharā;
atk-s0514a1:2914: Labhatū tāta nando taṃ, maṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2915_0: Tattha māluteritanti yathā vātāhataṃ assatthassa pallavaṃ kampati, evaṃ cirassaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2915_1: nandaṃ disvā ajja mama hadayaṃ kampatīti vadati. Suttāti, tāta soṇa, yadāhaṃ suttāpi
atk-s0514a1:2915_2: supine nandaṃ āgataṃ passāmi, tadāpi udaggā homi. Bhattuccāti sāmikassa ca me mayhañca
atk-s0514a1:2915_3: piyo. Nando no pāvisī gharanti, tāta, putto no nando paṇṇasālaṃ pavisatu. Yanti yasmā
atk-s0514a1:2915_4: pitupi suṭṭhu piyo, tasmā puna imamhā gharā na vippavaseyya. Nando tanti, tāta, nando
atk-s0514a1:2915_5: yaṃ icchati, taṃ labhatu. Maṃ nandoti, tāta soṇa, tava pitaraṃ tvaṃ upaṭṭhaha, maṃ nando upaṭṭhātu.
atk-s0514a1:2916_0: Mahāsatto “evaṃ hotū”ti mātu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “nanda, tayā jeṭṭhakakoṭṭhāso
atk-s0514a1:2916_1: laddho, mātā nāma atiguṇakārikā, appamatto hutvā paṭijaggeyyāsī”ti ovaditvā mātu
atk-s0514a1:2918: “Anukampikā patiṭṭhā ca, pubbe rasadadī ca no;
atk-s0514a1:2919: Maggo saggassa lokassa, mātā taṃ varate ise.
atk-s0514a1:2922: Maggo saggassa lokassa, mātā taṃ varate ise”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2923_0: Tattha anukampikāti muduhadayā. Pubbe rasadadīti paṭhamameva attano khīrasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0514a1:2923_1: rasassa dāyikā. Mātā tanti mama mātā maṃ na icchati, taṃ varati icchati. Gottīti
atk-s0514a1:2924_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto dvīhi gāthāhi mātu guṇaṃ kathetvā punāgantvā tassā āsane nisinnakāle
atk-s0514a1:2924_1: “nanda, tvaṃ dukkarakārikaṃ mātaraṃ labhasi, ubhopi mayaṃ mātarā dukkhena saṃvaḍḍhitā,
atk-s0514a1:2924_2: taṃ idāni tvaṃ appamatto paṭijaggāhi, amadhurāni phalāphalāni mā khādāpehī”ti vatvā
atk-s0514a1:2930: Tena dohaḷinī hoti, suhadā tena vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2933: Tena sā janayantīti, janetti tena vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2936: Rodantaṃ puttaṃ toseti, tosentī tena vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2942: Ubhayampetassa gopeti, api puttassa no siyā.
atk-s0514a1:2944: “Evaṃ putta aduṃ putta, iti mātā vihaññati;
atk-s0514a1:2946: Sāyaṃ puttaṃ anāyantaṃ, iti mātā vihaññati.
atk-s0514a1:2955: Mātaraṃ aparicaritvāna, kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati.
atk-s0514a1:2958: Pitaraṃ aparicaritvāna, kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati.
atk-s0514a1:2966: “Dānañca piyavācā ca, atthacariyā ca yā idha;
atk-s0514a1:2967: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:2968: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
atk-s0514a1:2970: “Ete ca saṅgahā nāssu, na mātā puttakāraṇā;
atk-s0514a1:2971: Labhetha mānaṃ pūjaṃ vā, pitā vā puttakāraṇā.
atk-s0514a1:2974: Tasmā mahattaṃ papponti, pāsaṃsā ca bhavanti te.
atk-s0514a1:2979: “Tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a1:2980: Annena atho pānena, vatthena sayanena ca;
atk-s0514a1:2984: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2985_0: Tattha puttaphalanti puttasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ. Devatāya namassatīti “putto me uppajjatū”ti
atk-s0514a1:2985_1: devatāya namakkāraṃ karoti āyācati. Pucchatīti “katarena nakkhattena jāto putto dīghāyuko
atk-s0514a1:2985_2: hoti, katarena appāyuko”ti evaṃ nakkhattāni ca pucchati. Utusaṃvaccharāni cāti “channaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2985_3: utūnaṃ katarasmiṃ utumhi jāto dīghāyuko hoti, katarasmiṃ utumhi appāyuko, kativassāya
atk-s0514a1:2985_4: vā mātuyā jāto putto dīghāyuko hoti, kativassāya appāyuko”ti evaṃ utusaṃvaccharāni
atk-s0514a1:2985_5: ca pucchati. Utumhi nhātāyāti pupphe uppanne utumhi nhātāya. Vokkamoti tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā
atk-s0514a1:2985_6: gabbhāvakkanti hoti, kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāti. Tenāti tena gabbhena sā dohaḷinī
atk-s0514a1:2985_7: hoti. Tenāti tadā tassā kucchimhi nibbattapajāya sineho uppajjati, tena kāraṇena
atk-s0514a1:2985_8: “suhadā”ti vuccati. Tenāti tena kāraṇena sā “janayantī”ti ca “janettī”ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2986_0: Aṅgapāvuraṇena cāti thanantare nipajjāpetvā sarīrasamphassaṃ pharāpentī aṅgasaṅkhāteneva
atk-s0514a1:2986_1: pāvuraṇena. Tosentīti saññāpentī hāsentī. Mamaṃ katvā udikkhatīti “puttassa me upari
atk-s0514a1:2986_2: vāto paharati, ātapo pharatī”ti evaṃ mamaṃkāraṃ katvā siniddhena hadayena udikkhati.
atk-s0514a1:2986_3: Ubhayampetassāti ubhayampi etaṃ dhanaṃ etassa puttassa atthāya aññesaṃ adassetvā
atk-s0514a1:2986_4: sāragabbhādīsu mātā gopeti. Evaṃ putta, aduṃ puttāti “andhabāla putta, evaṃ rājakulādīsu
atk-s0514a1:2986_5: appamatto hohi, aduñca kammaṃ mā karohī”ti sikkhāpentī iti mātā vihaññati kilamati.
atk-s0514a1:2986_6: Pattayobbaneti putte pattayobbane taṃ puttaṃ nisīthe paradāresu pamattaṃ sāyaṃ anāgacchantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2986_7: ñatvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi maggaṃ olokentī vihaññati kilamati.
atk-s0514a1:2987_0: Kicchā bhatoti kicchena bhato paṭijaggito. Micchā caritvānāti mātaraṃ apaṭijaggitvā.
atk-s0514a1:2987_1: Dhanāpīti dhanampi, ayameva vā pāṭho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – dhanakāmānaṃ uppannaṃ dhanampi
atk-s0514a1:2987_2: mātaraṃ apaṭijaggantānaṃ nassatīti me sutanti. Kicchaṃ vā soti iti dhanaṃ vā tassa
atk-s0514a1:2987_3: nassati, dukkhaṃ vāso puriso nigacchati. Labbhametanti etaṃ idhaloke ca paraloke
atk-s0514a1:2987_4: ca ānandādisukhaṃ mātaraṃ paricaritvā vijānato paṇḍitassa labbhaṃ, sakkā laddhuṃ tādisenāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2988_0: Dānañcāti mātāpitūnaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, piyavacanaṃ bhaṇitabbaṃ, uppannakiccasādhanavasena
atk-s0514a1:2988_1: attho caritabbo. Dhammesūti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammesu tattha tattha parisamajjhe vā
atk-s0514a1:2988_2: rahogatānaṃ vā abhivādanādivasena samānattatā kātabbā, na raho abhivādanādīni katvā
atk-s0514a1:2988_3: parisati na kātabbāni, sabbattha samāneneva bhavitabbaṃ. Ete ca saṅgahā nāssūti sace
atk-s0514a1:2988_4: ete cattāro saṅgahā na bhaveyyuṃ. Sammapekkhantīti sammā nayena kāraṇena pekkhanti.
atk-s0514a1:2988_5: Mahattanti seṭṭhattaṃ. Brahmāti puttānaṃ brahmasamā uttamā seṭṭhā. Pubbācariyāti
atk-s0514a1:2988_6: paṭhamācariyā. Āhuneyyāti āhunapaṭiggāhakā yassa kassaci sakkārassa anucchavikā.
atk-s0514a1:2988_7: Annena athoti annena ceva attho pānena ca. Peccāti kālakiriyāya pariyosāne ito gantvā sagge pamodatīti.
atk-s0514a1:2989_0: Evaṃ mahasatto sineruṃ pavaṭṭento viya dhammadesanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ sutvā sabbepi
atk-s0514a1:2989_1: te rājāno balakāyā ca pasīdiṃsu. Atha ne pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “dānādīsu appamattā
atk-s0514a1:2989_2: hothā”ti ovaditvā uyyojesi. Sabbepi dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā āyupariyosāne devanagaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:2989_3: pūrayiṃsu. Soṇapaṇḍitanandapaṇḍitāpi yāvatāyukaṃ mātāpitaro paricaritvā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2990_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0514a1:2990_1: mātuposakabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā mātāpitaro māhārājakulāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2990_2: nandapaṇḍito ānando, manojarājā sāriputto, ekasatarājāno asītimahātherā ceva aññataratherā
atk-s0514a1:2990_3: ca, catuvīsati akkhobhaṇiyo buddhaparisā, soṇapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0514a1:2994: Atha soṇasunandavaro ca puna, abhivāsitasattatimamhi suteti.
atk-s0514a1:2999_0: Sumukhāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto āyasmato ānandassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0514a1:2999_1: kathesi. Devadattena hi tathāgataṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ payojitesu dhanuggahesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2999_2: pesitena āgantvā “nāhaṃ, bhante, sakkomi taṃ bhagavantaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ, mahiddhiko
atk-s0514a1:2999_3: so bhagavā mahānubhāvo”ti vutte devadatto “alaṃ, āvuso, mā tvaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā
atk-s0514a1:2999_4: voropehi, ahameva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti vatvā tathāgate gijjhakūṭapabbatassa
atk-s0514a1:2999_5: pacchimachāyāya caṅkamante sayaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā yantavegena mahatiṃ
atk-s0514a1:2999_6: silaṃ pavijjhi, “imāya silāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti. Tadā dve pabbatakūṭā
atk-s0514a1:2999_7: samāgantvā taṃ silaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu. Tato papaṭikā uppatitvā bhagavato pādaṃ paharitvā
atk-s0514a1:2999_8: ruhiraṃ uppādesi, balavavedanā pavattiṃsu. Jīvako tathāgatassa pādaṃ satthakena phāletvā
atk-s0514a1:2999_9: duṭṭhalohitaṃ vametvā pūtimaṃsaṃ apanetvā dhovitvā bhesajjaṃ ālimpitvā nirogamakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2999_10: Satthā purimasadisameva bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mahatiyā buddhalīlāya vicari.
atk-s0514a1:3000_0: Atha naṃ disvā devadatto cintesi – “samaṇassa gotamassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ sarīraṃ
atk-s0514a1:3000_1: disvā koci manussabhūto upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkoti, rañño kho pana nāḷāgiri nāma hatthī
atk-s0514a1:3000_2: caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe na jānāti, so taṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3000_3: pāpessatī”ti. So gantvā rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā hatthācariyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3000_4: pakkosāpetvā “samma, sve nāḷāgiriṃ mattaṃ katvā pātova samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3000_5: vissajjehī”ti āha. Devadattopi naṃ “aññesu divasesu hatthī kittakaṃ suraṃ pivatī”ti
atk-s0514a1:3000_6: pucchitvā “aṭṭha ghaṭe, bhante”ti vutte “tena hi sve tvaṃ taṃ soḷasa ghaṭe pāyetvā
atk-s0514a1:3000_7: samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ abhimukhaṃ kareyyāsī”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0514a1:3000_8: Rājā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi – “sve nāḷāgiriṃ mattaṃ katvā nagare vissajjessati, nāgarā
atk-s0514a1:3000_9: pātova sabbakiccāni katvā antaravīthiṃ mā paṭipajjiṃsū”ti. Devadattopi rājanivesanā
atk-s0514a1:3000_10: oruyha hatthisālaṃ gantvā hatthigopake āmantetvā “mayaṃ bhaṇe uccaṭṭhāniyaṃ nīcaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0514a1:3000_11: nīcaṭṭhāniyaṃ vā uccaṭṭhāne kātuṃ samatthā, sace vo yasena attho, sve pātova nāḷāgiriṃ
atk-s0514a1:3000_12: tikhiṇasurāya soḷasa ghaṭe pāyetvā samaṇassa gotamassa āgamanavelāya tuttatomarehi
atk-s0514a1:3000_13: vijjhitvā kujjhāpetvā hatthisālaṃ bhindāpetvā samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3000_14: abhimukhaṃ katvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpethā”ti āha. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3001_0: Sā pavatti sakalanagare vitthārikā ahosi. Buddhadhammasaṅghamāmakā upāsakā taṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a1:3001_1: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, devadatto raññā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā sve tumhehi
atk-s0514a1:3001_2: paṭipannavīthiyaṃ nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjāpessati, sve piṇḍāya apavisitvā idheva hotha,
atk-s0514a1:3001_3: mayaṃ vihāreyeva buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3001_4: Satthāpi “sve piṇḍāya na pavisissāmī”ti avatvāva “ahaṃ sve nāḷāgiriṃ dametvā pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3001_5: katvā titthiye madditvā rājagahe piṇḍāya acaritvāva bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nagarā
atk-s0514a1:3001_6: nikkhamitvā veḷuvanameva āgamissāmi, rājagahavāsinopi bahūni bhattabhājanāni gahetvā
atk-s0514a1:3001_7: veḷuvanameva āgamissanti, sve vihāreyeva bhattaggaṃ bhavissatī”ti iminā kāraṇena
atk-s0514a1:3001_8: tesaṃ adhivāsesi. Te tathāgatassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā bhattabhājanāni āharitvā “vihāreyeva
atk-s0514a1:3002_0: Satthāpi paṭhamayāme dhammaṃ desetvā majjhimayāme devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā pacchimayāmassa
atk-s0514a1:3002_1: paṭhamakoṭṭhāse sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā dutiyakoṭṭhāse phalasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā tatiyakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0514a1:3002_2: mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya bodhaneyyabandhave olokento nāḷāgiridamane
atk-s0514a1:3002_3: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā katasarīrapaṭijaggano
atk-s0514a1:3002_4: hutvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantetvā, “ānanda, ajja rājagahaparivattakesu aṭṭhārasasu
atk-s0514a1:3002_5: mahāvihāresu sabbesampi bhikkhūnaṃ mayāsaddhiṃ rājagahaṃ pavisituṃ ārocehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:3002_6: Thero tathā akāsi. Sabbepi bhikkhū veḷuvane sannipatiṃsu. Satthā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0514a1:3002_7: rājagahaṃ pāvisi. Atha hatthimeṇḍā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu, mahanto samāgamo
atk-s0514a1:3002_8: ahosi. Saddhāsampannā manussā “ajja kira buddhanāgassa tiracchānanāgena saṅgāmo bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:3002_10: abhiruhitvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Asaddhā pana micchādiṭṭhikā “ayaṃ nāḷāgiri caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako
atk-s0514a1:3002_11: buddhādīnaṃ guṇaṃ na jānāti, so ajja samaṇassa gotamassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ viddhaṃsetvā
atk-s0514a1:3002_12: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati, ajja paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ passissāmā”ti pāsādādīsu aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3003_0: Hatthīpi bhagavantaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā manusse tāsento gehāni viddhaṃsento sakaṭāni
atk-s0514a1:3003_1: saṃcuṇṇento soṇḍaṃ ussāpetvā pahaṭṭhakaṇṇavālo pabbato viya ajjhottharanto yena bhagavā
atk-s0514a1:3003_2: tenābhidhāvi. Taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ – “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0514a1:3003_3: nāḷāgiri caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako imaṃ racchaṃ paṭipanno, na kho panāyaṃ buddhādiguṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3003_4: jānāti, paṭikkamatu, bhante, bhagavā, paṭikkamatu sugato”ti. Mā, bhikkhave, bhāyittha,
atk-s0514a1:3003_5: paṭibalo ahaṃ nāḷāgiriṃ dametunti. Athāyasmā sāriputto satthāraṃ yāci – “bhante,
atk-s0514a1:3003_6: pitu uppannakiccaṃ nāma jeṭṭhaputtassa bhāro, ahameva taṃ damemī”ti. Atha naṃ satthā,
atk-s0514a1:3003_7: “sāriputta, buddhabalaṃ nāma aññaṃ, sāvakabalaṃ aññaṃ, tiṭṭha tva”nti paṭibāhi. Evaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3003_8: yebhuyyena asīti mahātherā yāciṃsu. Satthā sabbepi paṭibāhi. Atha āyasmā ānando satthari
atk-s0514a1:3003_9: balavasinehena adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “ayaṃ hatthī paṭhamaṃ maṃ māretū”ti tathāgatassatthāya
atk-s0514a1:3003_10: jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā gantvā satthu purato aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā “apehi, ānanda,
atk-s0514a1:3003_11: mā me purato aṭṭhāsī”ti āha. “Bhante, ayaṃ hatthī caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako kappuṭṭhānaggisadiso
atk-s0514a1:3003_12: paṭhamaṃ maṃ māretvā pacchā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchatū”ti thero avaca. Yāvatatiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3003_13: vuccamānopi tatheva aṭṭhāsi na paṭikkami. Atha naṃ bhagavā iddhibalena paṭikkamāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:3004_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekā itthī nāḷāgiriṃ disvā maraṇabhayabhītā palāyamānā aṅkena gahitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3004_1: dārakaṃ hatthino ca tathāgatassa ca antare chaḍḍetvā palāyi. Hatthī taṃ anubandhitvā
atk-s0514a1:3004_2: nivattitvā dārakassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Tadā dārako mahāravaṃ ravi. Satthā nāḷāgiriṃ
atk-s0514a1:3004_3: odissakamettāya pharitvā sumadhuraṃ brahmassaraṃ nicchāretvā “ambho nāḷāgiri taṃ
atk-s0514a1:3004_4: soḷasa surāghaṭe pāyetvā mattaṃ karontā na ‘aññaṃ gaṇhissatī’ti kariṃsu, ‘maṃ gaṇhissatī’ti
atk-s0514a1:3004_5: pana kariṃsu, mā akāraṇena jaṅghāyo kilamento vicari, ito ehī”ti pakkosi. So satthu
atk-s0514a1:3004_6: vacanaṃ sutvā akkhīni ummīletvā bhagavato rūpasiriṃ oloketvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego buddhatejena
atk-s0514a1:3004_7: pacchinnasurāmado soṇḍaṃ olambento kaṇṇe cālento āgantvā tathāgatassa pādesu pati.
atk-s0514a1:3004_8: Atha naṃ satthā, “nāḷāgiri, tvaṃ tiracchānahatthī, ahaṃ buddhavāraṇo, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:3004_9: mā caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako bhava, sabbasattesu mettacittaṃ paṭilabhā”ti vatvā
atk-s0514a1:3005: “Mā kuñjara nāgamāsado, dukkho hi kuñjara nāgamāsado;
atk-s0514a1:3006: Na hi nāgahatassa kuñjara, sugati hoti ito paraṃ yato.
atk-s0514a1:3007: “Mā ca mado mā ca pamādo, na hi pamattā sugatiṃ vajanti te;
atk-s0514a1:3008: Tvaññeva tathā karissasi, yena tvaṃ sugatiṃ gamissasī”ti. –
atk-s0514a1:3010_0: Tassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi. Sace kira tiracchānagato nābhavissā,
atk-s0514a1:3010_1: sotāpattiphalaṃ adhigamissā. Manussā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā unnadiṃsu apphoṭiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:3010_2: sañjātasomanassā nānābharaṇāni khipiṃsu, tāni hatthissa sarīraṃ paṭicchādayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3010_3: Tato paṭṭhāya nāḷāgiri dhanapālako nāma jāto. Tasmiṃ kho pana dhanapālakasamāgame
atk-s0514a1:3010_4: caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amataṃ piviṃsu. Satthā dhanapālakaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:3010_5: So soṇḍāya bhagavato pāde paṃsūni gahetvā upari muddhani ākiritvā paṭikuṭitova paṭikkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:3010_6: dassanūpacāre ṭhito dasabalaṃ vanditvā nivattitvā hatthisālaṃ pāvisi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:3010_7: dantasudanto hutvā na kañci viheṭheti. Satthā nipphannamanoratho “yehi yaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3010_8: khittaṃ, tesaññeva taṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya “ajja mayā mahantaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3010_9: imasmiṃ nagare piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ appaṭirūpa”nti titthiye madditvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0514a1:3010_10: jayappatto viya khattiyo nagarā nikkhamitvā veḷuvanameva gato. Nagaravāsino bahuṃ
atk-s0514a1:3010_11: annapānakhādanīyaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3011_0: Taṃ divasaṃ sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhaṃ pūretvā sannisinnā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0514a1:3011_1: – “āvuso, āyasmatā ānandena tathāgatassatthāya attano jīvitaṃ pariccajantena dukkaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:3011_2: kataṃ, nāḷāgiriṃ disvā satthārā tikkhattuṃ paṭibāhiyamānopi nāpagato, aho dukkarakārako,
atk-s0514a1:3011_3: āvuso, āyasmā ānando”ti. Satthā “ānandassa guṇakathā pavattati, gantabbaṃ mayā etthā”ti
atk-s0514a1:3011_4: gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0514a1:3011_5: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ānando tiracchānayoniyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3011_6: nibbattopi mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:3012_0: Atīte mahiṃsakaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare sāgalo nāma rājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā
atk-s0514a1:3012_1: nagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ nesādagāmake aññataro nesādo pāsehi sakuṇe bandhitvā nagare
atk-s0514a1:3012_2: vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappesi. Nagarato ca avidūre āvaṭṭato dvādasayojano mānusiyo nāma
atk-s0514a1:3012_3: padumasaro ahosi pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchanno. Tattha nānappakāro sakuṇasaṅgho otari.
atk-s0514a1:3012_4: So nesādo tattha aniyāmena pāse oḍḍesi. Tasmiṃ kāle dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā channavutihaṃsasahassaparivāro
atk-s0514a1:3012_5: cittakūṭapabbate suvaṇṇaguhāyaṃ vasati, sumukho nāmassa senāpati ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3012_6: tato haṃsayūthā katipayā suvaṇṇahaṃsā mānusiyaṃ saraṃ gantvā pahūtagocare tasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:3012_7: yathāsukhaṃ vicaritvā suhitā cittakūṭaṃ āgantvā dhataraṭṭhassa ārocesuṃ – “mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:3012_8: manussapathe mānusiyo nāma padumasaro sampannagocaro, tattha gocaraṃ gaṇhituṃ gacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3012_9: So “manussapatho nāma sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo, mā vo ruccitthā”ti paṭikkhipitvāpi tehi
atk-s0514a1:3012_10: punappunaṃ vuccamāno “sace tumhākaṃ ruccati, gacchāmā”ti saparivāro taṃ saraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3012_11: So ākāsā otaranto pādaṃ pāse pavesentoyeva otari. Athassa pāso pādaṃ ayapaṭṭakena
atk-s0514a1:3012_12: kaḍḍhanto viya ābandhitvā gaṇhi. Athassa “chindissāmi na”nti ākaḍḍhantassa paṭhamavāre
atk-s0514a1:3012_13: cammaṃ chijji, dutiyavāre maṃsaṃ chijji, tatiyavāre nhāru chijji, pāso aṭṭhiṃ āhacca
atk-s0514a1:3013_0: So cintesi – “sacāhaṃ baddharavaṃ ravissāmi, ñātakā me utrastā hutvā gocaraṃ aggaṇhitvā
atk-s0514a1:3013_1: chātajjhattāva palāyantā dubbalatāya mahāsamudde patissantī”ti. So vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā
atk-s0514a1:3013_2: ñātīnaṃ yāvadatthaṃ caritvā haṃsānaṃ kīḷanakāle mahantena saddena baddharavaṃ ravi.
atk-s0514a1:3013_3: Taṃ sutvā te haṃsā maraṇabhayatajjitā vaggavaggā hutvā cittakūṭābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3013_4: Tesu pakkantesu sumukho haṃsasenāpati “kacci nu kho idaṃ bhayaṃ mahārājassa uppannaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3013_5: jānissāmi na”nti vegena pakkhanditvā purato gacchantassa haṃsagaṇassa antare mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3013_6: adisvā majjhimahaṃsagaṇaṃ vicini, tatthapi adisvā pacchimahaṃsagaṇaṃ vicini, tatthapi
atk-s0514a1:3013_7: adisvā “nissaṃsayaṃ tassevedaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna”nti nivattitvā āgacchanto mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3013_8: pāse baddhaṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ dukkhāturaṃ paṅkapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ disvā “mā bhāyi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:3013_9: ahaṃ mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tumhe pāsato mocessāmī”ti vadanto otaritvā mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3013_10: assāsentova paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdi. Atha naṃ vīmaṃsanto mahāsatto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3016: Gaccha tuvampi mā kaṅkhi, natthi baddhe sahāyatā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3017_0: Tattha anupacinantāti sinehena ālayavasena anolokentā. Pakkamantīti ete channavuti
atk-s0514a1:3017_1: haṃsasahassā ñātivihaṅgamā maṃ chaḍḍetvā gacchanti, tvampi gaccha, mā idha vāsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3017_2: ākaṅkhi, evañhi pāsena baddhe mayi sahāyatā nāma natthi, na hi te ahaṃ idāni kiñci
atk-s0514a1:3017_3: sahāyakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmi, kiṃ te mayā nirūpakārena, papañcaṃ akatvā gacchevāti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:3020: “Gacche vāhaṃ na vā gacche, na tena amaro siyaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3021: Sukhitaṃ taṃ upāsitvā, dukkhitaṃ taṃ kathaṃ jahe.
atk-s0514a1:3023: “Maraṇaṃ vā tayā saddhiṃ, jīvitaṃ vā tayā vinā;
atk-s0514a1:3024: Tadeva maraṇaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve tayā vinā.
atk-s0514a1:3026: “Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ taṃ evaṃ gataṃ jahe;
atk-s0514a1:3027: Yā gati tuyhaṃ sā mayhaṃ, ruccate vihagādhipa.
atk-s0514a1:3029: “Kā nu pāsena baddhassa, gati aññā mahānasā;
atk-s0514a1:3030: Sā kathaṃ cetayānassa, muttassa tava ruccati.
atk-s0514a1:3032: “Kaṃ vā tvaṃ passase atthaṃ, mama tuyhañca pakkhima;
atk-s0514a1:3038: “Kathaṃ nu patataṃ seṭṭha, dhamme atthaṃ na bujjhasi;
atk-s0514a1:3039: Dhammo apacito santo, atthaṃ dasseti pāṇinaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3043: 10. “Addhā eso sataṃ dhammo, yo mitto mittamāpade.
atk-s0514a1:3046: “Svāyaṃ dhammo ca te ciṇṇo, bhatti ca viditā mayi;
atk-s0514a1:3049: “Api tvevaṃ gate kāle, yaṃ khaṇḍaṃ ñātinaṃ mayā;
atk-s0514a1:3070: “Yaṃ nu pāsena mahatā, baddho na kurute disaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3071: Atha kasmā abaddho tvaṃ, balī pakkhi na gacchasi.
atk-s0514a1:3073: “Kiṃ nu tyāyaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi;
atk-s0514a1:3074: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasi.
atk-s0514a1:3076: “Rājā me so dijāmitta, sakhā pāṇasamo ca me;
atk-s0514a1:3077: Neva naṃ vijahissāmi, yāva kālassa pariyāyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3083: Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhati.
atk-s0514a1:3088_0: Tattha gacche vāti, mahārāja, ahaṃ ito gaccheyyaṃ vā na vā, nāhaṃ tena gamanena vā
atk-s0514a1:3088_1: agamanena vā amaro siyaṃ, ahañhi ito gatopi agatopi maraṇato amuttova, ito pubbe
atk-s0514a1:3088_2: pana sukhitaṃ taṃ upāsitvā idāni dukkhitaṃ taṃ kathaṃ jaheyyanti vadati. Maraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3088_3: vāti mama agacchantassa vā tayā saddhiṃ maraṇaṃ bhaveyya, gacchantassa vā tayā vinā
atk-s0514a1:3088_4: jīvitaṃ. Tesu dvīsu yaṃ tayā saddhiṃ maraṇaṃ, tadeva me varaṃ, yaṃ tayā vinā jīveyyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3088_5: na me taṃ varanti attho. Ruccateti yā tava gati nipphatti, sāva mayhaṃ ruccati. Sā
atk-s0514a1:3088_6: kathanti samma sumukha mama tāva daḷhena vālapāsena baddhassa parahatthaṃ gatassa
atk-s0514a1:3088_7: sā gati ruccatu, tava pana cetayānassa sacetanassa paññavato muttassa kathaṃ ruccati.
atk-s0514a1:3089_0: Pakkhimāti pakkhasampanna. Ubhinnanti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ jīvitakkhaye sati tvaṃ mama
atk-s0514a1:3089_1: vā tava vā avasiṭṭhañātīnaṃ vā kaṃ atthaṃ passasi. Yaṃ nāti ettha na-kāro upamāne.
atk-s0514a1:3089_2: Kañcanadepiñchāti kañcanadvepiñcha, ayameva vā pāṭho, kañcanasadisaubhayapakkhāti
atk-s0514a1:3089_3: attho. Tamasāti tamasi. Gatanti kataṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Purimassa na-kārassa iminā
atk-s0514a1:3089_4: sambandho, “na kata”nti kataṃ viyāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tayi pāṇaṃ cajantepi
atk-s0514a1:3089_5: acajantepi mama jīvitassa abhāvā yaṃ tava pāṇasañcajanaṃ, taṃ andhena tamasi kataṃ
atk-s0514a1:3089_6: viya kiñcideva rūpakammaṃ apaccakkhaguṇaṃ, tādise tava apaccakkhaguṇe pāṇasañcajane
atk-s0514a1:3090_0: Dhammo apacito santoti dhammo pūjito mānito samāno. Atthaṃ dassetīti vuddhiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0514a1:3090_1: Apekkhānoti apekkhanto. Dhammā catthanti dhammato ca atthaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ passanto.
atk-s0514a1:3090_2: Bhattinti sinehaṃ. Sataṃ dhammoti paṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvo. Yo mittoti yo mitto āpadāsu
atk-s0514a1:3090_3: mittaṃ na caje, tassa acajantassa mittassa esa sabhāvo nāma addhā sataṃ dhammo. Viditāti
atk-s0514a1:3090_4: pākaṭā jātā. Kāmaṃ karassūti etaṃ mama kāmaṃ mayā icchitaṃ mama vacanaṃ karassu.
atk-s0514a1:3090_5: Api tvevaṃ gate kāleti api tu evaṃ gate kāle mayi imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāsena baddhe. Paramasaṃvutanti paramaparipuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3091_0: Iccevaṃ mantayantānanti “gaccha, na gacchāmī”ti evaṃ kathentānaṃ ariyānanti ācāraariyānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3091_1: Paccadissathāti kāsāyāni nivāsetvā rattamālaṃ piḷandhitvā muggaraṃ ādāya āgacchanto
atk-s0514a1:3091_2: adissatha. Āturānanti gilānānaṃ maccu viya. Abhisañcikkhāti, bhikkhave, te ubhopi
atk-s0514a1:3091_3: sattuṃ āyantaṃ passitvā. Hitāti dīgharattaṃ aññamaññassa hitā muducittā. Na sañcalesumāsanāti
atk-s0514a1:3091_4: āsanato na caliṃsu, yathānisinnāva ahesuṃ. Sumukho pana “ayaṃ nesādo āgantvā paharanto
atk-s0514a1:3091_5: maṃ paṭhamaṃ paharatū”ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ pacchato katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:3092_0: Dhataraṭṭheti haṃse. Samuḍḍenteti maraṇabhayena ito cito ca uppatante disvā. Āsajjāti
atk-s0514a1:3092_1: itare dve jane upagantvā. Paccakamitthāti “baddhā, na baddhā”ti cintento upadhārento
atk-s0514a1:3092_2: akamittha, vegaṃ hāpetvā saṇikaṃ agamāsi. Āsajja baddhamāsīnanti baddhaṃ mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3092_3: upagantvā nisinnaṃ sumukhaṃ. Adīnavantiādīnavameva hutvā mahāsattaṃ olokentaṃ disvā.
atk-s0514a1:3092_4: Vimatoti kiṃ nu kho abaddho baddhassa santike nisinno, kāraṇaṃ pucchissāmīti vimatijāto
atk-s0514a1:3092_5: hutvāti attho. Paṇḍareti haṃse, atha vā parisuddhe nimmale, sampahaṭṭhakañcanavaṇṇeti
atk-s0514a1:3092_6: attho. Pavaḍḍhakāyeti vaḍḍhitakāye mahāsarīre. Yaṃ nūti yaṃ tāva eso mahāpāsena baddho.
atk-s0514a1:3092_7: Na kurute disanti palāyanatthāya ekaṃ disaṃ na bhajati, taṃ yuttanti adhippāyo. Balīti
atk-s0514a1:3092_8: balasampanno hutvāpi. Pakkhīti taṃ ālapati. Ohāyāti chaḍḍetvā. Yantīti sesasakuṇā
atk-s0514a1:3093_0: Dijāmittāti dijānaṃ amitta. Yāva kālassa pariyāyanti yāva maraṇassa vāro āgacchati.
atk-s0514a1:3093_1: Kathaṃ panāyanti tvaṃ rājā me soti vadasi, rājāno ca nāma paṇḍitā honti, itipi paṇḍito
atk-s0514a1:3093_2: samāno kena kāraṇena oḍḍitaṃ pāsaṃ na addasa. Padaṃ hetanti yasamahattaṃ vā ñāṇamahattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3093_3: vā pattānaṃ attano āpadabujjhanaṃ nāma padaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tasmā te āpadaṃ boddhumarahanti.
atk-s0514a1:3093_4: Parābhavoti avaḍḍhi. Āsajjāpīti upagantvāpi na bujjhati. Tatāti vitatā oḍḍitā. Guyhamāsajjāti
atk-s0514a1:3093_5: tesu pāsesu yo guḷho paṭicchanno pāso, taṃ āsajja bajjhanti. Athevanti atha evaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3094: Iti naṃ so kathāsallāpena muduhadayaṃ katvā mahāsattassa jīvitaṃ yācanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3097: Api no anumaññāsi, api no jīvitaṃ dade”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3098_0: Tattha api nāyanti api nu ayaṃ. Sukhudrayoti sukhaphalo. Api no anumaññāsīti cittakūṭaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3098_1: gantvā ñātake passituṃ tvaṃ api no anujāneyyāsi. Api no jīvitaṃ dadeti api no imāya
atk-s0514a1:3101: “Na ceva me tvaṃ baddhosi, napi icchāmi te vadhaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3102: Kāmaṃ khippamito gantvā, jīva tvaṃ anigho cira”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3106: Sace ekena tuṭṭhosi, muñcetaṃ mañca bhakkhaya.
atk-s0514a1:3109: Na te lābhena jīvatthi, etena niminā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3112: Maṃ pubbe bandha pāsena, pacchā muñca dijādhipaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3114: “Tāvadeva ca te lābho, katāssa yācanāya ca;
atk-s0514a1:3115: Mitti ca dhataraṭṭhehi, yāvajīvāya te siyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3116_0: Tattha etanti yaṃ aññatra etassa jīvitā mama jīvitaṃ, etaṃ ahaṃ neva icchāmi. Tulyāsmāti
atk-s0514a1:3116_1: samānā homa. Niminā tuvanti parivattehi tvaṃ. Tavamhasūti tava amhesu giddhi hotu,
atk-s0514a1:3116_2: kiṃ te etena, mayi lobhaṃ uppādehīti vadati. Tāvadevāti tattakoyeva. Yācanāya cāti
atk-s0514a1:3116_3: yā mama yācanā, sāva katā assāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3117: Iti so tāya dhammadesanāya tele pakkhittakappāsapicu viya mudugatahadayo mahāsattaṃ tassa dāyaṃ katvā dadanto āha –
atk-s0514a1:3119: “Passantu no mahāsaṅghā, tayā muttaṃ ito gataṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3120: Mittāmaccā ca bhaccā ca, puttadārā ca bandhavā.
atk-s0514a1:3122: “Na ca te tādisā mittā, bahūnaṃ idha vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:3125: “So te sahāyaṃ muñcāmi, hotu rājā tavānugo;
atk-s0514a1:3127_0: Tattha noti nipātamattaṃ. Tayā muttanti imañhi tvaññeva muñcasi nāma, tasmā imaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3127_1: tayā muttaṃ ito cittakūṭapabbataṃ gataṃ mahantā ñātisaṅghā ete ca mittādayo passantu.
atk-s0514a1:3127_2: Ettha ca bandhavāti ekalohitasambandhā. Vijjatīti vijjanti. Pāṇasādhāraṇoti sādhāraṇapāṇo
atk-s0514a1:3127_3: avibhattajīviko, yathā tvaṃ etassa sakhā, etādisā aññesaṃ bahūnaṃ mittā nāma na vijjanti.
atk-s0514a1:3127_4: Tavānugoti etaṃ dukkhitaṃ ādāya purato gacchantassa tava ayaṃ anugo hotūti.
atk-s0514a1:3128_0: Evaṃ vatvā pana nesādaputto mettacittena mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bandhanaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0514a1:3128_1: āliṅgitvā sarato nikkhāmetvā saratīre taruṇadabbatiṇapiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā pāde bandhanapāsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3128_2: muducittena saṇikaṃ mocetvā dūre khipitvā mahāsatte balavasinehaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:3128_3: mettacittena udakaṃ ādāya lohitaṃ dhovitvā punappunaṃ parimajji. Tassa mettacittānubhāvena
atk-s0514a1:3128_4: bodhisattassa pāde sirā sirāhi, maṃsaṃ maṃsena, cammaṃ cammena ghaṭitaṃ, tāvadeva
atk-s0514a1:3128_5: pādo saṃruḷho sañjātachavisañjātalomo ahosi abaddhapādena nibbiseso. Bodhisatto sukhito
atk-s0514a1:3128_6: pakatibhāveneva nisīdi. Atha sumukho attānaṃ nissāya mahāsattassa sukhitabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0514a1:3128_7: sañjātasomanasso nesādassa thutimakāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:3136_0: Evaṃ luddassa thutiṃ katvā sumukho bodhisattaṃ āha – “mahārāja, iminā amhākaṃ mahāupakāro
atk-s0514a1:3136_1: kato, ayañhi amhākaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā kīḷāhaṃse no katvā issarānaṃ dento bahuṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3136_2: labheyya, māretvā maṃsaṃ vikkiṇanto mūlampi labhetha, attano pana jīvitaṃ anoloketvā
atk-s0514a1:3136_3: amhākaṃ vacanaṃ akari, imaṃ rañño santikaṃ netvā sukhajīvitaṃ karomā”ti. Mahāsatto
atk-s0514a1:3136_4: sampaṭicchi. Sumukho attano bhāsāya mahāsattena saddhiṃ kathetvā puna manussabhāsāya
atk-s0514a1:3136_5: luddaputtaṃ āmantetvā “samma, tvaṃ kimatthaṃ pāse oḍḍesī”ti pucchitvā “dhanattha”nti
atk-s0514a1:3136_6: vutte “evaṃ sante amhe ādāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rañño dassehi, bahuṃ te dhanaṃ dāpessāmī”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:3139: Lābhaṃ tavāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñci na dakkhati.
atk-s0514a1:3147: Patīto sumano vitto, bahuṃ dassati te dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3148_0: Tattha anusikkhāmīti anusāsāmi. Pāpanti lāmakaṃ. Rañño dassehi no ubhoti amhe ubhopi
atk-s0514a1:3148_1: rañño dassehi. Ayaṃ bodhisattassa paññāpabhāvadassanatthaṃ, attano mittadhammassa
atk-s0514a1:3148_2: āvibhāvanatthaṃ, luddassa dhanalābhatthaṃ, rañño sīlesu patiṭṭhāpanatthañcāti catūhi
atk-s0514a1:3148_3: kāraṇehi evamāha. Dhataraṭṭhāti netvā ca pana rañño evaṃ ācikkheyyāsi, “mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:3148_4: ime dhataraṭṭhakule jātā dve haṃsādhipatino, etesu ayaṃ rājā, itaro senāpatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3149_0: Evaṃ vutte luddo, “sāmi, mā vo rājadassanaṃ rucci, rājāno nāma calacittā, kīḷāhaṃse
atk-s0514a1:3149_1: vā vo kareyyuṃ mārāpeyyuṃ vā”ti vatvā, “samma, mā bhāyi, ahaṃ tādisaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ luddaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3149_2: lohitapāṇiṃ dhammakathāya mudukaṃ katvā mama pādesu pātesiṃ, rājāno nāma puññavanto
atk-s0514a1:3149_3: paññavanto ca subhāsitadubbhāsitaññū ca, khippaṃ amhe rañño dassehī”ti vutte “tena
atk-s0514a1:3149_4: hi mā mayhaṃ kujjhittha, ahaṃ avassaṃ tumhākaṃ ruciyā nemī”ti vatvā ubhopi kājaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3149_5: āropetvā rājakulaṃ gantvā rañño dassetvā raññā puṭṭho yathābhūtaṃ ārocesi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3159: Kathaṃ luddo mahantānaṃ, issare idha ajjhagā.
atk-s0514a1:3174: Tato naṃ pāmuciṃ pāsā, anuññāsiṃ sukhena ca.
atk-s0514a1:3183: Lābhaṃ tavāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñci na dakkhati.
atk-s0514a1:3192: Patīto sumano vitto, bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3195: Ettheva hi ime āsuṃ, ubho anumatā mayā.
atk-s0514a1:3202_0: Tattha kammunā upapādayīti yaṃ so avaca, taṃ karonto kāyakammena sampādesi. Gantvāti
atk-s0514a1:3202_1: haṃsarājena nisinnakājakoṭiṃ uccataraṃ, senāpatinā nisinnakājakoṭiṃ thokaṃ nīcaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3202_2: katvā ubhopi te ukkhipitvā “haṃsarājā ca senāpati ca rājānaṃ passituṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:3202_3: ussaratha ussarathā”ti janaṃ ussārento “evarūpā nāma sobhaggappattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā
atk-s0514a1:3202_4: haṃsarājāno na diṭṭhapubbā”ti muduhadayesu manussesu pasaṃsantesu khippamantepuraṃ
atk-s0514a1:3202_5: gantvā. Adassayīti “haṃsarājāno tumhe daṭṭhuṃ āgatā”ti rañño ārocāpetvā tena tuṭṭhacittena
atk-s0514a1:3202_6: “āgacchantū”ti pakkosāpito abhiharitvā dassesi. Hatthattanti hatthesu āgataṃ, pattanti
atk-s0514a1:3202_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Mahantānanti yasamahantappattānaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ dhataraṭṭhahaṃsānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3202_8: issare sāmino kathaṃ tvaṃ luddo hutvā adhigatoti pucchati. “Issaramidhamajjhagā”tipi
atk-s0514a1:3202_9: pāṭho, etesaṃ issariyaṃ tvaṃ kathaṃ ajjhagāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3203_0: Vihitāti yojitā. Yaṃ yadāyatanaṃ maññeti, mahārāja, yaṃ yaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ dijānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3203_1: pāṇarodhanaṃ jīvitakkhayakaraṃ maññāmi, tattha tattha mayā pallalesu pāsā vihitā.
atk-s0514a1:3203_2: Tādisanti mānusiyasare tathāvidhaṃ pāṇarodhanaṃ mayā vihitaṃ pāsaṃ. Tanti taṃ etaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3203_3: tattha baddhaṃ. Upāsinoti attano jīvitaṃ agaṇetvā upagantvā nisinno. Mamāyanti maṃ
atk-s0514a1:3203_4: ayaṃ senāpati ajjhabhāsatha, mayā saddhiṃ kathesi. Sudukkaranti tasmiṃ khaṇe esa
atk-s0514a1:3203_5: amhādisehi anariyehi sudukkaraṃ akāsi. Kiṃ tanti? Dahate bhāvamuttamaṃ, attano uttamaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3203_6: ajjhāsayaṃ dahati vidahati pakāseti. Attanāyanti attano ayaṃ. Anutthunantoti bhattuguṇe
atk-s0514a1:3203_7: vaṇṇento tassa jīvitaṃ muñcāti maṃ yāci.
atk-s0514a1:3204_0: Tassāti tassa tathā yācantassa. Sukhena cāti yathāsukhena cittakūṭaṃ gantvā ñātisaṅghaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3204_1: passathāti ca anujāniṃ. Ettheva hīti mayā pana ime dve ettha mānusiyasareyeva cittakūṭagamanāya
atk-s0514a1:3204_2: anumatā ahesuṃ. Evaṃ gatoti evaṃ sattu hatthagato. Janayeyyātha maddavanti attani
atk-s0514a1:3204_3: mettacittaṃ janesi. Upāyananti paṇṇākāraṃ. Sabbasākuṇikāgāmeti sabbasmimpi sākuṇikagāme
atk-s0514a1:3204_4: nāhaṃ aññaṃ tava evarūpaṃ kenaci sākuṇikena ābhatapubbaṃ upāyanaṃ passāmi. Taṃ passāti
atk-s0514a1:3204_5: taṃ mayā ābhataṃ upāyanaṃ passa manujādhipāti.
atk-s0514a1:3205_0: Evaṃ so ṭhitakova sumukhassa guṇaṃ kathesi. Tato rājā haṃsarañño mahārahaṃ āsanaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3205_1: sumukhassa ca suvaṇṇabhaddapīṭhakaṃ dāpetvā tesaṃ tattha nisinnānaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanehi
atk-s0514a1:3205_2: lājamadhuphāṇitādīni dāpetvā niṭṭhite pānabhojanakicce añjaliṃ paggayha mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3205_3: dhammakathaṃ yācitvā suvaṇṇapīṭhake nisīdi. So tena yācito paṭisanthāraṃ tāva akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3210: “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3216: “Kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:3217: Kacci ca te tavatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3219: “Athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:3227_0: Tattha rājānanti sāgalarājānaṃ. Vakkaṅgoti haṃsarājā. Dhammena manusāsasīti dhammena
atk-s0514a1:3227_1: anusāsasi. Dosoti aparādho. Tavatthesūti uppannesu tava yuddhādīsu atthesu. Nāvakaṅkhantīti
atk-s0514a1:3227_2: uraṃ datvā pariccajantā kicci attano jīvitaṃ na patthenti, jīvitañca cajitvā tavevatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3227_3: karonti. Sādisīti samānajātikā. Assavāti vacanasampaṭicchikā. Puttarūpayasūpetāti
atk-s0514a1:3227_4: puttehi ca rūpena ca yasena ca upetā. Tava chandavasānugāti kacci tava ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3227_5: tava vasaṃ anuvattati, na attano cittavasena vattatīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:3228: Evaṃ bodhisattena paṭisanthāre kate puna rājā tena saddhiṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:3237: Na cāyaṃ kiñci rasmāsu, sattūva samapajjatha.
atk-s0514a1:3243: Tato maṃ pāmucī pāsā, anuññāsi sukhena ca.
atk-s0514a1:3249: Eso cāpi bahuṃ vittaṃ, labhataṃ yāvadicchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3250_0: Tattha mahāsattuhatthattataṃ gatoti mahantassa sattuno hatthattaṃ gato. Āpatitvānāti
atk-s0514a1:3250_1: upadhāvitvā. Pātikanti pākatikaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – etesañhi jammānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3250_2: tāvadeva evaṃ pākatikaṃ hoti, sakuṇe daṇḍena pothetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpento dhanavetanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3250_3: labhatīti. Kiñci rasmāsūti kiñci amhesu. Sattūvāti sattu viya. Paccagamitthāti, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:3250_4: esa amhe disvā baddhāti saññāya thokaṃ osakkittha. Pubbevāti ayameva paṭhamaṃ ajjhabhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3250_5: Tadāti tasmiṃ kāle. Etadatthāyāti etassa nesādaputtassa atthāya cintitaṃ. Dhanamicchatāti
atk-s0514a1:3250_6: etassa dhanaṃ icchantena tava santikaṃ amhākaṃ āgamanaṃ cintitaṃ. Svāgatañcevidanti
atk-s0514a1:3250_7: mā bhonto cintayantu, bhavataṃ idaṃ idhāgamanaṃ svāgatameva. Labhatanti labhatu.
atk-s0514a1:3251_0: Evañca pana vatvā rājā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ oloketvā “kiṃ karomi devā”ti vutte “imaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3251_1: nesādaṃ kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā ānehī”ti
atk-s0514a1:3251_2: vatvā tena tathā katvā ānītassa tassa saṃvacchare saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3251_3: gāmaṃ, dve vīthiyo gahetvā ṭhitaṃ mahantaṃ gehaṃ, rathavarañca, aññañca bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3255: Atha mahāsatto rañño dhammaṃ desesi. So tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahadayo “dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti setacchattaṃ datvā rajjaṃ paṭicchāpento āha –
atk-s0514a1:3261: Etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, issariyaṃ vissajāmi vo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3262_0: Tattha vaso vattatīti yattha mama vaso vattati. Kiñcananti taṃ appamattakampi. Sabbatthissariyanti
atk-s0514a1:3262_1: sabbaṃ bhavataṃyeva issariyaṃ atthu. Yaṃ caññaṃ upakappatīti puññakāmatāya dānatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3262_2: vā chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjameva upabhottuṃ vā yaṃ vā aññaṃ tumhākaṃ ruccati, taṃ karotha,
atk-s0514a1:3262_3: etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, saddhiṃyeva setacchattena mama santakaṃ issariyaṃ vissajjāmi voti.
atk-s0514a1:3263_0: Atha mahāsatto raññā dinnaṃ setacchattaṃ puna tasseva adāsi. Rājāpi cintesi – “haṃsarañño
atk-s0514a1:3263_1: tāva me dhammakathā sutā, luddaputtena pana ‘ayaṃ sumukho mudhurakatho’ti ativiya
atk-s0514a1:3263_2: vaṇṇito, imassapi dhammakathaṃ sossāmī”ti. So tena saddhiṃ sallapanto anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3267: Tattha yathāti yadi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadi ca me ayaṃ sumukho paṇḍito buddhisampanno kāmasā attano ruciyā ajjhabhāseyya, taṃ me paramappiyaṃ assāti.
atk-s0514a1:3271: Paṭivattuṃ na sakkomi, na me so vinayo siyā.
atk-s0514a1:3278_0: Tattha nāgarājārivantaranti peḷāya abbhantaraṃ paviṭṭho nāgarājā viya. Paṭivattunti
atk-s0514a1:3278_1: tumhākaṃ dvinnaṃ antare vattuṃ na sakkomi. Na me soti sace vadeyyaṃ, na me so vinayo
atk-s0514a1:3278_2: bhaveyya. Amhākañcevāti channavutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ. Uttamasattavoti uttamasatto.
atk-s0514a1:3278_3: Pūjāti ubho tumhe mayhaṃ bahūhi kāraṇehi pūjārahā ceva pasaṃsārahā ca. Pessenāti
atk-s0514a1:3279: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahadayo “nesādaputto taṃ vaṇṇeti, na aññena tumhādisena madhuradhammakathikena nāma bhavitabba”nti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:3285: Yāvatatthi mayā diṭṭhā, nāññaṃ passāmi edisaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3288: Eso cāpi mamacchando, ciraṃ passeyya vo ubho”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3289_0: Tattha dhammenāti sabhāvena kāraṇena. Akatattassāti asampāditaattabhāvassa mittadubbhissa.
atk-s0514a1:3289_1: Nayoti paññā. Aggapakatimāti aggasabhāvo. Uttamasattavoti uttamasatto. Yāvatatthīti
atk-s0514a1:3289_2: yāvatā mayā diṭṭhā nāma atthi. Nāññanti tasmiṃ mayā diṭṭhaṭṭhāne aññaṃ evarūpaṃ na
atk-s0514a1:3289_3: passāmi. Tuṭṭhosmi vo pakatiyāti samma haṃsarāja ahaṃ pakatiyā paṭhamameva tumhākaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3289_4: dassanena tuṭṭho. Vākyenāti idāni pana vo madhuravacanena tuṭṭhosmi. Ciraṃ passeyya
atk-s0514a1:3289_5: voti idheva vasāpetvā muhuttampi avippavāsanto ciraṃ tumhe passeyyanti esa me chandoti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:3292: “Yaṃ kiccaṃ parame mitte, katamasmāsu taṃ tayā;
atk-s0514a1:3293: Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tyāmhā, bhattirasmāsu yā tava.
atk-s0514a1:3302: Eso cāpi mahā attho, ñātivissāsanā siyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3303_0: Tattha katamasmāsūti kataṃ amhesu. Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tyāmhāti mayaṃ nissaṃsayena
atk-s0514a1:3303_1: tayā pattāyeva. Bhattirasmāsu yā tavāti yā tava amhesu bhatti, tāya bhattiyā mayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3303_2: tayā asaṃsayena pattāyeva, na ca vippayuttā, vippavuṭṭhāpi sahavāsinoyeva nāma mayanti
atk-s0514a1:3303_3: dīpeti. Aduñca nūna sumahāti etañca ekaṃseneva sumahantaṃ. Ñātisaṅghassa mantaranti
atk-s0514a1:3303_4: amhehi dvīhi janehi virahitassa mama ñātisaṅghassa antaraṃ chiddaṃ. Asmākanti amhākaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3303_5: dvinnaṃ adassanena bahūsu pakkhīsu dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ. Passemurindamāti passeyyāma
atk-s0514a1:3303_6: arindama. Bhavatanti bhoto dassanena. Eso cāpi mahā atthoti yā esā ñātisaṅghasaṅkhātā
atk-s0514a1:3303_7: ñātivissāsanā siyā, eso cāpi mahanto atthopi.
atk-s0514a1:3304_0: Evaṃ vutte rājā tesaṃ gamanaṃ anujāni. Mahāsattopi rañño pañcavidhe dussīlye ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3304_1: sīle ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā “imaṃ sīlaṃ rakkha, dhammena rajjaṃ kārehi, catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
atk-s0514a1:3304_2: janaṃ saṅgaṇhāhī”ti ovaditvā cittakūṭaṃ agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:3314_0: Tattha upāgamunti aruṇuggamanavelāyameva lājamadhuphāṇitādīni paribhuñjitvā raññā
atk-s0514a1:3314_1: ca deviyā ca dvīhi suvaṇṇatālavaṇṭehi ukkhipitvā gandhamālādīhi katasakkārā tālavaṇṭehi
atk-s0514a1:3314_2: otaritvā rājānaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā raññā añjaliṃ paggayha “gacchatha
atk-s0514a1:3314_3: sāmino”ti vutte sīhapañjarena nikkhantā uttamena javena gantvā ñātigaṇaṃ upāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3314_4: Parameti uttame. Kekāti attano sabhāvena “kekā”ti saddamakaṃsu. Bhattugāravāti bhattari
atk-s0514a1:3314_5: sagāravā. Parikiriṃsūti bhattuno muttabhāvena tuṭṭhā taṃ bhattāraṃ samantā parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3315_0: Evaṃ parivāretvā pana te haṃsā “kathaṃ muttosi, mahārājā”ti pucchiṃsu. Mahāsatto
atk-s0514a1:3315_1: sumukhaṃ nissāya muttabhāvaṃ, sāgalarājaluddaputtehi katakammañca kathesi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a1:3315_2: tuṭṭho haṃsagaṇo “sumukhasenāpati ca rājā ca luddaputto ca sukhitā niddukkhā ciraṃ
atk-s0514a1:3315_3: jīvantū”ti thutimakāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3319_0: Tattha mittavatanti kalyāṇamittasampannānaṃ. Padakkhiṇāti sukhanipphattino vuḍḍhiyuttā.
atk-s0514a1:3319_1: Dhataraṭṭhāti haṃsarājā sumukho raññā ceva luddaputtena cāti dvīhi evaṃ ubhopi te
atk-s0514a1:3319_2: dhataraṭṭhā kalyāṇamittasampannā yathā ñātisaṅghaṃ upāgamuṃ, ñātisaṅghaupagamanasaṅkhāto
atk-s0514a1:3319_3: nesaṃ attho padakkhiṇo jāto, evaṃ aññesampi mittavataṃ atthā padakkhiṇā hontīti.
atk-s0514a1:3320_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na bhikkhave idāneva, pubbepānando mamatthāya
atk-s0514a1:3320_1: jīvitaṃ pariccajī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā nesādo channo ahosi, rājā sāriputto,
atk-s0514a1:3320_2: sumukho ānando, channavuti haṃsasahassā buddhaparisā, haṃsarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3324: Ete haṃsā pakkamantīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ānandatherassa jīvitapariccāgameva ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu heṭṭhā vuttasadisameva, idha pana satthā atītaṃ āharanto idamāhari.
atk-s0514a1:3325_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ saṃyamassa nāma bārāṇasirañño khemā nāma aggamahesī ahosi. Tadā
atk-s0514a1:3325_1: bodhisatto navutihaṃsasahassaparivuto cittakūṭe vihāsi. Athekadivasaṃ khemā devī
atk-s0514a1:3325_2: paccūsasamaye supinaṃ addasa. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā āgantvā rājapallaṅke nisīditvā madhurassarena
atk-s0514a1:3325_3: dhammakathaṃ kathesuṃ. Deviyā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇantiyā dhammassavanena
atk-s0514a1:3325_4: atittāya eva ratti vibhāyi. Haṃsā dhammaṃ kathetvā sīhapañjarena nikkhamitvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3325_5: Sā vegenuṭṭhāya “palāyamāne haṃse gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti vatvā hatthaṃ pasārentīyeva
atk-s0514a1:3325_6: pabujjhi. Tassā kathaṃ sutvā paricārikāyo “kuhiṃ haṃsā”ti thokaṃ avahasiṃsu. Sā tasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:3325_7: khaṇe supinabhāvaṃ ñatvā cintesi – “ahaṃ abhūtaṃ na passāmi, addhā imasmiṃ loke suvaṇṇavaṇṇā
atk-s0514a1:3325_8: haṃsā bhavissanti, sace kho pana ‘suvaṇṇahaṃsānaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmāmhī’ti rājānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3325_9: vakkhāmi, ‘amhehi suvaṇṇahaṃsā nāma na diṭṭhapubbā, haṃsānañca kathā nāma abhūtāyevā’ti
atk-s0514a1:3325_10: vatvā nirussukko bhavissati, ‘dohaḷo’ti vutte pana yena kenaci upāyena pariyesissati,
atk-s0514a1:3325_11: evaṃ me manoratho samijjhissatī”ti. Sā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā paricārikānaṃ saññaṃ datvā nipajji.
atk-s0514a1:3326_0: Rājā rājāsane nisinno tassā dassanavelāya taṃ adisvā “kahaṃ, khemā devī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0514a1:3326_1: “gilānā”ti sutvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanekadese nisīditvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto
atk-s0514a1:3326_2: “kiṃ te aphāsuka”nti pucchi. “Deva aññaṃ aphāsukaṃ natthi, dohaḷo pana me uppanno”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3326_3: Tena hi “bhaṇa, devi, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ sīghaṃ te upanāmessāmī”ti. “Mahārāja, ahamekassa
atk-s0514a1:3326_4: suvaṇṇahaṃsassa samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisinnassa gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3326_5: katvā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā dhammakathaṃ sotumicchāmi, sace labhāmi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3326_6: no ce, jīvitaṃ me natthī”ti. Atha naṃ rājā “sace manussaloke atthi, labhissasi, mā
atk-s0514a1:3326_7: cintayī”ti assāsetvā sirigabbhato nikkhamma amaccehi saddhiṃ mantesi – “ambho, khemā
atk-s0514a1:3326_8: devī, ‘suvaṇṇahaṃsassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ labhantī jīvissāmi, alabhantiyā me jīvitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3326_9: natthī’ti vadati, atthi nu kho suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā”ti. “Deva amhehi neva diṭṭhapubbā
atk-s0514a1:3326_10: na sutapubbā”ti. “Ke pana jāneyyu”nti? “Brāhmaṇā, devā”ti. Rājā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:3326_11: sakkāraṃ katvā pucchi – “honti nu kho ācariyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā”ti? “Āma, mahārāja
atk-s0514a1:3326_12: amhākaṃ mantesumacchā, kakkaṭakā, kacchapā, migā, morā, haṃsāti cha ete tiracchānagatā
atk-s0514a1:3326_13: suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontīti āgatā, tattha dhataraṭṭhakulahaṃsā nāma paṇḍitā ñāṇasampannā,
atk-s0514a1:3326_14: iti manussehi saddhiṃ satta suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3327_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā attamano hutvā “kahaṃ nu kho ācariyā dhataraṭṭhahaṃsā vasantī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0514a1:3327_1: “na jānāma, mahārājā”ti vutte “atha ke pana jānissantī”ti vatvā “luddaputtā”ti vutte
atk-s0514a1:3327_2: sabbe attano vijite luddake sannipātāpetvā pucchi – “tātā, suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dhataraṭṭhakulahaṃsā
atk-s0514a1:3327_3: nāma kahaṃ vasantī”ti? Atheko luddo “himavante kira, deva, cittakūṭapabbateti no
atk-s0514a1:3327_4: kulaparamparāya kathentī”ti āha. “Jānāsi pana nesaṃ gahaṇūpāya”nti? “Na jānāmi, devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3327_5: “Ke pana jānissantī”ti? Brāhmaṇāti. So brāhmaṇapaṇḍite pakkosāpetvā cittakūṭapabbate
atk-s0514a1:3327_6: suvaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ haṃsānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ārocetvā “jānātha nu kho tesaṃ gahaṇūpāya”nti
atk-s0514a1:3327_7: pucchi. “Mahārāja, kiṃ tehi gantvā gahitehi, upāyena te nagarasamīpaṃ ānetvā gahessāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3327_8: “Ko pana upāyo”ti? “Mahārāja, nagarato avidūre uttarena tigāvutamatte tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3327_9: khemaṃ nāma saraṃ kārāpetvā udakassa pūretvā nānādhaññāni ropetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3327_10: kārāpetvā ekaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nesādaṃ paṭicchāpetvā manussānaṃ upagantuṃ adatvā catūsu
atk-s0514a1:3327_11: kaṇṇesu ṭhitehi abhayaṃ ghosāpetha, taṃ sutvā nānāsakuṇā dasa disā otarissanti, tepi
atk-s0514a1:3327_12: haṃsā paramparāya tassa sarassa khemabhāvaṃ sutvā āgacchissanti, atha ne vālapāsehi
atk-s0514a1:3328_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tehi vuttapadese vuttappakāraṃ saraṃ kārāpetvā chekaṃ nesādaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:3328_1: tassa sahassaṃ dāpetvā “tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya attano kammaṃ mā kari, puttadāraṃ te ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3328_2: posessāmi, tvaṃ appamatto khemaṃ saraṃ rakkhanto manusse paṭikkamāpetvā catūsu kaṇṇesu
atk-s0514a1:3328_3: abhayaṃ ghosāpetvā āgatāgate sakuṇe mama ācikkheyyāsi, suvaṇṇahaṃsesu āgatesu mahantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3328_4: sakkāraṃ labhissasī”ti tamassāsetvā khemaṃ saraṃ paṭicchāpesi. So tato paṭṭhāya raññā
atk-s0514a1:3328_5: vuttanayeneva tattha paṭipajji, “khemaṃ saraṃ rakkhatī”ti cassa “khemanesādo”tveva
atk-s0514a1:3328_6: nāmaṃ udapādi. Tato paṭṭhāya ca nānappakārā sakuṇā otariṃsu, “khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ sara”nti
atk-s0514a1:3328_7: paramparāghosena nānāhaṃsā āgamiṃsu. Paṭhamaṃ tāva tiṇahaṃsā āgamiṃsu, tesaṃ ghosena
atk-s0514a1:3328_8: paṇḍuhaṃsā, tesaṃ ghosena manosilāvaṇṇā haṃsā, tesaṃ ghosena setahaṃsā, tesaṃ ghosena
atk-s0514a1:3328_9: pākahaṃsā āgamiṃsu. Tesu āgatesu khemako rañño ārocesi – “deva, pañcavaṇṇā haṃsā
atk-s0514a1:3328_10: āgantvā sare gocaraṃ gaṇhanti, pākahaṃsānaṃ āgatattā idāni katipāheneva suvaṇṇahaṃsā
atk-s0514a1:3329_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “aññena tattha na gantabbaṃ, yo gacchissati, hatthapādachedanañca
atk-s0514a1:3329_1: gharavilopañca pāpuṇissatī”ti nagara bheriṃ carāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya tattha koci na
atk-s0514a1:3329_2: gacchati. Cittakūṭassa panāvidūre kañcanaguhāyaṃpākahaṃsā vasanti, tepi mahabbalā.
atk-s0514a1:3329_3: Dhataraṭṭhakulena saddhiṃ tesaṃ sarīravaṇṇova viseso. Pākahaṃsarañño pana dhītā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā
atk-s0514a1:3329_4: ahosi. So taṃ dhataraṭṭhamahissarassa anurūpāti tassa pādaparicārikaṃ katvā pesesi.
atk-s0514a1:3329_5: Sā tassa piyā ahosi manāpā, teneva ca kāraṇena tāni dve haṃsakulāni aññamaññaṃ vissāsikāni jātāni.
atk-s0514a1:3330_0: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisattassa parivārahaṃsā pākahaṃse pucchiṃsu – “tumhe imesu divasesu
atk-s0514a1:3330_1: kahaṃ gocaraṃ gaṇhathā”ti? “Mayaṃ bārāṇasito avidūre khemasare gocaraṃ gaṇhāma, tumhe
atk-s0514a1:3330_2: pana kuhiṃ āhiṇḍathā”ti. “Asukaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “kasmā khemasaraṃ na gacchatha, so
atk-s0514a1:3330_3: hi saro ramaṇīyo nānāsakuṇasamākiṇṇo pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchanno nānādhaññaphalasampanno
atk-s0514a1:3330_4: nānappakārabhamaragaṇanikūjito catūsu kaṇṇesu niccaṃ pavattaabhayaghosano, koci naṃ
atk-s0514a1:3330_5: upasaṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi, pageva aññaṃ upaddavaṃ kātuṃ, evarūpo so saro”ti
atk-s0514a1:3330_6: khemasaraṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu. Te tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “bārāṇasiyā samīpe kira evarūpo khemo
atk-s0514a1:3330_7: nāma saro atthi, pākahaṃsā tattha gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇhanti, tumhepi dhataraṭṭhamahissarassa
atk-s0514a1:3330_8: ārocetha, sace anujānāti, mayampi tattha gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇheyyāmā”ti sumukhassa
atk-s0514a1:3330_9: kathesuṃ. Sumukho rañño ārocesi. So cintesi – “manussā nāma bahumāyā kharamantā upāyakusalā,
atk-s0514a1:3330_10: bhavitabbamettha kāraṇena, ettakaṃ kālaṃ eso saro natthi, idāni amhākaṃ gahaṇatthāya
atk-s0514a1:3330_11: kato bhavissatī”ti. So sumukhaṃ āha – “mā vo tattha gamanaṃ ruccatha, na so saro
atk-s0514a1:3330_12: tehi sudhammatāya kato, amhākaṃ gahaṇatthāyeva kato, manussā nāma bahumāyā kharamantā
atk-s0514a1:3331_0: Suvaṇṇahaṃsā “khemaṃ saraṃ gantukāmamhā”ti dutiyampi tatiyampi sumukhassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3331_1: So tesaṃ tattha gantukāmataṃ mahāsattassa ārocesi. Atha mahāsatto “mama ñātakā maṃ
atk-s0514a1:3331_2: nissāya mā kilamantu, tena hi gacchāmā”ti navutihaṃsasahassaparivuto tattha gantvā
atk-s0514a1:3331_3: gocaraṃ gahetvā haṃsakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā cittakūṭameva paccāgami. Khemako tesaṃ gocaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:3331_4: caritvā gatakāle gantvā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā tuṭṭhacitto hutvā,
atk-s0514a1:3331_5: “samma khemaka, ekaṃ vā dve vā haṃse gaṇhituṃ vāyama, mahantaṃ te yasaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:3331_6: vatvā paribbayaṃ datvā taṃ uyyojesi. So tattha gantvā cāṭipañjare nisīditvā haṃsānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3331_7: caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsi. Bodhisattā nāma nilloluppacārino honti, tasmā mahāsatto otiṇṇaṭṭhānato
atk-s0514a1:3331_8: paṭṭhāya sapadānaṃ sāliṃ khādanto agamāsi. Sesā ito cito ca khādantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3332_0: Atha luddaputto “ayaṃ haṃso nilloluppacārī, imaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā punadivase
atk-s0514a1:3332_1: haṃsesu saraṃ anotiṇṇesuyeva cāṭipañjare nisinno taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā avidūre pañjare
atk-s0514a1:3332_2: attānaṃ paṭicchādetvā chiddena olokento acchi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto navutihaṃsasahassapurakkhato
atk-s0514a1:3332_3: hiyyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva otaritvā odhiyaṃ nisīditvā sāliṃ khādanto pāyāsi. Nesādo pañjarachiddena
atk-s0514a1:3332_4: olokento tassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ haṃso sakaṭanābhippamāṇasarīro
atk-s0514a1:3332_5: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, tīhi rattarājīhi gīvāyaṃ parikkhitto, tisso rājiyo galena otaritvā
atk-s0514a1:3332_6: urantarena gatā, tisso pacchābhāgena nibbijjhitvā gatā, rattakambalasuttasikkāya
atk-s0514a1:3332_7: ṭhapitakañcanakkhandho viya atirocati, iminā etesaṃ raññā bhavitabbaṃ, imameva gaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:3332_8: cintesi. Haṃsarājāpi bahuṃ gocaraṃ caritvā jalakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā haṃsagaṇaparivuto cittakūṭameva
