atk-s0514a1:4312_12: pakkhipitvā ekasmiṃ cūḷāmaṇiṃ ṭhapetvā bandhitvā rattibhāge gantvā, “bhadde, mayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4312_13: daliddā, kicchena sampāditaṃ, tava pitaraṃ ‘ajja imamhā puṭā pāyāsaṃ bhuñja, sve
atk-s0514a1:4312_14: imamhā’ti vadeyyāsī”ti āha. Sā tathā akāsi. Athassā pitā ojasampannattā pāyāsassa
atk-s0514a1:4312_15: thokameva bhuñjitvā suhito jāto. Sesaṃ mātu datvā sayampi bhuñji. Tayopi suhitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4313_0: Rājā nivesanaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ dhovitvāva “cūḷāmaṇiṃ me āharathā”ti vatvā “na passāma,
atk-s0514a1:4313_1: devā”ti vutte “sakalanagaraṃ vicinathā”ti āha. Te vicinitvāpi na passiṃsu. Tena hi
atk-s0514a1:4313_2: bahinagare daliddagehesu bhattapaṇṇapuṭe upādāya vicinathāti. Vicinantā tasmiṃ ghaṭe
atk-s0514a1:4313_3: cūḷāmaṇiṃ disvā tassā mātāpitaro “corā”ti bandhitvā nayiṃsu. Athassā pitā, “sāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4313_4: na mayaṃ corā, aññenāyaṃ maṇi ābhato”ti vatvā “kenā”ti vutte “jāmātarā me”ti ācikkhitvā
atk-s0514a1:4313_5: “kahaṃ so”ti pucchito “dhītā me jānātī”ti āha. Tato dhītāya saddhiṃ kathesi – “amma,
atk-s0514a1:4313_6: sāmikaṃ te jānāsī”ti? “Na jānāmī”ti. “Evaṃ sante amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthī”ti. “Tāta,
atk-s0514a1:4313_7: so andhakāre āgantvā andhakāre eva yāti, tenassa rūpaṃ na jānāmi, hatthasamphassena
atk-s0514a1:4313_8: pana naṃ jānituṃ sakkomī”ti. So rājapurisānaṃ ārocesi. Tepi rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā
atk-s0514a1:4313_9: ajānanto viya hutvā “tena hi taṃ itthiṃ rājaṅgaṇe antosāṇiyaṃ ṭhapetvā sāṇiyā hatthappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4313_10: chiddaṃ katvā nagaravāsino sannipātetvā hatthasamphassena coraṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4313_11: Rājapurisā tathā kātuṃ tassā santikaṃ gantvā rūpaṃ disvāva vippaṭisārino hutvā –
atk-s0514a1:4313_12: “dhī, dhī pisācī”ti jigucchitvā phusituṃ na ussahiṃsu, ānetvā pana naṃ rājaṅgaṇe
atk-s0514a1:4313_13: antosāṇiyaṃ ṭhapetvā sakalanagaravāsino sannipātesuṃ. Sā āgatāgatassa chiddena pasāritahatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4313_14: gahetvāva “no eso”ti vadati. Purisā tassā dibbaphassasadise phasse bajjhitvā apagantuṃ
atk-s0514a1:4313_15: na sakkhiṃsu, “sacāyaṃ daṇḍārahā, daṇḍaṃ datvāpi dāsakammakārabhāvaṃ upagantvāpi
atk-s0514a1:4313_16: etaṃ ghare karissāmā”ti cintayiṃsu. Atha ne rājapurisā daṇḍehi koṭṭetvā palāpesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4313_17: Uparājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe ummattakā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4314_0: Atha rājā – “kacci ahaṃ bhaveyya”nti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Taṃ hatthe gahetvāva “coro
atk-s0514a1:4314_1: me gahito”ti mahāsaddaṃ kari. Rājā tepi pucchi – “tumhe etāya hatthe gahitā kiṃ cintayitthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4314_2: Te yathābhūtaṃ ārocesuṃ. Atha ne rājā āha – “ahaṃ etaṃ attano gehaṃ ānetuṃ evaṃ kāresiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4314_3: ‘etissā phassaṃ ajānantā maṃ paribhaveyyu’nti cintetvā, tasmā mayā sabbe tumhe jānāpitā,
atk-s0514a1:4314_4: vadatha, bho dāni, sā kassa gehe bhavituṃ yuttā”ti? “Tumhākaṃ, devā”ti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0514a1:4314_5: abhisiñcitvā aggamahesiṃ akāsi. Mātāpitūnampissā issariyaṃ dāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:4314_6: ca pana tāya sammatto neva vinicchayaṃ paṭṭhapesi, na aññaṃ itthiṃ olokesi. Tā tassā
atk-s0514a1:4314_7: antaraṃ pariyesiṃsu. Sā ekadivasaṃ dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ aggamahesibhāvassa supine nimittaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4314_8: disvā rañño ārocesi. Rājā supinapāṭhake pakkosāpetvā “evarūpe supine diṭṭhe kiṃ hotī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4314_9: pucchi. Te itarāsaṃ itthīnaṃ santikā lañjaṃ gahetvā – “mahārāja, deviyā sabbasetassa
atk-s0514a1:4314_10: hatthino khandhe nisinnabhāvo tumhākaṃ maraṇassa pubbanimittaṃ, hatthikhandhagatāya
atk-s0514a1:4314_11: pana candaparāmasanaṃ tumhākaṃ paccāmittarājānayanassa pubbanimitta”nti vatvā “idāni
atk-s0514a1:4314_12: kiṃ kātabba”nti vutte “deva imaṃ māretuṃ na sakkā, nāvāya pana naṃ ṭhapetvā nadiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4314_13: vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadiṃsu. Rājā āhāravatthālaṅkārehi saddhiṃ rattibhāge naṃ
atk-s0514a1:4315_0: Sā nadiyā vuyhamānā heṭṭhānadiyā nāvāya udakaṃ kīḷantassa bāvarikarañño abhimukhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4315_1: pattā. Tassa senāpati nāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ nāvā mayha”nti āha. Rājā “nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4315_2: mayha”nti vatvā āgatāya nāvāya taṃ disvā “kā nāma tvaṃ pisācīsadisā”ti pucchi. Sā
atk-s0514a1:4315_3: sitaṃ katvā bakassa rañño aggamahesibhāvaṃ kathetvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ tassa kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:4315_4: Sā pana pañcapāpīti sakalajambudīpe pākaṭā. Atha naṃ rājā hatthe gahetvā ukkhipi,
atk-s0514a1:4315_5: saha gahaṇeneva phassarāgaratto aññāsu itthīsu itthisaññaṃ akatvā taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a1:4315_6: ṭhapesi. Sā tassa pāṇasamā ahosi. Bako taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “nāhaṃ tassa aggamahesiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4315_7: kātuṃ dassāmī”ti senaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā tassa paṭititthe nivesanaṃ katvā paṇṇaṃ pesesi
atk-s0514a1:4315_8: – “bhariyaṃ vā me detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti. So “yuddhaṃ dassāmi, na bhariya”nti vatvā yuddhasajjo
atk-s0514a1:4315_9: ahosi. Ubhinnaṃ amaccā “mātugāmaṃ nissāya maraṇakiccaṃ natthi, purimasāmikattā esā
atk-s0514a1:4315_10: bakassa pāpuṇāti, nāvāya laddhattā bāvarikassa, tasmā ekekassa gehe satta satta divasāni
atk-s0514a1:4315_11: hotū”ti mantetvā dvepi rājāno saññāpesuṃ. Te ubhopi attamanā hutvā titthapaṭititthe
atk-s0514a1:4315_12: nagarāni māpetvā vasiṃsu. Sā dvinnampi tesaṃ aggamahesittaṃ kāresi. Dvepi tassā sammattā
atk-s0514a1:4315_13: ahesuṃ. Sā pana ekassa ghare sattāhaṃ vasitvā nāvāya itarassa gharaṃ gacchantī nāvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4315_14: pājetvā nentena ekena mahallakakhujjakevaṭṭena saddhiṃ nadīmajjhe pāpaṃ karoti. Tadā
atk-s0514a1:4315_15: kuṇālo sakuṇarājā bako ahosi, tasmā idaṃ attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ āharitvā dassento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4317: “Bakassa ca bāvarikassa ca rañño, accantakāmānugatassa bhariyā;
atk-s0514a1:4318: Avācarī paṭṭhavasānugassa, kaṃ vāpi itthī nāticare tadañña”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4319_0: Tattha accantakāmānugatassāti accantaṃ kāmaṃ anugatassa. Avācarīti anācāraṃ cari.
atk-s0514a1:4319_1: Paṭṭhavasānugassāti paṭṭhassa attano vasānugatassa, attano pesanakārassa santiketi
atk-s0514a1:4319_2: attho. Karaṇatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ, tena saddhiṃ pāpamakāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tadaññanti
atk-s0514a1:4319_3: kataraṃ taṃ aññaṃ purisaṃ nāticareyyāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4320_0: Aparāpi atīte brahmadattassa bhariyā piṅgiyānī nāma aggamahesī sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0514a1:4320_1: olokentī maṅgalaassagopakaṃ disvā rañño niddupagamanakāle vātapānena oruyha tena
atk-s0514a1:4320_2: saddhiṃ aticaritvā puna pāsādaṃ āruyha gandhehi sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā raññā saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4320_3: nipajji. Athekadivasaṃ rājā “kiṃ nu kho deviyā aḍḍharattasamaye niccaṃ sarīraṃ sītaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4320_4: hoti, pariggaṇhissāmi na”nti ekadivasaṃ niddupagato viya hutvā taṃ uṭṭhāya gacchantiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4320_5: anugantvā assabandhena saddhiṃ aticarantiṃ disvā nivattitvā sayanaṃ abhiruhi. Sāpi
atk-s0514a1:4320_6: aticaritvā āgantvā cūḷasayanake nipajji. Punadivase rājā amaccagaṇamajjheyeva taṃ
atk-s0514a1:4320_7: pakkosāpetvā taṃ kiccaṃ āvikatvā “sabbāva itthiyo pāpadhammā”ti tassā vadhabandhachejjabhejjārahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4320_8: dosaṃ khamitvā ṭhānā cāvetvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṃ akāsi. Tadā kuṇālo rājā brahmadatto
atk-s0514a1:4320_9: ahosi, tena taṃ attanā diṭṭhaṃ āharitvā dassento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4323: Avācarī paṭṭhavasānugassa, taṃ vāpi sā nājjhagā kāmakāminī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4324: Tattha taṃ vāti sā evaṃ aticarantī taṃ vā assabandhaṃ taṃ vā aggamahesiṭṭhānanti ubhayampi nājjhagā, ubhato bhaṭṭhā ahosi. Kāmakāminīti kāme patthayamānā.
atk-s0514a1:4325: Evaṃ pāpadhammā itthiyoti atītavatthūhi itthīnaṃ dosaṃ kathetvā aparenapi pariyāyena tāsaṃ dosameva kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:4330: “Na tā pajānanti kataṃ na kiccaṃ, na mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhātaraṃ vā;
atk-s0514a1:4331: Anariyā samatikkantadhammā, sasseva cittassa vasaṃ vajanti.
atk-s0514a1:4334: Āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ na vissasāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4336: “Thīnañhi cittaṃ yathā vānarassa, kannappakannaṃ yathā rukkhachāyā;
atk-s0514a1:4337: Calācalaṃ hadayamitthiyānaṃ, cakkassa nemi viya parivattati.
atk-s0514a1:4339: “Yadā tā passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4340: Saṇhāhi vācāhi nayanti menaṃ, kambojakā jalajeneva assaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4342: “Yadā na passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4343: Samantato naṃ parivajjayanti, tiṇṇo nadīpāragatova kullaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4346: Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakulaṃ parañca.
atk-s0514a1:4348: “Na tā ekassa na dvinnaṃ, āpaṇova pasārito;
atk-s0514a1:4349: Yo tā mayhanti maññeyya, vātaṃ jālena bādhaye.
atk-s0514a1:4351: “Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
atk-s0514a1:4352: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0514a1:4355: Gāvo bahi tiṇasseva, omasanti varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4357: “Ghatāsanaṃ kuñjaraṃ kaṇhasappaṃ, muddhābhisittaṃ pamadā ca sabbā;
atk-s0514a1:4358: Ete naro niccayato bhajetha, tesaṃ have dubbidu sabbabhāvo.
atk-s0514a1:4360: “Naccantavaṇṇā na bahūna kantā, na dakkhiṇā pamadā sevitabbā;
atk-s0514a1:4361: Na parassa bhariyā na dhanassa hetu, etitthiyo pañca na sevitabbā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4362_0: Tattha luddhānanti lubbhānaṃ. Kaṇaverajātake viya baddhacorepi sārajjanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4362_1: vuttaṃ. Lahucittānanti muhuttameva parivattanacittānaṃ. Cūḷadhanuggahajātakena etaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4362_2: dīpetabbaṃ. Akataññutā pana etāsaṃ ekakanipāte takkāriyajātakena dīpetabbā. Nādevasattoti
atk-s0514a1:4362_3: na adevasatto devena anāsatto ayakkhagahitako abhūtaviṭṭho puriso thīnaṃ sīlavantataṃ
atk-s0514a1:4362_4: saddhātuṃ nārahati, bhūtaviṭṭho pana saddaheyya. Katanti attano kataṃ upakāraṃ. Kiccanti
atk-s0514a1:4362_5: attanā kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ. Na mātaranti sabbepi ñātake chaḍḍetvā yasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā
atk-s0514a1:4362_6: honti, taññeva anubandhanato ete mātādayo na jānanti nāma mahāpanthakamātā viya.
atk-s0514a1:4362_7: Anariyāti nillajjā. Sassevāti sakassa. Āvāsūti āpadāsu. Kiccesūti tesu tesu karaṇīyesu.
atk-s0514a1:4363_0: Kannappakannanti otiṇṇotiṇṇaṃ. Yathā hi visame padese rukkhachāyā ninnampiorohati,
atk-s0514a1:4363_1: thalampi abhiruhati, tathā etāsampi cittaṃ na kañci uttamādhamaṃ vajjeti. Calācalanti
atk-s0514a1:4363_2: ekasmiṃyeva apatiṭṭhitaṃ. Nemi viyāti sakaṭassa gacchato cakkanemi viya. Ādeyyarūpanti
atk-s0514a1:4363_3: gahetabbajātikaṃ. Vittanti dhanaṃ. Nayantīti attano vasaṃ nenti. Jalajenāti jalajātasevālena.
atk-s0514a1:4363_4: Kambojaraṭṭhavāsino kira yadā aṭavito asse gaṇhitukāmā honti, tadā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0514a1:4363_5: vatiṃ parikkhipitvā dvāraṃ yojetvā assānaṃ udakapānatitthe sevālaṃ madhunā makkhetvā
atk-s0514a1:4363_6: sevālasambandhāni tīre tiṇāni ādiṃ katvā yāva parikkhepadvārā makkhenti, assā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4363_7: pivitvā rasagiddhena madhunā makkhitāni tāni tiṇāni khādantā anukkamena taṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4363_8: pavisanti. Iti yathā te jalajena palobhetvā asse vasaṃ nenti, tathā etāpi dhanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4363_9: disvā tassa gahaṇatthāya saṇhāhi vācāhipi purisaṃ vasaṃ nentīti attho. Kullanti taraṇatthāya gahitaṃ yaṃ kiñci.
atk-s0514a1:4364_0: Silesūpamāti purisānaṃ cittabandhanena silesasadisā. Tikkhamāyāti tikhiṇamāyā sīghamāyā.
atk-s0514a1:4364_1: Nadīrivāti yathā pabbateyyā nadī sīghasotā, evaṃ sīghamāyāti attho. Āpaṇovāti yathā
atk-s0514a1:4364_2: ca pasāritāpaṇo yesaṃ mūlaṃ atthi, tesaññeva upakāro, tatheva tāpi. Yo tāti yo puriso
atk-s0514a1:4364_3: tā itthiyo. Bādhayeti so vātaṃ jālena bādheyya. Velā tāsaṃ na vijjatīti yathā etesaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4364_4: nadīādīnaṃ “asukavelāyameva ettha gantabba”nti velā natthi, rattimpi divāpi icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0514a1:4364_5: upagantabbāneva, asukenevātipi mariyādā natthi, atthikena upagantabbāneva, tathā tāsampīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4365_0: Ghatāsanasamā etāti yathā aggi indhanena na tappati, evametāpi kilesaratiyā. Kaṇhasappasirūpamāti
atk-s0514a1:4365_1: kodhanatāya upanāhitāya ghoravisatāya dujivhatāya mittadubbhitāyāti pañcahi kāraṇehi
atk-s0514a1:4365_2: kaṇhasappasirasadisā. Tattha bahularāgatāya ghoravisatā, pisuṇatāya dujivhatā, aticāritāya
atk-s0514a1:4365_3: mittadubbhitā veditabbā. Gāvo bahi tiṇassevāti yathā gāvo khāditaṭṭhānaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0514a1:4365_4: bahi manāpamanāpassa tiṇassa varaṃ varaṃ omasanti khādanti, evametāpi niddhanaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0514a1:4365_5: aññaṃ sadhanameva bhajantīti attho. Muddhābhisittanti rājānaṃ. Pamadā ca sabbāti
atk-s0514a1:4365_6: sabbā ca itthiyo. Eteti ete pañca jane. Niccayatoti niccasaññato, upaṭṭhitassati
atk-s0514a1:4365_7: appamattova hutvāti attho. Dubbidūti dujjāno. Sabbabhāvoti ajjhāsayo. Cirapariciṇṇopi
atk-s0514a1:4365_8: hi aggi dahati, ciravissāsikopi kuñjaro ghāteti, ciraparicitopi sappo ḍaṃsati, ciravissāsikopi
atk-s0514a1:4365_9: rājā anatthakaro hoti, evaṃ cirāciṇṇāpi itthiyo vikāraṃ dassentīti.
atk-s0514a1:4366_0: Naccantavaṇṇāti abhirūpavatī. Na bahūna kantāti aḍḍhakāsigaṇikā viya bahūnaṃ piyā
atk-s0514a1:4366_1: manāpā. Na dakkhiṇāti naccagītakusalā. Tathārūpā hi bahupatthitā bahumittā honti,
atk-s0514a1:4366_2: tasmā na sevitabbā. Na dhanassa hetūti yā dhanahetuyeva bhajati, sā apariggahāpi
atk-s0514a1:4366_3: na sevitabbā. Sā hi dhanaṃ alabhamānā kujjhatīti.
atk-s0514a1:4367_0: Evaṃ vutte mahājano mahāsattassa “aho sukathita”nti sādhukāramadāsi. Sopi ettakehi
atk-s0514a1:4367_1: kāraṇehi itthīnaṃ aguṇaṃ kathetvā tuṇhī ahosi. Taṃ sutvā ānando gijjharājā, “samma
atk-s0514a1:4367_2: kuṇāla, ahampi attano ñāṇabalena itthīnaṃ aguṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti vatvā aguṇakathaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4368: “Atha khalu, bho, ānando gijjharājā kuṇālassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4370: “Puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya;
atk-s0514a1:4371: Laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche.
atk-s0514a1:4374: Āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ na vissasāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4376: “Na vissase ‘icchati ma’nti poso, na vissase ‘rodati me sakāse’;
atk-s0514a1:4377: Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca.
atk-s0514a1:4380: Na vissase rājānaṃ ‘sakhā mama’nti, na vissase itthi dasanna mātaraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4383: Accantapemānugatassa bhariyā, na vissase titthasamā hi nāriyo.
atk-s0514a1:4385: “Haneyyuṃ chindeyyuṃ chedāpeyyumpi, kaṇṭhepi chetvā rudhiraṃ piveyyuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4386: Mā dīnakāmāsu asaññatāsu, bhāvaṃ kare gaṅgatitthūpamāsu.
atk-s0514a1:4388: “Musā tāsaṃ yathā saccaṃ, saccaṃ tāsaṃ yathā musā;
atk-s0514a1:4389: Gāvo bahi tiṇasseva, omasanti varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4395: Na tā kiñci na jānanti, yaṃ manussesu vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4397: “Asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:4398: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā.
atk-s0514a1:4401: Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca.
atk-s0514a1:4411_0: Tattha ādimajjhakathāpariyosānanti kathāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ. Laddhā khaṇanti
atk-s0514a1:4411_1: okāsaṃ labhitvā. Icchati manti maṃ esā icchatīti puriso itthiṃ na vissaseyya. Sākhapurāṇasanthatanti
atk-s0514a1:4411_2: hiyyo vā pare vā santhataṃ purāṇasākhāsanthataṃ na vissase, apapphoṭetvā apaccavekkhitvā
atk-s0514a1:4411_3: na paribhuñjeyya. Tatra hi dīghajātiko vā pavisitvā tiṭṭheyye, paccāmitto vā satthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4411_4: nikkhipeyya. Mittapurāṇacoranti panthadūhanaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ coraṃ “purāṇamitto me”ti
atk-s0514a1:4411_5: na vissaseyya. Corā hi ye sañjānanti teyeva mārenti. Sakhā mamanti so hi khippameva
atk-s0514a1:4411_6: kujjhati, tasmā rājānaṃ “sakhā me”ti na vissase. Dasannamātaranti “ayaṃ mahallikā
atk-s0514a1:4411_7: idāni maṃ na aticarissati, attānaṃ rakkhissatī”ti na vissasetabbā. Rāmakarāsūti bālānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4411_8: ratikarāsu. Accantasīlāsūti atikkantasīlāsu. Accantapemānugatassāti sacepi accantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4411_9: anugatapemā assa, tathāpi taṃ na vissase. Kiṃkāraṇā? Titthasamā hi nāriyoti sambandho,
atk-s0514a1:4412_0: Haneyyunti kuddhā vā aññapurisasārattā vā hutvā sabbametaṃ hananādiṃ kareyyuṃ. Mā
atk-s0514a1:4412_1: dīnakāmāsūti hīnajjhāsayāsu saṃkiliṭṭhaāsayāsu. Bhāvanti evarūpāsu sinehaṃ mā kare.
atk-s0514a1:4412_2: Gaṅgatitthūpamāsūti sabbasādhāraṇaṭṭhena gaṅgātitthasadisāsu. Musāti musāvādo tāsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4412_3: saccasadisova. Gatenātiādīsu pekkhitena palobhane ummādantījātakaṃ, dunnivatthena
atk-s0514a1:4412_4: niḷinikājātakaṃ, mañjunā bhaṇitena “tuvaṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī”ti nandattherassa
atk-s0514a1:4412_5: vatthu kathetabbaṃ. Coriyoti sambhatassa dhanassa vināsanena coriyo. Kathināti thaddhahadayā.
atk-s0514a1:4412_6: Vāḷāti duṭṭhā appakeneva kujjhanasīlā. Lapasakkharāti niratthakalapanena sakkharā
atk-s0514a1:4412_7: viya madhurā. Asāti asatiyo lāmakā. Sārattāti sabbadā sārattā. Pagabbhāti kāyapāgabbhiyādīhi
atk-s0514a1:4412_8: pagabbhā. Yathāti yathā sikhī sabbaghaso, evametāpi sabbaghasā. Paṭivallantīti parissajanti
atk-s0514a1:4412_9: upagūhanti veṭhenti. Latāvāti yathā latā rukkhanissitā rukkhaṃ veṭhenti, evametā
atk-s0514a1:4413_0: Hatthibandhantiādīsu gopuriso vuccati gopālako. Chavaḍāhakanti chavānaṃ ḍāhakaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4413_1: susānapālanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pupphachaḍḍakanti vaccaṭṭhānasodhakaṃ. Sadhananti etesupi
atk-s0514a1:4413_2: sadhanaṃ anugacchantiyeva. Akiñcananti adhanaṃ. Chavakasamasadisanti sunakhamaṃsakhādacaṇḍālena
atk-s0514a1:4413_3: samaṃ sadisaṃ, tena nibbisesampi purisaṃ gacchanti bhajanti. Kasmā? Yasmā anupatanti dhanahetu nāriyoti.
atk-s0514a1:4414: Evaṃ attano ñāṇe ṭhatvā ānando gijjharājā itthīnaṃ aguṇaṃ kathetvā tuṇhī ahosi. Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā nāradopi attano ñāṇe ṭhatvā tāsaṃ aguṇaṃ kathesi. Taṃ dassento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4415: “Atha khalu, bho, nārado devabrāhmaṇo ānandassa gijjharājassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4417: “‘Cattārome na pūrenti, te me suṇātha bhāsato;
atk-s0514a1:4418: Samuddo brāhmaṇo rājā, itthī cāpi dijampati.
atk-s0514a1:4421: Tā samuddaṃ na pūrenti, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4424: Bhiyyopi sutamiccheyya, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4428: Pāraṃ samuddaṃ pattheti ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4432: Kareyya navame chandaṃ, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4435: Sabbitthiyo kaṇṭakānaṃva sākhā, sabbitthiyo dhanahetu vajanti.
atk-s0514a1:4438: Sakena hatthena kareyya ghosaṃ, yo sabbabhāvaṃ pamadāsu ossaje.
atk-s0514a1:4449: “Yaṃ etā upasevanti, chandasā vā dhanena vā;
atk-s0514a1:4451_0: Tattha dijampatīti dijajeṭṭhakaṃ kuṇālaṃ ālapati. “Saritā”tiādi ṭhapitamātikāya bhājanatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4451_1: vuttaṃ. Ūnattāti udakapatiṭṭhānassa mahantatāya ūnā eva. Adhīyānāti sajjhāyitvā.
atk-s0514a1:4451_2: Vedamakkhānapañcamanti itihāsapañcamaṃ vedacatukkaṃ. Ūnattāti so hi ajjhāsayamahantatāya
atk-s0514a1:4451_3: sikkhitabbassa na pūrati. Anantaratanocitanti nānāratanehi ocitaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. Ūnattāti
atk-s0514a1:4451_4: so hi taṇhāmahantatāya na pūrati. Siyāti siyuṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Sabbakāmarasāharāti
atk-s0514a1:4451_5: sabbesaṃ kāmarasānaṃ āharakā. “Navame”ti aṭṭhahi atittabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4451_6: Sā pana dasamepi vīsatimepi tato uttaritarepi chandaṃ karoteva. Ūnattāti sā hi kāmataṇhāya
atk-s0514a1:4451_7: mahantatāya na pūrati. Kaṇḍakānaṃva sākhāti sambādhamagge kaṇṭakasākhasadisā. Yathā
atk-s0514a1:4451_8: hi sākhā laggitvā ākaḍḍhati, evaṃ etāpi rūpādīhi kaḍḍhanti. Yathā sākhā hatthādīsu
atk-s0514a1:4451_9: vijjhitvā dukkhaṃ uppādeti, evaṃ etāpi phuṭṭhamattā sarīrasamphassena vijjhitvā mahāvināsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4452_0: Parāmaseti gaṇheyya. Osiñcayeti nhāyituṃ otiṇṇo ekena pāṇinā sakalasamuddaudakaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4452_1: osiñceyya gahetvā chaḍḍeyya. Sakenāti ekena attano hatthena tameva hatthaṃ haritvā
atk-s0514a1:4452_2: ghosaṃ uppādeyya. Sabbabhāvanti “tvameva iṭṭho kanto piyo manāpo”ti vuccamāno yo
atk-s0514a1:4452_3: puriso “evameta”nti saddahanto sabbaṃ attano ajjhāsayaṃ pamadāsu ossajeyya, so jālādīhi
atk-s0514a1:4452_4: vātaggahaṇādīni kareyyāti attho. Gatanti gamanaṃ. Analāti tīhi dhammehi alanti vacanavirahitā.
atk-s0514a1:4452_5: Duppurā tāti yathā mahānadī udakena, evaṃ kilesaratiyā tā duppūrā. Sīdanti naṃ viditvānāti
atk-s0514a1:4452_6: ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ, itthiyo allīnā catūsu apāyesu sīdantīti viditvā. Āvaṭṭanīti
atk-s0514a1:4452_7: yathā āvaṭṭanī mahājanassa hadayaṃ mohetvā attano vase vatteti, evametāpīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4452_8: Vikopanāti nāsanatthena ca garahatthena ca brahmacariyassa kopikā. Chandasā vāti
atk-s0514a1:4452_9: piyasaṃvāsena vā. Dhanena vāti dhanahetu vā. Saṃṭhānanti yathā jātavedo attano ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4452_10: yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ allīyati, taṃ taṃ dahati, tathā etāpi yaṃ yaṃ purisaṃ kilesavasena
atk-s0514a1:4452_11: allīyanti, taṃ taṃ anudahanti mahāvināsaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0514a1:4453: Evaṃ nāradena itthīnaṃ aguṇe pakāsite puna mahāsatto visesetvā tāsaṃ aguṇaṃ pakāseti. Taṃ dassetuṃ satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4454: “Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo nāradassa devabrāhmaṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4457: Uggatejamuragampi āside, eko ekāya pamadāya nālape.
atk-s0514a1:4462: “Natthi tāsaṃ vinayo na saṃvaro, majjamaṃsaniratā asaññatā;
atk-s0514a1:4463: Tā gilanti purisassa pābhataṃ, sāgareva makaraṃ timiṅgalo.
atk-s0514a1:4468: “Yaṃ naraṃ upalapenti nāriyo, chandasā vā ratiyā dhanena vā;
atk-s0514a1:4471: “Aḍḍhaṃ ñatvā purisaṃ mahaddhanaṃ, osaranti sadhanaṃ sahattanā;
atk-s0514a1:4480: “Tejavāpi hi naro vicakkhaṇo, sakkato bahujanassa pūjito;
atk-s0514a1:4481: Nārinaṃ vasagato na bhāsati, rāhunā upahatova candimā.
atk-s0514a1:4483: “Yaṃ kareyya kupito diso disaṃ, duṭṭhacitto vasamāgataṃ ariṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4484: Tena bhiyyo byasanaṃ nigacchati, nārinaṃ vasagato apekkhavā.
atk-s0514a1:4487: Hīnamevupagatā hi nāriyo, tā ramanti kuṇapeva makkhikā.
atk-s0514a1:4489: “Tā kulesu visikhantaresu vā, rājadhāninigamesu vā puna;
atk-s0514a1:4495: “So idha garahito parattha ca, dummatī upahato sakammunā;
atk-s0514a1:4502: Nāsayanti pamadā pamādinaṃ, duggatiñca paṭipādayanti naṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4505: Soṇṇabyamhanilayā ca accharā, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā.
atk-s0514a1:4511: Nibbutehi sucihī na dullabhaṃ, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā”’ti.
atk-s0514a1:4512_0: Tattha sallapeti “sace mayā saddhiṃ sallapessasi, sīsaṃ te pātessāmī”ti vatvā khaggaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4512_1: ādāya ṭhitenāpi, “sallapitamatteyeva taṃ khāditvā jīvitavināsaṃ pāpessāmī”ti dosinā
atk-s0514a1:4512_2: hutvā ṭhitenāpi pisācena saddhiṃ sallape. “Upagataṃ ḍaṃsitvā nāsessāmī”ti ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4512_3: uggatejaṃ uragampi āside. Eko pana hutvā raho ekāya pamadāya na hi ālape. Lokacittamathanāti
atk-s0514a1:4512_4: lokassa cittaghātikā. Dīpe rakkhasigaṇoti yathā dīpe rakkhasigaṇo manussavesena vāṇije
atk-s0514a1:4512_5: upalāpetvā attano vase gate katvā khādati, evaṃ imāpi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano vase
atk-s0514a1:4512_6: katvā satte mahāvināsaṃ pāpentīti attho. Vinayoti ācāro. Saṃvaroti mariyādo. Purisassa
atk-s0514a1:4513_0: Aniyatāti aniyatacittā. Loṇatoyavatiyanti loṇatoyavantaṃ samuddanti attho. Āpakāti
atk-s0514a1:4513_1: āpagā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Yathā samuddaṃ nadiyo osaranti, evaṃ pamādinaṃ pamadāti
atk-s0514a1:4513_2: attho. Chandasāti pemena. Ratiyāti pañcakāmaguṇaratiyā. Dhanena vāti dhanahetu vā.
atk-s0514a1:4513_3: Jātavedasadisanti guṇasampattiyā aggimiva jalitampi. Rāgadosavadhiyoti kāmarāgadosehi
atk-s0514a1:4513_4: vadhikā. Rāgadosagatiyotipi pāṭho. Osarantīti dhanagahaṇatthāya madhuravacanena taṃ
atk-s0514a1:4513_5: bandhantiyo upagacchanti. Sadhananti sadhanā. Ayameva vā pāṭho, vatthālaṅkāratthāya
atk-s0514a1:4513_6: kiñci attano dhanaṃ datvāpi osarantīti attho. Sahattanāti attabhāvena saddhiṃ attabhāvampi
atk-s0514a1:4513_7: tasseva pariccajantiyo viya honti. Ativeṭhayantīti dhanagahaṇatthāya ativiya veṭhenti pīḷenti.
atk-s0514a1:4514_0: Vividhena chandasāti nānāvidhena ākārena. Citrabimbamukhiyoti alaṅkāravasena citrasarīrā
atk-s0514a1:4514_1: citramukhiyo hutvā. Uhasantīti mahāhasitaṃ hasanti. Pahasantīti mandahasitaṃ hasanti.
atk-s0514a1:4514_2: Sambarovāti māyākārapuriso viya asurindo viya ca. Dānavaṃva hadayantarassitāti yathā
atk-s0514a1:4514_3: “kuto nu āgacchatha, bho, tayo janā”ti karaṇḍakajātake hadayantaranissitā antoudaragatāpi
atk-s0514a1:4514_4: dānavaṃ aticari, evaṃ aticaranti. Arakkhitā hetāti dīpeti. Na bhāsatīti na virocati
atk-s0514a1:4514_5: haritacalomasakassapakusarājāno viya. Tenāti tamhā amittena katā byasanā atirekataraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4515_0: Kesalūnanakhachinnatajjitāti ākaḍḍhitvā lūnakesā nakhehi chinnagattā tajjitā pādādīhi
atk-s0514a1:4515_1: ca tāḷitāva hutvā. Yo kilesavasena etepi vippakāre karoti, tādisaṃ hīnameva upagatā
atk-s0514a1:4515_2: nāriyo ramanti, na ete vippakāre pariharanti, madhurasamācāre kiṃkāraṇā tā na ramanti.
atk-s0514a1:4515_3: Kuṇapeva makkhikāti yasmā jegucchahatthikuṇapādimhi makkhikā viya tā hīneyeva ramantīti
atk-s0514a1:4515_4: attho. Oḍḍitanti na etā itthiyo nāma, atha kho imesu ṭhānesu namucino kilesamārassa
atk-s0514a1:4515_5: migapakkhigahaṇatthaṃ luddakehi oḍḍitaṃ pāsañca vākarañcāti maññamāno paññācakkhumā
atk-s0514a1:4516_0: Ossajitvāti devamanussesu mahāsampattidāyakaṃ tapoguṇaṃ chaḍḍetvā. Yoti yo puriso
atk-s0514a1:4516_1: anariyesu aparisuddhesu kāmaguṇesu kāmaraticaritāni ācarati. Devatāhi nirayaṃ nimissatīti
atk-s0514a1:4516_2: so devalokena parivattitvā nirayaṃ gaṇhissati. Chedagāmimaṇiyaṃva vāṇijoti yathā
atk-s0514a1:4516_3: bālavāṇijo satasahassagghabhaṇḍaṃ datvā chedagāmimaṇikaṃ gaṇhāti, tathārūpo ayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4516_4: hotīti attho. Soti so itthīnaṃ vasaṃ gato. Aniyatoti ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ apāyesu paccissatīti
atk-s0514a1:4516_5: aniyato. Gaḷāgaḷanti devalokā vā manussalokā vā gaḷitvā apāyameva gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4516_6: Yathā kiṃ? Duṭṭhagadrabharathova uppatheti, yathā kūṭagadrabhayuttaratho maggā okkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:4516_7: uppatheyeva gacchati, tathā. Sattisimbalivananti sattisadisehi kaṇṭakehi yuttaṃ āyasaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4517_0: Pamādinanti pamattānaṃ. Te hi pamadāsu pamattā tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4517_1: na karonti, iti tesaṃ pamadā sabbā tā nāsenti nāma. Paṭipādayantīti tathāvidhaṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4517_2: tā pamādavaseneva akusalaṃ kāretvā duggatiṃ paṭipādenti nāma. Soṇṇabyamhanilayāti
atk-s0514a1:4517_3: suvaṇṇamayavimānavāsiniyo. Pamadāhanatthikāti ye purisā pamadāhi anatthikā hutvā
atk-s0514a1:4517_4: brahmacariyaṃ caranti. Kāmadhātusamatikkamāti kāmadhātusamatikkamā yā gati. Rūpadhātuyā
atk-s0514a1:4517_5: bhāvoti yo kāmadhātusamatikkamagatisaṅkhāto rūpadhātuyā bhāvo, so tesaṃ na dullabho.
atk-s0514a1:4517_6: Vītarāgavisayūpapatti yāti yā vītarāgavisaye suddhāvāsaloke upapatti, sāpi tesaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4517_7: na dullabhāti attho. Accantanti antātītaṃ avināsadhammaṃ. Acalitanti kilesehi akampitaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4517_8: Nibbutehīti nibbutakilesehi. Sucihīti sucīhi parisuddhehi evarūpaṃ nibbānaṃ na dullabhanti.
atk-s0514a1:4518_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto amatamahānibbānaṃ pāpetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Himavante kinnaramahoragādayo
atk-s0514a1:4518_1: ākāse ṭhitā devatā ca “aho buddhalīlāya kathitā”ti sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu. Ānando gijjharājā
atk-s0514a1:4518_2: nārado devabrāhmaṇo puṇṇamukho ca phussakokilo attano attano parisaṃ ādāya yathāṭhānameva
atk-s0514a1:4518_3: gamiṃsu. Mahāsattopi sakaṭṭhānameva gato. Itare pana antarantarā gantvā mahāsattassa
atk-s0514a1:4518_4: santike ovādaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4519: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānento osānagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4524_0: Te pana bhikkhū gamanakāle satthānubhāvena gantvā āgamanakāle attano attanova ānubhāvena
atk-s0514a1:4524_1: āgatā. Tesaṃ satthā mahāvaneyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Sabbepi te taṃ divasameva
atk-s0514a1:4524_2: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Mahādevatāsamāgamo ahosi. Athassa bhagavā mahāsamayasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:4528_0: Kasmā tuvaṃ rasaka edisānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheradamanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4528_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tassa uppatti ca pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca aṅgulimālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4528_2: vuttanayena vitthārato veditabbā. So pana saccakiriyāya mūḷhagabbhāya itthiyā sotthibhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4528_3: katvā tato paṭṭhāya sulabhapiṇḍo hutvā vivekamanubrūhanto aparabhāge arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0514a1:4528_4: abhiññātova asītiyā mahātherānaṃ abbhantaro ahosi. Tasmiṃ kāle dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4528_5: samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, aho vata bhagavatā tathārūpaṃ luddaṃ lohitapāṇiṃ mahācoraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4528_6: aṅgulimālaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dametvā nibbisevanaṃ karontena dukkaraṃ kataṃ, aho
atk-s0514a1:4528_7: buddhā nāma dukkarakārino”ti. Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ ṭhitova dibbasotena taṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4528_8: sutvā “ajja mama gamanaṃ bahupakāraṃ bhavissati, mahādhammadesanā pavattissatī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4528_9: ñatvā anopamāya buddhalīlāya dhammasabhaṃ gantvā varapaññattāsane nisīditvā “kāya
atk-s0514a1:4528_10: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4528_11: bhikkhave, idāneva paramābhisambodhiṃ pattena mayā etassa damanaṃ, svāhaṃ pubbacariyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4528_12: caranto padesañāṇe ṭhitopi etaṃ damesi”nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:4529_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare korabyo nāma rājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā
atk-s0514a1:4529_1: bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. Dasamāse atikkante suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4529_2: puttaṃ vijāyi, sutavittatāya pana naṃ “sutasomo”ti sañjāniṃsu. Tamenaṃ rājā vayappattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4529_3: nikkhasahassaṃ datvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippuggahaṇatthāya takkasilaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4529_4: pesesi. So ācariyabhāgaṃ ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā maggaṃ paṭipajji. Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4529_5: kāsirañño putto brahmadattakumāropi tatheva vatvā pitarā pesito nagarā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0514a1:4529_6: tameva maggaṃ paṭipajji. Atha sutasomo maggaṃ gantvā nagaradvāre sālāya phalake vissamatthāya
atk-s0514a1:4529_7: nisīdi. Brahmadattakumāropi gantvā tena saddhiṃ ekaphalake nisīdi. Atha naṃ sutasomo
atk-s0514a1:4529_8: paṭisanthāraṃ karonto “samma, maggakilantosi, kuto āgacchasī”ti pucchitvā “bārāṇasito”ti
atk-s0514a1:4529_9: vutte “kassa puttosī”ti vatvā “kāsirañño puttomhī”ti vutte “ko nāmosī”ti vatvā “ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4529_10: brahmadattakumāro nāmā”ti vutte “kena kāraṇena idhāgatosī”ti pucchi. So “sippuggahaṇatthāyā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4529_11: vatvā “tvampi maggakilantosi, kuto āgacchasī”ti teneva nayena itaraṃ pucchi. Sopi
atk-s0514a1:4529_12: tassa sabbaṃ ācikkhi. Te ubhopi “mayaṃ khattiyā, ekācariyasseva santike sippuggahaṇatthāya
atk-s0514a1:4529_13: gacchāmā”ti aññamaññaṃ mittabhāvaṃ katvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā ācariyakulaṃ gantvā ācariyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4529_14: vanditvā attano jātiādiṃ kathetvā sippuggahaṇatthāya āgatabhāvaṃ kathesuṃ. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0514a1:4529_15: sampaṭicchi. Te ācariyabhāgaṃ datvā sippaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4530_0: Na kevalañca te dveva, aññepi tadā jambudīpe ekasatamattā rājaputtā tassa santike
atk-s0514a1:4530_1: sippaṃ uggaṇhanti. Sutasomo tesaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko hutvā sippaṃ upadisanto nacirasseva
atk-s0514a1:4530_2: nipphattiṃ pāpuṇi. So aññassa santikaṃ agantvā “sahāyo me”ti brahmadattassa kumārasseva
atk-s0514a1:4530_3: santikaṃ gantvā tassa piṭṭhiācariyo hutvā sippaṃ sikkhāpesi. Itaresampi anukkamena
atk-s0514a1:4530_4: sippaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ. Te anuyogaṃ datvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā sutasomaṃ parivāretvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4530_5: Atha ne sutasomo maggantare ṭhatvā uyyojento “tumhe attano attano pitūnaṃ sippaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4530_6: dassetvā rajjesu patiṭṭhahissatha, patiṭṭhitā ca pana mamovādaṃ kareyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4530_7: “Kiṃ, ācariyā”ti? “Pakkhadivasesu uposathikā hutvā mā ghātaṃ kareyyāthā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti
atk-s0514a1:4530_9: nissāya mahābhayaṃ uppajjissatī”ti ñatvā te evaṃ ovaditvā uyyojesi. Te sabbepi attano
atk-s0514a1:4530_10: attano janapadaṃ gantvā pitūnaṃ sippaṃ dassetvā rajjesu patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhitabhāvañceva
atk-s0514a1:4530_11: ovāde vattanabhāvañca jānāpetuṃ paṇṇākārena saddhiṃ paṇṇāni pahiṇiṃsu. Mahāsatto
atk-s0514a1:4530_12: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “appamattāva hothā”ti paṇṇāni paṭipesesi.
atk-s0514a1:4531_0: Tesu bārāṇasirājā vinā maṃsena bhattaṃ na bhuñjati. Uposathadivasatthāyapissa maṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4531_1: gahetvā ṭhapesi. Athekadivasaṃ evaṃ ṭhapitamaṃsaṃ bhattakārakassa pamādena rājagehe
atk-s0514a1:4531_2: koleyyakasunakhā khādiṃsu. Bhattakārako taṃ maṃsaṃ aditvā kahāpaṇamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya carantopi
atk-s0514a1:4531_3: maṃsaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkonto “sace amaṃsakabhattaṃ upanāmessāmi, jīvitaṃ me natthi,
atk-s0514a1:4531_4: kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti cintetvā “attheso upāyo”ti vikāle āmakasusānaṃ gantvā muhuttamatassa
atk-s0514a1:4531_5: purisassa ūrumaṃsaṃ āharitvā supakkaṃ pacitvā bhattaṃ upanāmesi. Rañño maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4531_6: jivhagge ṭhapitamattameva satta rasaharaṇisahassāni phari, sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā
atk-s0514a1:4531_7: aṭṭhāsi. Kiṃkāraṇā? Pubbe cassa sevanatāya. So kira atītānantare attabhāve yakkho
atk-s0514a1:4531_8: hutvā bahuṃ manussamaṃsaṃ khāditapubbo, tenassa taṃ piyaṃ ahosi. So “sacāhaṃ tuṇhīyeva
atk-s0514a1:4531_9: bhuñjissāmi, na me ayaṃ imaṃ maṃsaṃ kathessatī”ti cintetvā saha kheḷena bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4531_10: pātesi. “Niddosaṃ, deva, khādāhī”ti vutte manusse paṭikkamāpetvā “ahametassa niddosabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4531_11: jānāmi, kiṃ nāmetaṃ maṃsa”nti pucchi. “Purimadivasesu paribhogamaṃsameva, devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4531_12: “Nanu aññasmiṃ kāle ayaṃ raso natthī”ti? “Ajja supakkaṃ, devā”ti. “Nanu pubbepi evameva
atk-s0514a1:4531_13: pacasī”ti. Atha naṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ ñatvā “sabhāvaṃ kathehi, no ce kathesi, jīvitaṃ te
atk-s0514a1:4531_14: natthī”ti āha. So abhayaṃ yācitvā yathābhūtaṃ kathesi. Rājā “mā saddamakāsi, pakatiyā
atk-s0514a1:4531_15: pacanakamaṃsaṃ tvaṃ khāditvā mayhaṃ manussamaṃsameva pacāhī”ti āha. “Nanu dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4531_16: devā”ti? “Mā bhāyi, na dukkara”nti. “Nibaddhaṃ kuto labhissāmi, devā”ti? “Nanu bandhanāgāre
atk-s0514a1:4531_17: bahū manussā”ti. So tato paṭṭhāya tathā akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4532_0: Aparabhāge bandhanāgāre manussesu khīṇesu “idāni kiṃ karissāmi, devā”ti āha. “Antarāmagge
atk-s0514a1:4532_1: sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ khipitvā yo taṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ‘coro’ti gahetvā mārehī”ti āha. So
atk-s0514a1:4532_2: tathā akāsi. Aparabhāge rājabhayena sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ olokentampi adisvā “idāni kiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4532_3: karissāmī”ti āha. “Yadā bherivelāya nagaraṃ ākulaṃ hoti, tadā tvaṃ pana ekasmiṃ gharasandhimhi
atk-s0514a1:4532_4: vā vīthiyaṃ vā catukke vā ṭhatvā manusse māretvā maṃsaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti. So tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:4532_5: tathā katvā thūlamaṃsaṃ ādāya gacchati. Tesu tesu ṭhānesu kaḷevarāni dissanti. Mama
atk-s0514a1:4532_6: mātā na paññāyati, mama pitā na paññāyati, mama bhātā bhaginī ca na paññāyati, manussānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4532_7: paridevanasaddo sūyati. Nāgarā bhītatasitā “ime manusse sīho nu kho khādati, byaggho
atk-s0514a1:4532_8: nu kho khādati, yakkho nu kho khādatī”ti olokentā pahāramukhaṃ disvā “eko manussakhādako
atk-s0514a1:4532_9: coro ime khādatī”ti maññanti. Mahājanā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā upakkosiṃsu. Rājā “kiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4532_10: tātā”ti pucchi. “Deva imasmiṃ nagare manussakhādako coro atthi, taṃ gaṇhāpethā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4532_11: āhaṃsu. “Ahaṃ kathaṃ taṃ jānissāmi, kiṃ ahaṃ nagaraṃ rakkhantopi carāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4533_0: Mahājanā “rājā nagarena anatthiko, kāḷahatthisenāpatissa ācikkhissāmā”ti gantvā tassa
atk-s0514a1:4533_1: taṃ kathetvā “coraṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadiṃsu. So “sādhu sattāhaṃ āgametha,
atk-s0514a1:4533_2: pariyesitvā coraṃ dassāmī”ti mahājane uyyojetvā purise āṇāpesi, “tātā, nagare kira
atk-s0514a1:4533_3: manussakhādako coro atthi, tumhe tesu tesu ṭhānesu nilīyitvā taṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Te
atk-s0514a1:4533_4: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tato paṭṭhāya nagaraṃ pariggaṇhanti. Bhattakārakopi ekasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4533_5: gharasandhimhi sampaṭicchanno hutvā ekaṃ itthiṃ māretvā ghanaghanamaṃsaṃ ādāya pacchiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4533_6: pūretuṃ ārabhi. Atha naṃ te purisā gahetvā pothetvā pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā “gahito
atk-s0514a1:4533_7: manussakhādako coro”ti mahāsaddaṃ kariṃsu. Mahājano taṃ parivāresi. Atha naṃ suṭṭhu
atk-s0514a1:4533_8: bandhitvā maṃsapacchiṃ gīvāya bandhitvā ādāya senāpatissa dassesuṃ. Senāpati taṃ
atk-s0514a1:4533_9: disvā “kiṃ nu kho esa imaṃ maṃsaṃ khādati, udāhu aññena maṃsena missetvā vikkiṇāti,
atk-s0514a1:4533_10: udāhu aññassa vacanena māretī”ti cintetvā tamatthaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4535: “Kasmā tuvaṃ rasaka edisāni, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni;
atk-s0514a1:4536: Hanāsi itthī purise ca mūḷho, maṃsassa hetu adu dhanassa kāraṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4538: Ito paraṃ uttānasambandhāni vacanapaṭivacanāni pāḷivaseneva veditabbāni –
atk-s0514a1:4540: “Na attahetū na dhanassa kāraṇā, na puttadārassa sahāyañātinaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4541: Bhattā ca me bhagavā bhūmipālo, so khādati maṃsaṃ bhadantedisaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4543: “Sace tuvaṃ bhatturatthe payutto, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni;
atk-s0514a1:4544: Pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, lapeyyāsi me rājino sammukhe taṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4546: “Tathā karissāmi ahaṃ bhadante, yathā tuvaṃ bhāsasi kāḷahatthi;
atk-s0514a1:4547: Pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, vakkhāmi te rājino sammukhe ta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4548_0: Tattha bhagavāti gāravādhivacanaṃ. Sace tuvanti “saccaṃ nu kho bhaṇati, udāhu maraṇabhayena
atk-s0514a1:4548_1: musā bhaṇatī”ti vīmaṃsanto evamāha. Tattha sudāruṇānīti manussaghātakammāni. Sammukhe
atk-s0514a1:4548_2: tanti sammukhe ṭhatvā evaṃ vadeyyāsīti. So sampaṭicchanto gāthamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4549_0: Atha naṃ senāpati gāḷhabandhanameva sayāpetvā vibhātāya rattiyā amaccehi ca nāgarehi
atk-s0514a1:4549_1: ca saddhiṃ mantetvā sabbesu ekacchandesu jātesu sabbaṭṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4549_2: hatthagataṃ katvā rasakassa gīvāyaṃ maṃsapacchiṃ bandhitvā ādāya rājanivesanaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4549_3: Sakalanagaraṃ viravi. Rājā hiyyo bhuttapātarāso sāyamāsampi alabhitvā “rasako idāni
atk-s0514a1:4549_4: āgacchissati, idāni āgacchassatī”ti nisinnova taṃ rattiṃ vītināmetvā “ajjapi rasako
atk-s0514a1:4549_5: nāgacchati, nāgarānañca mahāsaddo sūyati, kiṃ nū kho eta”nti vātapānena olokento
atk-s0514a1:4549_6: taṃ tathā ānīyamānaṃ disvā “pākaṭaṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ jāta”nti cintetvā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a1:4549_7: pallaṅkeyeva nisīdi. Kāḷahatthipi naṃ upasaṅkamitvā anuyuñji, sopissa kathesi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4560_0: Tattha kāḷāti kāḷahatthi. Evamevāti tena senāpatinā tejavantena anuyutto rājā musā
atk-s0514a1:4560_1: vattuṃ asakkonto evamāha. Tattha tathāti idaṃ purimassa vevacanaṃ. Mama atthanti
atk-s0514a1:4560_2: mama vuḍḍhiṃ. Karontassāti karontaṃ. Kimetanti kasmā etaṃ. Paribhāsasīti aho dukkaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4560_3: karosi, kāḷahatthi tvaṃ nāma aññaṃ coraṃ aggahetvā mama pesanakārakaṃ gaṇhāsīti tassa
atk-s0514a1:4561_0: Taṃ sutvā senāpati “ayaṃ sakeneva mukhena paṭijānāti, aho sāhasiko, ettakaṃ nāma
atk-s0514a1:4561_1: kālaṃ ime manussā etena khāditā, vāressāmi na”nti cintetvā āha – “mahārāja, mā evaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4561_2: kari, mā manussamaṃsaṃ khādasī”ti. “Kāḷahatthi kiṃ kathesi, nāhaṃ viramituṃ sakkomī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4561_3: “Mahārāja, sace na viramissasi, attānañca raṭṭhañca nāsessasī”ti. “Evaṃ nassantepi
atk-s0514a1:4561_4: ahaṃ neva tato viramituṃ sakkomī”ti. Tato senāpati tassa saññāpanatthāya vatthuṃ
atk-s0514a1:4561_5: āharitvā dasseti – atītasmiñhi kāle mahāsamudde cha mahāmacchā ahesuṃ. Tesu ānando
atk-s0514a1:4561_6: timinando ajjhārohoti ime tayo macchā pañcayojanasatikā, timiṅgalo timirapiṅgalo
atk-s0514a1:4561_7: mahātimirapiṅgaloti ime tayo macchā sahassayojanikā honti. Te sabbepi pāsāṇasevālabhakkhā
atk-s0514a1:4561_8: ahesuṃ. Tesu ānando mahāsamuddassa ekapasse vasati. Taṃ bahū macchā dassanāya upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0514a1:4561_9: ekadivasaṃ “sabbesaṃ dvipadacatuppadānaṃ sattānaṃ rājā paññāyati, amhākaṃ rājā natthi,
atk-s0514a1:4561_10: mayampetaṃ rājānaṃ karissāmā”ti cintetvā sabbe ekacchandā hutvā ānandaṃ rājānaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4561_11: Te macchā tato paṭṭhāya tassa sāyaṃ pātova upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0514a1:4562_0: Athekadivasaṃ ānando ekasmiṃ pabbate pāsāṇasevālaṃ khādanto ajānitvā “sevālo”ti saññāya
atk-s0514a1:4562_1: ekaṃ macchaṃ khādi. Tassa taṃ maṃsaṃ khādantassa sakalasarīraṃ saṅkhobhesi. So “kiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4562_2: nu kho idaṃ ativiya madhura”nti nīharitvā olokento macchamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ disvā “ettakaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4562_3: kālaṃ ajānitvā na khādāmī”ti cintetvā “sāyaṃ pātopi macchānaṃ āgantvā gamanakāle
atk-s0514a1:4562_4: ekaṃ dve macche khādissāmi, pākaṭaṃ katvā khādiyamāne ekopi maṃ na upasaṅkamissati,
atk-s0514a1:4562_5: sabbe palāyissanti, paṭicchanno hutvā pacchā osakkitosakkitaṃ paharitvā khādissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4562_6: tathā katvā khādi. Macchā parikkhayaṃ gacchantā cintayiṃsu. “Kuto nu kho ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4562_7: bhayaṃ uppajjissatī”ti. Atheko paṇḍito maccho “mayhaṃ ānandassa kiriyā na ruccati,
atk-s0514a1:4562_8: pariggaṇhissāmi na”nti macchesu upaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu ānandassa kaṇṇapatte paṭicchanno
atk-s0514a1:4562_9: aṭṭhāsi. Ānando macche uyyojetvā sabbapacchato gacchantaṃ macchaṃ khādi. So paṇḍitamaccho
atk-s0514a1:4562_10: tassa kiriyaṃ disvā itaresaṃ ārocesi. Te sabbepi bhītatasitā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4563_0: Ānando tato paṭṭhāya macchamaṃsagiddhena aññaṃ gocaraṃ na gaṇhi. So jighacchāya pīḷito
atk-s0514a1:4563_1: kilanto “kahaṃ nu kho ime gatā”ti te macche pariyesanto ekaṃ pabbataṃ disvā “mama
atk-s0514a1:4563_2: bhayena imaṃ pabbataṃ nissāya vasanti maññe, pabbataṃ parikkhipitvā upadhāressāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4563_3: naṅguṭṭhena ca sīsena ca ubho passe parikkhipitvā gaṇhi. Tato “sace idha vasanti,
atk-s0514a1:4563_4: palāyissantī”ti pabbataṃ parikkhipantaṃ attano naṅguṭṭhaṃ disvā “ayaṃ maccho maṃ
atk-s0514a1:4563_5: vañcetvā pabbataṃ nissāya vasatī”ti kuddho paṇṇāsayojanamattaṃ sakanaṅguṭṭhakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4563_6: aññamacchasaññāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā murumurāyanto khādi, dukkhavedanā uppajji. Lohitagandhena
atk-s0514a1:4563_7: macchā sannipatitvā luñjitvā khādantā yāva sīsā āgamaṃsu. Mahāsarīratāya parivattetuṃ
atk-s0514a1:4563_8: asakkonto tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi, pabbatarāsi viya aṭṭhirāsi ahosi. Ākāsacārino
atk-s0514a1:4563_9: tāpasaparibbājakā manussānaṃ kathayiṃsu. Sakalajambudīpe manussā jāniṃsu. Taṃ vatthuṃ
atk-s0514a1:4568: “Evaṃ pamatto rasagārave ratto, bālo yadī āyati nāvabujjhati;
atk-s0514a1:4569: Vidhamma putte caji ñātake ca, parivattiya attānaññeva khādati.
atk-s0514a1:4571: “Idaṃ te sutvāna vigetu chando, mā bhakkhayī rāja manussamaṃsaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4572: Mā tvaṃ imaṃ kevalaṃ vārijova, dvipadādhipa suññamakāsi raṭṭha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4573_0: Tattha ānandoti, mahārāja, atītasmiṃ kāle mahāsamudde pañcasatayojaniko ānando nāma
atk-s0514a1:4573_1: mahāmaccho sabbesaṃ macchānaṃ rājā mahāsamuddassa ekapasse ṭhito. Khāditvāti sakajātikānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4573_2: macchānaṃ rasagiddhimā macche khāditvā. Parikkhīṇāyāti macchaparisāya khayappattāya.
atk-s0514a1:4573_3: Attānanti aññaṃ gocaraṃ aggahetvā pabbataṃ parikkhipanto paṇṇāsayojanamattaṃ attano
atk-s0514a1:4573_4: naṅguṭṭhakhaṇḍaṃ aññamacchasaññāya khāditvā mato maraṇappatto hutvā idāni mahāsamudde
atk-s0514a1:4573_5: pabbatamatto aṭṭhirāsi ahosi. Evaṃ pamattoti yathā mahāmaccho ānando, evampi tathā
atk-s0514a1:4574_0: Rasagārave rattoti manussamaṃsassa rasagārave ratto atirattacitto hoti. Bāloti yadi
atk-s0514a1:4574_1: bālo duppañño āyatiṃ anāgate kāle uppajjanakadukkhaṃ nāvabujjhati na jānāti. Vidhammāti
atk-s0514a1:4574_2: vidhametvā vināsetvā. Putteti puttadhītaro ca. Ñātake cāti sesañātake ca sahāye ca,
atk-s0514a1:4574_3: vidhamma putte ca cajitvā ñātake cāti attho. Parivattiyāti aññaṃ āhāraṃ alabhitvā
atk-s0514a1:4574_4: jighacchāya pīḷito sakalanagaraṃ parivattiya vicaritvā manussamaṃsaṃ alabhitvā attānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4574_5: khādanto ānando maccho viya attānaññeva khādati.
atk-s0514a1:4575_0: Idaṃ te sutvānāti, mahārāja, te tuyhaṃ mayā ānītaṃ idaṃ udāharaṇaṃ sutvā chando manussamaṃsakhādanacchando
atk-s0514a1:4575_1: vigetu vigacchatu viramatu. Mā bhakkhayīti rāja manussamaṃsaṃ mā bhakkhayi mā khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4575_2: Mā tvaṃ imaṃ kevalanti mahāsamuddaṃ suññaṃ karonto vārijo ānando maccho iva, bho
atk-s0514a1:4575_3: dvipadādhipa, dvipadānaṃ manussānaṃ, issara mahārāja, tvaṃ kevalaṃ saccato imaṃ tava
atk-s0514a1:4575_4: kāsiraṭṭhaṃ nagaraṃ suññaṃ mā akāsīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4576: Taṃ sutvā rājā, “bho kāḷahatthi, na tvameva upamaṃ jānāsi, ahampi jānāmī”ti manussamaṃsagiddhatāya porāṇakavatthuṃ āharitvā dassento āha –
atk-s0514a1:4582: Aladdhā mānusaṃ maṃsaṃ, maññe hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4583_0: Tattha sujāto nāmāti kāḷahatthi kuṭumbiko nāmena sujāto nāma, tassa atrajo putto
atk-s0514a1:4583_1: oraso jambupesiṃ aladdhāna alabhitvāna. Matoti yathā tassā jambupesiyā saṅkhaye so
atk-s0514a1:4583_2: kuṭumbikaputto mato, evameva ahaṃ rasuttamaṃ aññarasānaṃ uttamaṃ manussānaṃ maṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4583_3: bhutvā bhuñjitvā aladdhā manussamaṃsaṃ jīvitaṃ hissāmīti maññe maññāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4584_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ sujāto nāma kuṭumbiko loṇambilasevanatthāya himavantato āgatāni
atk-s0514a1:4584_1: pañca isisatāni attano uyyāne vasāpetvā upaṭṭhāsi. Ghare cassa nibaddhaṃ pañcasatamattā
atk-s0514a1:4584_2: bhikkhā ahosi. Te pana tāpasā kadāci janapadepi bhikkhāya caranti, kadāci mahājambupesiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4584_3: āharitvā khādanti. Tesaṃ jambupesiṃ āharitvā khādanakāle sujāto cintesi – “ajja bhaddantānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4584_4: tayo cattāro divasā anāgacchantānaṃ, kahaṃ nu kho gatā”ti. So attano puttakaṃ aṅguliyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4584_5: gāhāpetvā tesaṃ bhattakiccakāle tattha agamāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye mahallakānaṃ mukhavikkhālanakāle
atk-s0514a1:4584_6: udakaṃ datvā sabbanavako jambupesiṃ khādati. Sujāto tāpase vanditvā nisinno – “kiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4584_7: bhante, khādathā”ti pucchi. “Mahājambupesiṃ, āvuso”ti. Taṃ sutvā kumāro pipāsaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0514a1:4584_8: Athassa gaṇajeṭṭhako tāpaso thokaṃ dāpesi. So taṃ khāditvā madhurarase bajjhitvā
atk-s0514a1:4584_9: – “jambupesiṃ me dethā”ti punappunaṃ yāci. Kuṭumbiko dhammaṃ suṇanto, “puttaka, mā
atk-s0514a1:4584_10: viravi, gehaṃ gantvā khādissasī”ti taṃ vañcetvā “imaṃ nissāya bhadantā ukkaṇṭheyyu”nti
atk-s0514a1:4584_11: taṃ samassāsento isigaṇaṃ anāpucchitvā gehaṃ gato. Gatakālato paṭṭhāya cassa putto
atk-s0514a1:4584_12: “jambupesiṃ me dethā”ti paridevi. Sujāto “isayopi ācikkhissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gato. Te
atk-s0514a1:4584_13: isayopi “idha ciraṃ vasimhā”ti himavantameva gatā. Ārāme isayo apassanto tassa jambuambapanasamocādīnaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4584_14: pesiyo madhusakkharacuṇṇasaṃyuttā adāsi. Tā tassa jivhagge ṭhapitamattā halāhalavisasadisā
atk-s0514a1:4584_15: honti. So sattāhaṃ nirāhāro hutvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Rājā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā dassento evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4585_0: Tato kāḷahatthi “ayaṃ rājā ativiya rasagiddho, aparānipissa udāharaṇāni āharissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4585_1: cintetvā, “mahārāja, viramāhī”ti āha. “Ahaṃ viramituṃ na sakkomī”ti. Deva, sace na
atk-s0514a1:4585_2: viramissasi, tuvaṃ ñātimaṇḍalato ceva rajjasirito ca parihāyissasi. Atītasmiñhi,
atk-s0514a1:4585_3: mahārāja, idheva bārāṇasiyaṃ pañcasīlarakkhakaṃ sotthiyakulaṃ ahosi. Tassa kulassa
atk-s0514a1:4585_4: ekaputtako ahosi. So mātāpitūnaṃ piyo manāpo ahosi paṇḍito byatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4585_5: pāragū. So samavayehi taruṇehi saddhiṃ gaṇabandhanena vicari. Sesā gaṇabandhā macchamaṃsādīni
atk-s0514a1:4585_6: khādantā suraṃ pivanti. Māṇavo maṃsādīni na khādati, suraṃ na pivati. Te mantayiṃsu
atk-s0514a1:4585_7: – “ayaṃ surāya apivanato amhākaṃ mūlaṃ na deti, upāyena naṃ suraṃ pāyessāmā”ti. Te
atk-s0514a1:4585_8: sannipatitvā, “samma, chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. “Samma, tumhe suraṃ pivatha,
atk-s0514a1:4585_9: ahaṃ suraṃ na pivāmi, tumheva gacchathā”ti. “Samma, tava pivanatthāya khīraṃ gaṇhāpessāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4585_10: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi. Dhuttā uyyānaṃ gantvā paduminipattesu tikhiṇasuraṃ bandhāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:4585_11: ṭhapayiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ pānakāle māṇavassa khīraṃ upanayiṃsu. Atha eko dhutto “pokkharamadhuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4585_12: bho, āharā”ti āharāpetvā paduminipattapuṭaṃ heṭṭhā chiddaṃ katvā aṅgulīhi mukhe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a1:4585_13: ākaḍḍhi. Evaṃ itarepi āharāpetvā piviṃsu. Māṇavo “kiṃ nāmeta”nti pucchi. “Pokkharamadhunāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4585_14: “Ahampi thokaṃ labhissāmi, detha bhonto”ti. Tassapi dāpayiṃsu. So pokkharamadhusaññāya
atk-s0514a1:4585_15: suraṃ pivi. Athassa aṅgārapakkamaṃsaṃ adaṃsu, tampi khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4586_0: Evamassa punappunaṃ pivantassa mattakāle “na etaṃ pokkharamadhu, surā esā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4586_1: So “ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ madhurarasaṃ na jāniṃ, āharatha, bho, sura”nti āha. Te āharitvā
atk-s0514a1:4586_2: punapi adaṃsu. Pipāsā mahatī ahosi. Athassa punapi yācantassa “khīṇā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4586_3: So “handa taṃ, bho, āharāpethā”ti aṅgulimuddikaṃ adāsi, so sakaladivasaṃ tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4586_4: pivitvā matto rattakkho kampanto vilapanto gehaṃ gantvā nipajji. Athassa pitā surāya
atk-s0514a1:4586_5: pivitabhāvaṃ ñatvā vigate matte, “tāta, ayuttaṃ te kataṃ sottiyakule jātena suraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4586_6: pivantena, mā puna evaṃ akāsī”ti āha. “Tāta, ko mayhaṃ doso”ti. “Surāya pivitabhāvo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4586_7: “Tāta, kiṃ kathesi, mayā evarūpaṃ madhurarasaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ aladdhapubba”nti. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0514a1:4586_8: punappunaṃ yāci. Sopi “na sakkomi viramitu”nti āha. Atha brāhmaṇo “evaṃ sante amhākaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4586_9: kulavaṃso ca ucchijjissati, dhanañca vinassissatī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4589: Na tvaṃ arahasi tāta, abhakkhaṃ bhakkhayetave”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4590: Tattha, māṇavāti, māṇava, tvaṃ abhirūpo asi, sotthiye kule jātopi asi. Abhakkhaṃ bhakkhayetaveti, tāta, tvaṃ abhakkhitabbayuttakaṃ bhakkhayituṃ na arahasi.
atk-s0514a1:4591_0: Evañca pana vatvā, “tāta, virama, sace na viramasi, ahaṃ taṃ ito gehā nikkhāmessāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4591_1: tava raṭṭhā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karissāmī”ti āha. Māṇavo “evaṃ santepi ahaṃ suraṃ jahituṃ
atk-s0514a1:4593: “Rasānaṃ aññataraṃ etaṃ, kasmā maṃ tvaṃ nivāraye;
atk-s0514a1:4594: Sohaṃ tattha gamissāmi, yattha lacchāmi edisaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4597: Yassa me dassanena tvaṃ, nābhinandasi brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4598: Tattha rasānanti loṇambilatittakakaṭukakhārikamadhurakasāvasaṅkhātānaṃ sattannaṃ rasānaṃ aññataraṃ uttamarasametaṃ majjaṃ nāma. Sovāhanti so ahaṃ eva. Nippatissāmīti nikkhamissāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4599: Evañca pana vatvā “nāhaṃ surāpānā viramissāmi, yaṃ te ruccati, taṃ karohī”ti āha. Atha brāhmaṇo “tayi amhe pariccajante mayampi taṃ pariccajissāmā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4602: Tvañca jamma vinassasu, yattha pattaṃ na taṃ suṇe”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4603: Tattha yattha pattanti yattha gataṃ taṃ “asukaṭṭhāne nāma vasatī”ti na suṇoma, tattha gacchāhīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4604_0: Atha naṃ vinicchayaṃ netvā aputtabhāvaṃ katvā nīharāpesi. So aparabhāge nippaccayo
atk-s0514a1:4604_1: kapaṇo jiṇṇapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā kapālahattho piṇḍāya caranto aññataraṃ kuṭṭaṃ nissāya
atk-s0514a1:4604_2: kālamakāsi. Idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā kāḷahatthi rañño dassetvā, “mahārāja, sace tvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4604_3: amhākaṃ vacanaṃ na karissasi, pabbājanīyakammaṃ te karissantī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4607: Pabbājessanti taṃ raṭṭhā, soṇḍaṃ māṇavakaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4608: Tattha dvipadindāti dvipadānaṃ inda, bho mahārāja, me mama vacanaṃ suṇohi tuvaṃ, evameva soṇḍaṃ māṇavakaṃ yathā taṃ bhavantaṃ raṭṭhato pabbājessanti.
atk-s0514a1:4609: Evaṃ kāḷahatthinā upamāya āhaṭāyapi rājā tato viramituṃ asakkonto aparampi udāharaṇaṃ dassetuṃ āha –
atk-s0514a1:4612: Accharaṃ kāmayantova, na so bhuñji na so pivi.
atk-s0514a1:4618: Aladdhā mānusaṃ maṃsaṃ, maññe hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4620_0: Tattha bhāvitattānāti bhāvitacittānaṃ tesaṃ pañcannaṃ isisatānaṃ. Accharaṃ kāmayantovāti
atk-s0514a1:4620_1: so kira tesaṃ isīnaṃ mahājambupesiyā khādanakāle anāgamanaṃ viditvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇā
atk-s0514a1:4620_2: na āgacchanti, sace katthaci gatā, jānissāmi, no ce, atha nesaṃ santike dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4620_3: uyyānaṃ gantvā isigaṇe vanditvā gaṇajeṭṭhakassa santike dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinnova
atk-s0514a1:4620_4: sūriye atthaṅgate uyyojiyamānopi “ajja idheva vasissāmī”ti vatvā isigaṇaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0514a1:4620_5: paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nipajji. Rattibhāge sakko devarājā devaccharāsaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0514a1:4620_6: saddhiṃ attano paricārikāhi isigaṇaṃ vandituṃ āgato, sakalārāmo ekobhāso ahosi. Sujāto
atk-s0514a1:4620_7: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti uṭṭhāya paṇṇasālachiddena olokento sakkaṃ isigaṇaṃ vandituṃ āgataṃ
atk-s0514a1:4620_8: devaccharāparivutaṃ disvā accharānaṃ saha dassanena rāgaratto ahosi. Sakko nisīditvā
atk-s0514a1:4620_9: dhammakathaṃ sutvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato. Kuṭumbikopi punadivase isigaṇaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0514a1:4620_10: pucchi – “bhante, ko nāmesa rattibhāge tumhākaṃ vandanatthāya āgato”ti? “Sakko, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4620_11: “Taṃ parivāretvā nisinnā kā nāmetā”ti? “Devaccharā nāmetā”ti. So isigaṇaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0514a1:4620_12: gehaṃ gantvā gatakālato paṭṭhāya “accharaṃ me detha, accharaṃ me dethā”ti vilapi.
atk-s0514a1:4620_13: Ñātakā parivāretvā “bhūtāviṭṭho nu kho”ti accharaṃ pahariṃsu. So “nāhaṃ etaṃ accharaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4620_14: kathemi, devaccharaṃ kathemī”ti vatvā “ayaṃ accharā”ti alaṅkaritvā ānītaṃ bhariyampi
atk-s0514a1:4620_15: gaṇikampi olokento “nāyaṃ accharā, yakkhinī esā, devaccharaṃ me dethā”ti vilapanto
atk-s0514a1:4620_16: nirāhāro hutvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a1:4621: “Accharaṃ kāmayantova, na so bhuñji na so pivī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4622_0: Kusaggenudakamādāya, samudde udakaṃ mineti, samma kāḷahatthi, yo kusaggeneva udakaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4622_1: gahetvā “ettakaṃ siyā mahāsamudde udaka”nti tena saddhiṃ upamāya mineyya, so kevalaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4622_2: mineyyeva, kusagge pana udakaṃ atiparittakameva. Yathā taṃ, evaṃ mānusakā kāmā dibbakāmānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4622_3: santike, tasmā so sujāto aññaṃ itthiṃ na olokesi, accharameva patthento mato. Evamevāti
atk-s0514a1:4622_4: yathā so dibbakāmaṃ alabhanto jīvitaṃ jahi, evaṃ ahampi uttamarasaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4623: Taṃ sutvā kāḷahatthi “ayaṃ rājā ativiya rasagiddho, saññāpessāmi na”nti sakajātikānaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā ākāsacarā suvaṇṇahaṃsāpi tāva vinaṭṭhāti dassetuṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4629: Abhakkhaṃ rāja bhakkhesi, tasmā pabbājayanti ta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4630_0: Tattha abhuttaparibhogenāti attano samānajātikānaṃ paribhogena. Abbhatthataṃ gatāti
atk-s0514a1:4630_1: sabbe maraṇameva pattā. Atīte kira cittakūṭe suvaṇṇaguhāyaṃ navuti haṃsasahassāni
atk-s0514a1:4630_2: vasanti. Te vassike cattāro māse na nikkhamanti, sace nikkhameyyuṃ, udakapuṇṇehi
atk-s0514a1:4630_3: pattehi uppatituṃ asakkontā mahāsamuddeyeva pateyyuṃ, tasmā na ca nikkhamanti. Upakaṭṭhe
atk-s0514a1:4630_4: pana vassakāle jātassarato sayaṃjātasāliyo āharitvā guhaṃ pūretvā sāliṃ khādantā
atk-s0514a1:4630_5: vasanti. Tesaṃ pana guhaṃ paviṭṭhakāle guhadvāre eko rathacakkappamāṇo uṇṇanābhi
atk-s0514a1:4630_6: nāma makkaṭako ekekasmiṃ māse ekekaṃ jālaṃ vinandhati. Tassa ekekaṃ suttaṃ gorajjuppamāṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4630_7: hoti. Haṃsā “taṃ jālaṃ bhindissatī”ti ekassa taruṇahaṃsassa dve koṭṭhāse denti. So
atk-s0514a1:4630_8: vigate deve purato gantvā taṃ jālaṃ bhindati. Tena maggena sesā gacchanti. Athekasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4630_9: kāle pañca māse vasso vuṭṭho ahosi. Haṃsā khīṇagocarā “kiṃ nu kho kattabba”nti mantetvā
atk-s0514a1:4630_10: “mayaṃ jīvantā aṇḍāni labhissāmā”ti paṭhamaṃ aṇḍāni khādiṃsu, tato potake, tato jiṇṇahaṃse.
atk-s0514a1:4630_11: Pañcamāsaccayena vassaṃ apagataṃ. Makkaṭako pañca jālāni vinandhi. Haṃsā sakajātikānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4630_12: maṃsaṃ khāditvā appathāmā jātā. Dviguṇakoṭṭhāsalābhī haṃsataruṇo jāle paharitvā cattāri
atk-s0514a1:4630_13: bhindi, pañcamaṃ chindituṃ nāsakkhi, tattheva laggi. Athassa sīsaṃ vijjhitvā makkaṭako
atk-s0514a1:4630_14: lohitaṃ pivi. Aññopi āgantvā jālaṃ pahari, sopi tattheva laggīti evaṃ sabbesaṃ makkaṭako
atk-s0514a1:4630_15: lohitaṃ pivi. Tadā dhataraṭṭhakulaṃ ucchinnanti vadanti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbe abbhatthataṃgatā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4631_0: Evameva tuvanti yathā ete haṃsā abhakkhaṃ sakajātikamaṃsaṃ khādiṃsu, tathā tvampi
atk-s0514a1:4631_1: khādasi, sakalanagaraṃ bhayappattaṃ, virama, mahārājāti. Tasmā pabbājayanti tanti
atk-s0514a1:4631_2: yasmā abhakkhaṃ sakajātikamaṃsaṃ bhakkhesi, tasmā ime nagaravāsino taṃ raṭṭhā pabbājayanti.
atk-s0514a1:4632_0: Rājā aññampi upamaṃ vattukāmo ahosi. Nāgarā pana uṭṭhāya, “sāmi senāpati, kiṃ karosi,
atk-s0514a1:4632_1: kiṃ manussamaṃsakhādakaṃ coraṃ gahetvā vicarasi, sace na viramissati, raṭṭhato naṃ
atk-s0514a1:4632_2: pabbājehī”ti vatvā nāssa kathetuṃ adaṃsu. Rājā bahūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā bhīto puna vattuṃ
atk-s0514a1:4632_3: nāsakkhi. Punapi naṃ senāpati “kiṃ mahārāja viramituṃ sakkhissasi, udāhu na sakkhissasī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4632_4: vatvā “na sakkomī”ti vutte sabbaṃ orodhagaṇañca puttadhītaro ca sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0514a1:4632_5: passe ṭhapetvā, “mahārāja, ime ñātimaṇḍale ceva amaccagaṇañca rajjasiriñca olokehi,
atk-s0514a1:4632_6: mā vinassi, virama manussamaṃsato”ti āha. Rājā “na mayhaṃ ete manussamaṃsato piyatarā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4632_7: vatvā “tena hi, mahārāja, imamhā nagarā ca raṭṭhā ca nikkhamathā”ti vutte, “kāḷahatthi,
atk-s0514a1:4632_8: na me rajjenattho, nagarā nikkhamāmi, ekaṃ pana me khaggañca rasakañca bhājanañca
atk-s0514a1:4632_9: dehī”ti āha. Athassa khaggañca maṃsapacanabhājanañca pacchiñca ukkhipāpetvā rasakañca
atk-s0514a1:4633_0: So khaggañca rasakañca ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ekasmiṃ nigrodhamūle
atk-s0514a1:4633_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ katvā tattha vasanto aṭavimagge ṭhatvā manusse māretvā āharitvā rasakassa
atk-s0514a1:4633_2: deti. Sopissa maṃsaṃ pacitvā upanāmeti. Evaṃ ubhopi jīvanti. Manussagahaṇakāle “ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4633_3: are manussacoro porisādo”ti vatvā tasmiṃ pakkhante koci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na
atk-s0514a1:4633_4: sakkoti, sabbe bhūmiyaṃ patanti. Tesu yaṃ icchati, taṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosīsaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:4633_5: āharitvā rasakassa deti. So ekadivasaṃ araññe kañci manussaṃ alabhitvā āgato rasakena
atk-s0514a1:4633_6: “kiṃ devā”ti vutte “uddhane ukkhaliṃ āropehī”ti āha. “Maṃsaṃ kahaṃ, devā”ti? “Labhissāmahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4633_7: maṃsa”nti. So “natthi me dāni jīvita”nti kampamāno uddhane aggiṃ katvā ukkhaliṃ āropesi.
atk-s0514a1:4633_8: Atha naṃ porisādo asinā māretvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādi. Tato paṭṭhāya ekakova jāto
atk-s0514a1:4633_9: sayameva pacitvā khādati. “Porisādo magge maggapaṭipanne hanatī”ti sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4634_0: Tadā eko sampannavibhavo brāhmaṇo pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vohāraṃ karonto pubbantato
atk-s0514a1:4634_1: aparantaṃ sañcarati. So cintesi – “porisādo nāma kira coro antarāmagge manusse māresi,
atk-s0514a1:4634_2: dhanaṃ datvā taṃ aṭaviṃ atikkamissāmī”ti. So aṭavimukhavāsīnaṃ manussānaṃ “tumhe
atk-s0514a1:4634_3: maṃ aṭavito atikkāmethā”ti sahassaṃ datvā tehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji. Gacchanto
atk-s0514a1:4634_4: ca brāhmaṇo sabbasatthaṃ purato katvā sayaṃ nhātānulitto sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0514a1:4634_5: setagoṇayutte sukhayānake nisinno tehi aṭavivāsikapurisehi parivuto sabbapacchato
atk-s0514a1:4634_6: agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe porisādo rukkhaṃ āruyha purise upadhārento sesamanussesu “kiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4634_7: imesu mayā khāditabbaṃ atthī”ti vigatacchando hutvā brāhmaṇaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:4634_8: taṃ khāditukāmatāya paggharitakheḷo ahosi. So tasmiṃ attano santikaṃ āgate rukkhato
atk-s0514a1:4634_9: oruyha “ahaṃ are porisādo”ti nāmaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā khaggaṃ parivattento vālukāya
atk-s0514a1:4634_10: tesaṃ akkhīni pūrento viya pakkhandi. Ekopi ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma natthi, sabbe bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4634_11: urena nipajjiṃsu. So sukhayānake nisinnaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pāde gahetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ adhosīsakaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4634_12: olambetvā sīsaṃ gopphakehi paharanto ukkhipitvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4635_0: Tadā te purisā uṭṭhāya, “bho, purisā mayaṃ brāhmaṇassa hatthato kahāpaṇasahassaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4635_1: gaṇhimhā, ko nāma amhākaṃ purisakāro, sakkontā vā asakkontā vā thokaṃ anubandhāmā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4635_2: vatvā anubandhiṃsu. Porisādopi nivattitvā olokento kañci aditvā saṇikaṃ pāyāsi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4635_3: khaṇe thāmasampanno eko sūrapuriso vegena taṃ pāpuṇi. So taṃ disvā ekaṃ vatiṃ laṅghanto
atk-s0514a1:4635_4: khadirakhāṇukaṃ akkami, khāṇuko piṭṭhipādena nikkhami. Lohitena paggharantena laṅghamāno
atk-s0514a1:4635_5: yāti. Atha naṃ so disvā, “bho, mayā esa viddho, kevalaṃ tumhe pacchato etha, gaṇhissāmi
atk-s0514a1:4635_6: na”nti āha. Te dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ anubandhiṃsu. So tehi anubaddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0514a1:4635_7: brāhmaṇaṃ vissajjetvā attānaṃ sotthimakāsi. Atha aṭavivāsikapurisā brāhmaṇassa laddhakālato
atk-s0514a1:4636_0: Porisādopi attano nigrodhamūlaṃ gantvā pārohantaraṃ pavisitvā nipanno, “ayye rukkhadevate,
atk-s0514a1:4636_1: sace me sattāhabbhantareyeva vaṇaṃ phāsukaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi, sakalajambudīpe ekasatakhattiyānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4636_2: galalohitena tava khandhaṃ dhovitvā antehi parikkhipitvā pañcamadhuramaṃsena balikammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4636_3: karissāmī”ti āyācanaṃ kari. Tassa annapānamaṃsaṃ alabhantassa sarīraṃ sussitvā antosattāheyeva
atk-s0514a1:4636_4: vaṇo phāsuko ahosi. So devatānubhāvena tassa phāsukabhāvaṃ sallakkhesi. So katipāhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4636_5: manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā balaṃ gahetvā cintesi – “bahupakārā me devatā, āyācanā assā
atk-s0514a1:4636_6: muccissāmī”ti. So khaggaṃ ādāya rukkhamūlato nikkhamitvā “rājāno ānessāmī”ti pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4636_7: Atha naṃ purimabhave yakkhakāle ekato manussamaṃsakhādako sahāyakayakkho anuvicarantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4636_8: disvā “ayaṃ mama atītabhave sahāyo”ti ñatvā, “samma, maṃ sañjānāsī”ti pucchi. “Na
atk-s0514a1:4636_9: sañjānāmī”ti. Athassa purimabhave katakāraṇaṃ kathesi. So taṃ sañjānitvā paṭisanthāramakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4636_10: “Kahaṃ nibbattosī”ti puṭṭho nibbattaṭṭhānañca raṭṭhā pabbājitakāraṇañca idāni vasanaṭṭhānañca
atk-s0514a1:4636_11: khāṇunā viddhakāraṇañca devatāya āyācanāmocanatthaṃ gamanakāraṇañca sabbaṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0514a1:4636_12: “tayāpi mametaṃ kiccaṃ nittharitabbaṃ, ubhopi gacchāma, sammā”ti āha. “Samma na gaccheyyāhaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4636_13: ekaṃ pana me kammaṃ atthi, ahaṃ kho pana anagghaṃ padalakkhaṇaṃ nāma ekaṃ mantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4636_14: jānāmi, so balañca javañca saddañca karoti, taṃ mantaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0514a1:4637_0: Porisādo mantaṃ uggahetvā tato paṭṭhāya vātajavo atisūro ahosi. So sattāhabbhantareyeva
atk-s0514a1:4637_1: ekasatarājāno uyyānādīni gacchante disvā vātavegena pakkhanditvā “ahaṃ are manussacoro
atk-s0514a1:4637_2: porisādo”ti nāmaṃ sāvetvā vagganto nadanto bhayappatte katvā pāde gahetvā adhosīsake
atk-s0514a1:4637_3: katvā paṇhiyā sīsaṃ paharanto vātavegena netvā hatthatalesu chiddāni katvā rajjuyā
atk-s0514a1:4637_4: āvunitvā nigrodharukkhe olambesi aggapādaṅgulīhi bhūmiyaṃ phusamānāhi. Te sabbe rājāno
atk-s0514a1:4637_5: vāte paharante milātakuraṇḍakadāmāni viya parivattantā olambiṃsu. “Sutasomo pana
atk-s0514a1:4637_6: me piṭṭhiācariyo hoti, sace gaṇhissāmi, sakalajambudīpo tuccho bhavissatī”ti taṃ
atk-s0514a1:4637_7: na nesi. So “balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti aggiṃ katvā sūle tacchanto nisīdi. Rukkhadevatā
atk-s0514a1:4637_8: taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā “mayhaṃ kiresa balikammaṃ karoti, vaṇampissa mayā kiñci phāsukaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4637_9: kataṃ natthi, idāni imesaṃ mahāvināsaṃ karissati, kiṃ nu kho kattabba”nti cintetvā
atk-s0514a1:4637_10: “ahaṃ etaṃ vāretuṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti cātumahārājikānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4637_11: kathetvā “nivāretha na”nti āha. Tehipi “na mayaṃ porisādassa kammaṃ nivāretuṃ sakkhissāmā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4637_12: vutte “ko sakkhissatī”ti pucchitvā “sakko, devarājā”ti sutvā sakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:4637_13: tamatthaṃ kathetvā “nivāretha na”nti āha. Sopi “nāhaṃ sakkomi nivāretuṃ, samatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4637_14: pana ācikkhissāmī”ti vatvā “konāmo”ti vutte “sadevake loke añño natthi, kururaṭṭhe
atk-s0514a1:4637_15: pana indapatthanagare korabyarājaputto sutasomo nāma taṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā damessati,
atk-s0514a1:4637_16: rājūnañca jīvitaṃ dassati, tañca manussamaṃsā oramāpessati, sakalajambudīpe amataṃ
atk-s0514a1:4637_17: viya dhammaṃ abhisiñcissati, sacepi rājūnaṃ jīvitaṃ dātukāmo, ‘sutasomaṃ ānetvā balikammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4638_0: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā khippaṃ āgantvā pabbajitavesena tassa avidūre pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4638_1: So padasaddena “rājā nu kho koci palāto bhavissatī”ti olokento taṃ disvā “pabbajitā
atk-s0514a1:4638_2: nāma khattiyāva, imaṃ gahetvā ekasataṃ pūretvā balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya asihattho
atk-s0514a1:4638_3: anubandhi, tiyojanaṃ anubandhitvāpi taṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi, gattehi sedā mucciṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4638_4: So cintesi – “ahaṃ pubbe hatthimpi assampi rathampi dhāvantaṃ anubandhitvā gaṇhāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4638_5: ajja imaṃ pabbajitaṃ sakāya gatiyā gacchantaṃ sabbathāmena dhāvantopi gaṇhituṃ na
atk-s0514a1:4638_6: sakkomi, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti. Tato so “pabbajitā nāma vacanakarā honti, ‘tiṭṭhā’ti
atk-s0514a1:4638_7: naṃ vatvā ṭhitaṃ gahessāmī”ti cintetvā “tiṭṭha, samaṇā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ tāva ṭhito,
atk-s0514a1:4638_8: tvaṃ pana dhāvituṃ vāyāmamakāsī”ti. Atha naṃ, “bho, pabbajitā nāma jīvitahetupi alikaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4638_9: na bhaṇanti, tvaṃ pana musāvādaṃ kathesī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4640: “Tiṭṭhāhīti mayā vutto, so tvaṃ gacchasi pammukho;
atk-s0514a1:4642: Idaṃ te samaṇāyuttaṃ, asiñca me maññasi kaṅkapatta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4643_0: Tassattho – samaṇa, tiṭṭhāhi iti vacanaṃ mayā vutto so tvaṃ pammukho parammukho hutvā
atk-s0514a1:4643_1: gacchasi, brahmacārini aṭṭhito samāno tvaṃ ṭhito amhi iti lapasi, asiñca me kaṅkapattaṃ maññasīti.
atk-s0514a1:4650: “Sace tvaṃ saddahasi rāja, sutaṃ gaṇhāhi khattiya;
atk-s0514a1:4651: Tena yaññaṃ yajitvāna, evaṃ saggaṃ gamissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4652_0: Tattha sadhammesūti, mahārāja, ahaṃ sakesu dasasu kusalakammapathadhammesu ṭhito
atk-s0514a1:4652_1: asmi bhavāmi. Na nāmagottanti tvaṃ pubbe daharakāle brahmadatto hutvā pitari kālakate
atk-s0514a1:4652_2: bārāṇasiṃ rajjaṃ labhitvā bārāṇasirājā jāto, taṃ nāmaṃ jahitvā porisādo hutvā idāni
atk-s0514a1:4652_3: kammāsapādo jāto, khattiyakule jātopi abhakkhaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ yasmā bhakkhesi, tasmā
atk-s0514a1:4652_4: attano nāmagottaṃ yathā parivattesi, tathā ahaṃ attano nāmagottaṃ na parivattayāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4652_5: Corañcāti loke corañca dasakusalakammapathesu aṭhitaṃ nāma vadanti. Ito cutanti ito
atk-s0514a1:4652_6: cutaṃ hutvā apāye niraye patiṭṭhitaṃ. Khattiya, bhūmipāla mahārāja, tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4652_7: sace saddahasi, sutasomaṃ gaṇhāhi, tena sutasomena yaññaṃ yajitvāna evaṃ saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:4652_8: Bho, porisāda musāvādi tayā mayhaṃ “sakalajambudīpe rājāno ānetvā bahikammaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4652_9: paṭissutaṃ, idāni ye vā te vā dubbalarājāno ānesi, jambudīpatale jeṭṭhakaṃ sutasomarājānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4652_10: sace tvaṃ na ānessasi, vacanaṃ te musā nāma hoti, tasmā sutasomaṃ gaṇhāhīti.
atk-s0514a1:4653_0: Evañca pana vatvā devatā pabbajitavesaṃ antaradhāpetvā sakena vaṇṇena ākāse taruṇasūriyo
atk-s0514a1:4653_1: viya jalamānā aṭṭhāsi. So tassā kathaṃ sutvā rūpañca oloketvā “kāsi tva”nti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4653_2: Imasmiṃ “rukkhe nibbattadevatā”ti. So “diṭṭhā me attano, devatā”ti tussitvā, “sāmi
atk-s0514a1:4653_3: devarāja, mā sutasomassa kāraṇā cintayi, attano rukkhaṃ pavisā”ti āha. Devatā tassa
atk-s0514a1:4653_4: passantasseva rukkhaṃ pāvisi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sūriyo atthaṅgato, cando uggato. Porisādo
atk-s0514a1:4653_5: vedaṅgakusalo nakkhattacāraṃ jānāti. So nabhaṃ oloketvā “sve phussanakkhattaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:4653_6: sutasomo nhāyituṃ uyyānaṃ gamissati, tattha gaṇhissāmi, ārakkho panassa mahā bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:4653_7: samantā tiyojanaṃ sakalanagaravāsino rakkhantā carissanti, asaṃvihite ārakkhe paṭhamayāmeyeva
atk-s0514a1:4653_8: migājinaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā maṅgalapokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā ṭhassāmī”ti cintetvā tattha
atk-s0514a1:4653_9: gantvā pokkharaṇiṃ oruyha padumapattena sīsaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi. Tassa tejena
atk-s0514a1:4653_10: macchakacchapādayo osakkitvā udakapariyante vaggavaggā hutvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4654_0: Kuto pana laddhoyaṃ tejoti? Pubbayogavasena. So hi kasapadasabalassa kāle khīrasalākabhattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4654_1: paṭṭhapesi, tena mahāthāmo ahosi. Aggisālañca kāretvā bhikkhusaṅghassa sītavinodanatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4654_2: aggiñca dārūni ca dārucchedanavāsiñca pharasuñca adāsi, tena tejavā ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4655_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ antouyyānaṃ gateyeva balavapaccūsasamaye samantā tiyojanaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4655_1: Rājāpi pātova bhuttapātarāso alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato caturaṅginiyā senāya
atk-s0514a1:4655_2: parivuto nagarato nikkhami. Tadā takkasilato nando nāma brāhmaṇo catasso satārahā
atk-s0514a1:4655_3: gāthāyo ādāya vīsatiyonajasataṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā taṃ nagaraṃ patvā dvāragāme vasitvā
atk-s0514a1:4655_4: sūriye uggate nagaraṃ pavisanto rājānaṃ pācīnadvārena nikkhantaṃ disvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā
atk-s0514a1:4655_5: jayāpesi. Rājā disācakkhuko hutvā gacchanto unnatappadese ṭhitassa brāhmaṇassa pasāritahatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4657: “Kismiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmi, atha kena atthena idhānupatto;
atk-s0514a1:4658: Akkhāhi me brāhmaṇa etamatthaṃ, kimicchasī demi tayajja patthita”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4659_0: Tassattho – bho brāhmaṇa, tava jātibhūmi kismiṃ raṭṭhe atthi nu, kena atthena payojanena
atk-s0514a1:4659_1: hetubhūtena ida imasmiṃ nagare anuppatto, bho brāhmaṇa, mayā pucchito so tvaṃ etamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4659_2: etaṃ payojanaṃ me mayhaṃ akkhāhi kathehi, tayā patthitavatthuṃ te tuyhaṃ ajja idāni
atk-s0514a1:4663: Taveva atthāya idhāgatosmi, suṇohi gāthā paramatthasaṃhitā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4664_0: Tattha dharaṇīmahissarāti bhūmipāla catasso gāthā kiṃ bhūtā?. Sugambhīratthā varasāgarūpamā,
atk-s0514a1:4664_1: taveva tava eva atthāya idha ṭhānaṃ anuppatto asmi bhavāmi. Suṇohīti kassapadasabalena
atk-s0514a1:4664_2: desitā paramatthasaṃhitā imā satārahā gāthāyo suṇohīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4665_0: Iti vatvā, “mahārāja, imā kassapadasabalena desitā catasso satārahā gāthāyo “tumhe
atk-s0514a1:4665_1: sutavittakā’ti sutvā tumhākaṃ desetuṃ āgatomhī”ti āha. Rājā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā, “ācariya,
atk-s0514a1:4665_2: suṭṭhu te āgataṃ, mayā pana nivattituṃ na sakkā, ajja phussanakkhattayogena sīsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4665_3: nhāyituṃ āgatomhi, ahaṃ punadivase āgantvā sossāmi, tvaṃ mā ukkaṇṭhī”ti vatvā “gacchatha
atk-s0514a1:4665_4: brāhmaṇassa asukagehe sayanaṃ paññāpetvā ghāsacchādanaṃ saṃvidahathā”ti amacce āṇāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:4665_5: uyyānaṃ pāvisi. Taṃ aṭṭhārasahatthena pākārena parikkhittaṃ ahosi. Taṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4665_6: saṅghaṭṭentā samantā hatthino parikkhipiṃsu, tato assā, tato rathā, tato dhanuggahā,
atk-s0514a1:4665_7: tato pattīti, saṅkhubhitamahāsamuddo viya unnādento balakāyo ahosi. Atha rājā oḷārikāni
atk-s0514a1:4665_8: ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā massukammaṃ kāretvā ubbaṭṭitasarīro pokkharaṇiyā anto rājavibhavena
atk-s0514a1:4665_9: nhatvā paccuttaritvā udakaggahaṇasāṭakena nivāsetvā aṭṭhāsi. Athassa dussagandhamālālaṅkāre
atk-s0514a1:4665_10: upanayiṃsu. Porisādo cintesi – “rājā alaṅkatakāle bhāriko bhavissati, sallahukakāleyeva
atk-s0514a1:4665_11: naṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti. So nadanto vagganto udake macchaṃ āluḷento vijjulatā viya matthake
atk-s0514a1:4665_12: khaggaṃ paribbhamento “ahaṃ are manussacoro porisādo”ti nāmaṃ sāvetvā aṅguliṃ nalāṭe
atk-s0514a1:4665_13: ṭhapetvā udakā uttari. Tassa saddaṃ sutvāva hatthārohā hatthīhi, assārohā assehi,
atk-s0514a1:4665_14: rathārohā rathehi bhassiṃsu. Balakāyo gahitagahitāni āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā urena bhūmiyaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0514a1:4666_0: Porisādo sutasomaṃ ukkhipitvā gaṇhi, sesarājāno pāde gahetvā adhosīsake katvā paṇhiyā
atk-s0514a1:4666_1: sīsaṃ paharanto gacchati. Bodhisattaṃ pana upagantvā onato ukkhipitvā khandhe nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:4666_2: So “dvārena gamanaṃ papañco bhavissatī”ti sammukhaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ pākāraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4666_3: laṅghitvā purato galitamadamattavāraṇakumbhe akkamitvā pabbatakūṭāni pātento viya
atk-s0514a1:4666_4: vātajavānaṃ assatarānaṃ piṭṭhe akkamanto pātetvā rathadhurarathasīsesu akkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:4666_5: bhamikaṃ bhamanto viya nīlaphalakāni nigrodhapattāni maddanto viya ekavegeneva tiyojanamattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4666_6: maggaṃ gantvā “atthi nu kho koci sutasomassatthāya pacchato āgacchanto”ti oloketvā
atk-s0514a1:4666_7: kañci aditvā saṇikaṃ gacchanto sutasomassa kesehi udakabindūni attano ure patitāni
atk-s0514a1:4666_8: disvā “maraṇassa abhāyanto nāma natthi, sutasomopi maraṇabhayena rodati maññe”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4668: “Na ve rudanti matimanto sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0514a1:4669: Dīpañhi etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ, yaṃ paṇḍitā sokanudā bhavanti.
atk-s0514a1:4671: “Attānaṃ ñātī udāhu puttadāraṃ, dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4672: Kimeva tvaṃ sutasomānutappe, korabyaseṭṭha vacanaṃ suṇoma teta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4673_0: Tattha, bho sutasoma mahārāja, ye paṇḍitā kiṃ bhūtā? Matimanto atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4673_1: jānanapaññāya samannāgatā, sappaññā vicaraṇapaññāya samannāgatā, bahussutā bahussutadharā
atk-s0514a1:4673_2: bahuṭṭhānacintino bahukāraṇacintanasīlā, te paṇḍitā maraṇabhaye uppanne sati bhītā
atk-s0514a1:4673_3: hutvā ve ekantena na rudanti na paridevanti. Dīpaṃ hīti, bho sutasoma mahārāja hi
atk-s0514a1:4673_4: kasmā pana vadāmi, mahāsamudde bhinnanāvānaṃ vāṇijakānaṃ janānaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ mahādīpaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4673_5: iva, evampi tathā etaṃ paṇḍitaṃ appaṭisaraṇānaṃ narānaṃ paramaṃ. Yaṃ yena kāraṇena
atk-s0514a1:4673_6: ye paṇḍitā sokīnaṃ janānaṃ sokanudā bhavanti, bho sutasoma mahārāja, tvaṃ maraṇabhayena
atk-s0514a1:4673_7: paridevīti maññe maññāmi. Attānanti, bho sutasoma mahārāja, attahetu udāhu ñātihetu
atk-s0514a1:4673_8: puttadārahetu udāhu dhaññadhanarajatajātarūpahetu kimeva tvaṃ kimeva dhammajātaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4673_9: tvaṃ anutappe anutappeyyāsi. Korabyaseṭṭha kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ seṭṭha uttama, bho mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:4676: “Nevāhamattānamanutthunāmi, na puttadāraṃ na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4677: Satañca dhammo carito purāṇo, taṃ saṅgaraṃ brāhmaṇassānutappe.
atk-s0514a1:4679: “Kato mayā saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4681_0: Tattha nevāhamattānamanutthunāmīti ahaṃ tāva attatthāya neva rodāmi na socāmi, imesampi
atk-s0514a1:4681_1: puttādīnaṃ atthāya na rodāmi na socāmi, apica kho pana sataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ carito purāṇadhammo
atk-s0514a1:4681_2: atthi, yaṃ saṅgaraṃ katvā pacchā anutappanaṃ nāma, taṃ saṅgaraṃ brāhmaṇassa ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4681_3: anusocāmīti attho. Saccānurakkhīti saccaṃ anurakkhanto. So hi brāhmaṇo takkasilato
atk-s0514a1:4681_4: kassapadasabalena desitā catasso satārahā gāthāyo ādāya āgato, tassāhaṃ āgantukavattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4681_5: kāretvā “nhatvā āgato suṇissāmi, yāva mamāgamanā āgamehī”ti saṅgaraṃ katvā āgato,
atk-s0514a1:4681_6: tvaṃ tā gāthāyo sotuṃ adatvāva maṃ gaṇhi. Sace maṃ vissajjesi, taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a1:4685: Amittahatthaṃ punarāvajeyya, korabyaseṭṭha na hi maṃ upesi.
atk-s0514a1:4687: “Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0514a1:4688: Madhuraṃ piyaṃ jīvitaṃ laddha rāja, kuto tuvaṃ ehisi me sakāsa”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4689_0: Tattha sukhīti sukhappatto hutvā. Maccumukhā pamuttoti mādisassa corassa hatthato
atk-s0514a1:4689_1: muttatāya maraṇamukhā mutto nāma hutvā amittahatthaṃ punarāvajeyya āgaccheyya, ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4689_2: etaṃ vacanaṃ neva abhisaddahāmi, korabyaseṭṭha tvaṃ mama santikaṃ na hi upesi. Muttoti
atk-s0514a1:4689_3: sutasoma tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthato mutto. Sakaṃ mandiranti rājadhānigehaṃ gantvā.
atk-s0514a1:4689_4: Kāmakāmīti kāmaṃ kāmayamāno. Laddhāti ativiya piyaṃ jīvitaṃ labhitvā tuvaṃ me mama
atk-s0514a1:4689_5: santike kuto kena nāma kāraṇena ehisi.
atk-s0514a1:4690: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto sīho viya asambhito āha –
atk-s0514a1:4692: “Mataṃ vareyya parisuddhasīlo, na jīvitaṃ garahito pāpadhammo;
atk-s0514a1:4693: Na hi taṃ naraṃ tāyati duggatīhi, yassāpi hetu alikaṃ bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0514a1:4695: “Sacepi vāto girimāvaheyya, cando ca sūriyo ca chamā pateyyuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4696: Sabbā ca najjo paṭisotaṃ vajeyyuṃ, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4698: “Nabhaṃ phaleyya udadhīpi susse, saṃvattaye bhūtadharā vasundharā;
atk-s0514a1:4699: Siluccayo meru samūlamuppate, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4700_0: Tattha mataṃ vareyyāti porisāda yo naro parisuddhasīlo jīvitahetu aṇumattampi pāpaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4700_1: na karoti, sīlasampanno hutvā vareyya taṃ maraṇaṃ iccheyya, garahito pāpadhammo taṃ
atk-s0514a1:4700_2: jīvitaṃ na seyyo, dussīlo puggalo yassāpi hetu attādinopi hetu alikaṃ vacanaṃ bhaṇeyya,
atk-s0514a1:4700_3: taṃ naraṃ evarūpaṃ duggatīhi taṃ alikaṃ na tāyate. Sacepi vāto girimāvaheyyāti, samma
atk-s0514a1:4700_4: porisāda, tayā saddhiṃ ekācariyakule sikkhito evarūpo sahāyako hutvā ahaṃ jīvitahetu
atk-s0514a1:4700_5: musā na kathemi, kiṃ na saddahasi. Sace puratthimādibhedo vāto uṭṭhāya mahantaṃ giriṃ
atk-s0514a1:4700_6: tūlapicuṃ viya ākāse āvaheyya, cando ca sūriyo ca attano attano vimānena saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4700_7: chamā pathaviyaṃ pateyyuṃ, sabbāpi najjo patisotaṃ vajeyyuṃ, bho porisāda, evarūpaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4700_8: vacanaṃ sace bhaṇeyya, taṃ saddahitabbaṃ, ahaṃ musā bhaṇeyyaṃ iti vacanaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4700_9: janehi vuttaṃ, na tveva taṃ saddahitabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4701_0: Evaṃ vuttepi so na saddahiyeva. Atha bodhisatto “ayaṃ mayhaṃ na saddahati, sapathenapi
atk-s0514a1:4701_1: naṃ saddahāpessāmī”ti cintetvā, “samma porisāda, khandhato tāva maṃ otārehi, sapathaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4701_2: katvā taṃ saddahāpessāmī”ti vutte tena otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapito sapathaṃ karonto āha –
atk-s0514a1:4703: “Asiñca sattiñca parāmasāmi, sapathampi te samma ahaṃ karomi;
atk-s0514a1:4704: Tayā pamutto anaṇo bhavitvā, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissa”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4705_0: Tassattho – samma porisāda, sace icchasi, evarūpehi āvudhehi saṃvihitārakkhe khattiyakule
atk-s0514a1:4705_1: me nibbatti nāma mā hotūti asiñca sattiñca parāmasāmi. Sace aññehi rājūhi akattabbaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4705_2: aññaṃ vā yaṃ icchasi, taṃ sapathampi te, samma, ahaṃ karomi. Yathāhaṃ tayā pamutto
atk-s0514a1:4705_3: gantvā brāhmaṇassa anaṇo hutvā saccamanurakkhanto punarāgamissāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:4706_0: Tato porisādo “ayaṃ sutasomo khattiyehi akattabbaṃ sapathaṃ karoti, kiṃ me iminā,
atk-s0514a1:4706_1: esa etu vā mā vā, ahampi khattiyarājā, mameva bāhulohitaṃ gahetvā devatāya balikammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4708: “Yo te kato saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4711: Atha naṃ mahāsatto, “samma, mā cintayi, catasso satārahā gāthā sutvā dhammakathikassa pūjaṃ katvā pātovāgamissāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4713: “Yo me kato saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4715_0: Atha naṃ porisādo, “mahārāja, tumhe khattiyehi akattabbaṃ sapathaṃ karittha, taṃ
atk-s0514a1:4715_1: anussareyyāthā”ti vatvā, “samma porisāda, tvaṃ maṃ daharakālato paṭṭhāya jānāsi,
atk-s0514a1:4715_2: hāsenapi me musā na kathitapubbā, sohaṃ idāni rajje patiṭṭhito dhammādhammaṃ jānanto
atk-s0514a1:4715_3: kiṃ musā kathessāmi, saddahasi mayhaṃ, ahaṃ te sve balikammaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti saddahāpito
atk-s0514a1:4715_4: “tena hi gaccha, mahārāja, tumhesu anāgatesu balikammaṃ na bhavissati, devatāpi tumhehi
atk-s0514a1:4715_5: vinā na sampaṭicchati, mā me balikammassa antarāyaṃ karitthā”ti mahāsattaṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:4715_6: So rāhumukhā muttacando viya nāgabalo thāmasampanno khippameva nagaraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:4715_7: Senāpissa “sutasomo rājā paṇḍito madhuradhammakathiko ekaṃ dve kathā kathetuṃ labhanto
atk-s0514a1:4715_8: porisādaṃ dametvā sīhamukhā muttamattavāraṇo viya āgamissati, ‘ime rājānaṃ porisādassa
atk-s0514a1:4715_9: datvā āgatā’ti mahājano garahissatī”ti cintetvā bahinagareyeva khandhāvāraṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:4715_10: ṭhitā taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā vanditvā “kacci, mahārāja, porisādena
atk-s0514a1:4715_11: kilamito”ti paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “porisādena mayhaṃ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṃ kataṃ, tathārūpo
atk-s0514a1:4715_12: nāma caṇḍo sāhasiko porisādo mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā maṃ vissajjesī”ti vutte rājānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4715_13: alaṅkaritvā hatthikkhandhaṃ āropetvā parivāretvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. Taṃ disvā sabbe nāgarā tussiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4716_0: Sopi dhammagarutāya dhammasoṇḍatāya mātāpitaro adisvāva “pacchāpi ne passissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4716_1: rājanivesanaṃ pavisitvā rājāsane nisīditvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā massukammādīnissa
atk-s0514a1:4716_2: āṇāpetvā taṃ kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittaṃ vatthālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ katvā ānetvā
atk-s0514a1:4716_3: dassitakāle sayaṃ pacchā nhatvā tassa attano bhojanaṃ dāpetvā tasmiṃ bhutte sayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4716_4: bhuñjitvā taṃ mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā dhammagarukatāya assa gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0514a1:4716_5: pūjaṃ katvā sayaṃ nīce āsane nisīditvā “tumhehi mayhaṃ ābhatā satārahā gāthā suṇoma
