atk-s0514a1:4716_6: ācariyā”ti yāci. Tamatthaṃ dīpento satthā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4718: “Mutto ca so porisādassa hatthā, gantvāna taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca;
atk-s0514a1:4719: Suṇomi gāthāyo satārahāyo, yā me sutā assu hitāya brahme”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4721_0: Atha brāhmaṇo bodhisattena yācitakāle gandhehi hatthe ubbaṭṭetvā pasibbakā manoramaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4721_1: potthakaṃ nīharitvā ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā “tena hi, mahārāja, kassapadasabalena
atk-s0514a1:4721_2: desitā rāgamadādinimmadanā amatamahānibbānasampāpikā catasso satārahā gāthāyo suṇohī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4724: Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahu saṅgamo.
atk-s0514a1:4727: Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0514a1:4729: “Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
atk-s0514a1:4730: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
atk-s0514a1:4732: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0514a1:4733: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4734_0: Tattha sakidevāti ekavārameva. Sabbhīti sappurisehi. Sā nanti sā sabbhi sappurisehi
atk-s0514a1:4734_1: saṅgati samāgamo ekavāraṃ pavattopi taṃ puggalaṃ pāleti rakkhati. Nāsabbhīti asappurisehi
atk-s0514a1:4734_2: pana bahu sucirampi kato saṅgamo ekaṭṭhāne nivāso na pāleti, na thāvaro hotīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4734_3: Samāsethāti saddhiṃ nisīdeyya, sabbepi iriyāpathe paṇḍiteheva saddhiṃ pavatteyyāti
atk-s0514a1:4734_4: attho. Santhavanti mittasanthavaṃ. Sataṃ saddhammanti paṇḍitānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4734_5: saddhammaṃ. Seyyoti etaṃ dhammaṃ ñatvā vaḍḍhiyeva hoti, hāni nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4734_6: Rājarathāti rājūnaṃ ārohanīyarathā. Sucittāti suparikammakatā. Sabbhi pavedayantīti
atk-s0514a1:4734_7: buddhādayo santo “sabbhī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sobhanaṃ uttamaṃ nibbānaṃ pavedenti thomenti,
atk-s0514a1:4734_8: so nibbānasaṅkhāto sataṃ dhammo jaraṃ na upeti na jīrati. Nabhanti ākāso. Dūreti
atk-s0514a1:4734_9: pathavī hi sappatiṭṭhā sagahaṇā, ākāso nirālambo appatiṭṭho, iti ubho ete ekābaddhāpi
atk-s0514a1:4734_10: visaṃyogaṭṭhena anupalittaṭṭhena ca dūre nāma honti. Pāranti orimatīrato paratīraṃ. Tadāhūti taṃ āhu.
atk-s0514a1:4735_0: Iti brāhmaṇo catasso satārahā gāthā kassapadasabalena desitaniyāmena desetvā tuṇhī
atk-s0514a1:4735_1: ahosi. Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “sapphalaṃ vata me āgamana”nti tuṭṭhacitto hutvā “imā
atk-s0514a1:4735_2: gāthā neva sāvakabhāsitā, na isibhāsitā, na kenaci bhāsitā, sabbaññunāva bhāsitā,
atk-s0514a1:4735_3: kiṃ nu kho agghantī”ti cintetvā “imāsaṃ sakalampi cakkavāḷaṃ yāva brahmalokā sattaratanapuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4735_4: katvā dadamānopi neva anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti, ahaṃ kho panassa tiyojanasate kururaṭṭhe
atk-s0514a1:4735_5: sattayojanike indapatthanagare rajjaṃ dātuṃ pahomi, atthi nu khvassa rajjaṃ kāretuṃ
atk-s0514a1:4735_6: bhāgya”nti aṅgavijjānubhāvena olokento nāddasa. Tato senāpatiṭṭhānādīni olokento
atk-s0514a1:4735_7: ekagāmabhojakamattassapi bhāgyaṃ adisvā dhanalābhassa olokento koṭidhanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:4735_8: oloketvā catunnaṃyeva kahāpaṇasahassānaṃ bhāgyaṃ disvā “ettakena naṃ pūjessāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4735_9: catasso sahassatthavikā dāpetvā, “ācariya, tumhe aññesaṃ khattiyānaṃ imā gāthā desetvā
atk-s0514a1:4735_10: kittakaṃ dhanaṃ labhathā”ti pucchati. “Ekekāya gāthāya sataṃ sataṃ, mahārāja, teneva
atk-s0514a1:4735_11: tā satārahā nāma jātā”ti. Atha naṃ mahāsatto, “ācariya, tvaṃ attanā gahetvā vikkeyyabhaṇḍassa
atk-s0514a1:4735_12: agghampi na jānāsi, ito paṭṭhāya ekekā gāthā sahassārahā nāma hontū”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4738: Cattāri tvaṃ sahassāni, khippaṃ gaṇhāhi brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4739: Tassattho – brāhmaṇa, imā gāthā sahassiyā sahassārahā, imā gāthā satārahā na hi hontu, brāhmaṇa, tvaṃ cattāri sahassāni khippaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0514a1:4740_0: Athassa ekaṃ sukhayānakaṃ datvā “brāhmaṇaṃ sotthinā gehaṃ sampāpethā”ti purise āṇāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:4740_1: taṃ uyyojesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe “sutasomaraññā satārahā gāthā sahassārahā katvā pūjitā
atk-s0514a1:4740_2: sādhu sādhū”ti mahāsādhukārasaddo ahosi. Tassa mātāpitaro taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ saddo
atk-s0514a1:4740_3: nāmesā”ti pucchitvā yathābhūtaṃ sutvā attano dhanalobhatāya mahāsattassa kujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4740_4: Sopi brāhmaṇaṃ uyyojetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Athassa pitā “kathaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4740_5: tāta, evarūpassa sāhasikassa corassa hatthato muttosī”ti paṭisanthāramattampi akatvā
atk-s0514a1:4740_6: attano dhanalobhatāya “saccaṃ kira, tāta, tayā catasso gāthā sutvā cattāri sahassāni
atk-s0514a1:4742: “Āsītiyā nāvutiyā ca gāthā, satārahā cāpi bhaveyya gāthā;
atk-s0514a1:4743: Paccattameva sutasoma jānahi, sahassiyā nāma kā atthi gāthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4744: Tassattho – gāthā nāma, tāta, āsītiyā ca nāvutiyā ca satārahā cāpi bhaveyya, paccattameva attanāva jānāhi, sahassārahā nāma gāthā kā kassa santike atthīti.
atk-s0514a1:4745: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “nāhaṃ, tāta, dhanena vuddhiṃ icchāmi, sutena pana icchāmī”ti saññāpento āha –
atk-s0514a1:4747: “Icchāmi vohaṃ sutavuddhimattano, santoti maṃ sappurisā bhajeyyuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4748: Ahaṃ savantīhi mahodadhīva, na hi tāta tappāmi subhāsitena.
atk-s0514a1:4750: “Aggi yathā tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ dahanto, na kappatī sāgarova nadībhi;
atk-s0514a1:4751: Evampi te paṇḍitā rājaseṭṭha, sutvā na tappanti subhāsitena.
atk-s0514a1:4753: “Sakassa dāsassa yadā suṇomi, gāthaṃ ahaṃ atthavatiṃ janinda;
atk-s0514a1:4754: Tameva sakkacca nisāmayāmi, na hi tāta dhammesu mamatthi tittī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4755_0: Tattha voti nipātamattaṃ. “Santo”ti ete ca maṃ bhajeyyuṃ iti icchāmi. Savantīhīti
atk-s0514a1:4755_1: nadīhi. Sakassāti tiṭṭhatu, nanda, brāhmaṇo, yadā ahaṃ attano dāsassapi santike suṇomi,
atk-s0514a1:4755_2: tāta, dhammesu mama titti na hi atthīti.
atk-s0514a1:4756_0: Evañca pana vatvā “mā maṃ, tāta, dhanahetu paribhāsasi, ahaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā āgamissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4756_1: sapathaṃ katvā āgato, idānāhaṃ porisādassa santikaṃ gamissāmi, idaṃ te rajjaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4758: “Idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sayoggaṃ, sakāyuraṃ sabbakāmūpapannaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4759: Kiṃ kāmahetu paribhāsasi maṃ, gacchāmahaṃ porisādassa ñatte”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4761: Tasmiṃ samaye piturañño hadayaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi. So, “tāta sutasoma, kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi, mayaṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya coraṃ gahessāmā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4763: “Attānurakkhāya bhavanti hete, hatthārohā rathikā pattikā ca;
atk-s0514a1:4764: Assārohā ye ca dhanuggahāse, senaṃ payuñjāma hanāma sattu”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4765: Tattha hanāmāti sace evaṃ payojitā senā taṃ gahetuṃ na sakkonti, atha naṃ sakalaraṭṭhavāsino gahetvā gantvā hanāma sattuṃ, mārema taṃ amhākaṃ paccāmittanti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4766_0: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro assupuṇṇamukhā rodamānā vilapantā, “tāta, mā gaccha, gantuṃ na
atk-s0514a1:4766_1: labbhā”ti yāciṃsu. Soḷasasahassā nāṭakitthiyopi sesaparijanopi “amhe anāthe katvā
atk-s0514a1:4766_2: kuhiṃ gacchasi, devā”ti parideviṃsu. Sakalanagare koci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0514a1:4766_3: “sutasomo porisādassa kira paṭiññaṃ datvā āgato, idāni catasso satārahā gāthā sutvā
atk-s0514a1:4766_4: dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ katvā mātāpitaro vanditvā punapi kira corassa santikaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4766_5: gamissatī”ti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Sopi mātāpitūnaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4768: “Sudukkaraṃ porisādo akāsi, jīvaṃ gahetvāna avassajī maṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4769: Taṃ tādisaṃ pubbakiccaṃ saranto, dubbhe ahaṃ tassa kathaṃ janindā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4770: Tattha jīvaṃ gahetvānāti jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā. Taṃ tādisanti taṃ tena kataṃ tathārūpaṃ. Pubbakiccanti purimaṃ upakāraṃ. Janindāti pitaraṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a1:4771_0: So mātāpitaro assāsetvā, “amma tātā, tumhe mayhaṃ mā cintayittha, katakalyāṇo ahaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4771_1: mama chakāmassaggissariyaṃ na dullabha”nti mātāpitaro vanditvā āpucchitvā sesajanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4771_2: anusāsitvā pakkāmi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4773: “Vanditvā so pitaraṃ mātarañca, anusāsitvā negamañca balañca;
atk-s0514a1:4774: Saccavādī saccānurakkhamāno, agamāsi so yattha porisādo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4775_0: Tattha saccānurakkhamānoti saccaṃ anurakkhamāno. Agamāsīti taṃ rattiṃ nivesaneyeva
atk-s0514a1:4775_1: vasitvā punadivase aruṇuggamanavelāya mātāpitaro vanditvā āpucchitvā sesajanaṃ anusāsitvā
atk-s0514a1:4775_2: assumukhena nānappakāraṃ paridevantena itthāgārādinā mahājanena anugato nagarā nikkhamma
atk-s0514a1:4775_3: taṃ janaṃ nivattetuṃ asakkonto mahāmagge daṇḍakena tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhitvā “sace
atk-s0514a1:4775_4: mayi sineho atthi, imaṃ mā atikkamiṃsū”ti āha. Mahājano sīlavato tejavantassa āṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4775_5: atikkamituṃ asakkonto mahāsaddena paridevamāno taṃ sīhavijambhitena gacchantaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0514a1:4775_6: tasmiṃ dassanūpacāraṃ atikkante ekaravaṃ ravanto nagaraṃ pāvisi. Sopi āgatamaggeneva
atk-s0514a1:4775_7: tassa santikaṃ gato. Tena vuttaṃ “agamāsi so yattha porisādo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4776_0: Tato porisādo cintesi – “sace mama sahāyo sutasomo āgantukāmo, āgacchatu, anāgantukāmo,
atk-s0514a1:4776_1: anāgacchatu, rukkhadevatā yaṃ mayhaṃ icchati, taṃ karotu, ime rājāno māretvā pañcamadhuramaṃsena
atk-s0514a1:4776_2: balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti citakaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā “aṅgārarāsi tāva hotū”ti tassa
atk-s0514a1:4776_3: sūle tacchantassa nisinnakāle sutasomo āgato. Atha naṃ porisādo disvā tuṭṭhacitto,
atk-s0514a1:4776_4: “samma, gantvā kattabbakiccaṃ te kata”nti pucchi. Mahāsatto, “āma mahārāja, kassapadasabalena
atk-s0514a1:4776_5: desitā gāthā me sutā, dhammakathikassa ca sakkāro kato, tasmā gantvā kattabbakiccaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4778: “Kato mayā saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4781: Tattha yajassūti maṃ māretvā devatāya vā yaññaṃ yajassu, maṃsaṃ vā me khādāhīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4782_0: Taṃ sutvā porisādo “ayaṃ rājā na bhāyati, vigatamaraṇabhayo hutvā katheti, kissa
atk-s0514a1:4782_1: nu kho esa ānubhāvo”ti cintetvā “aññaṃ natthi, ayaṃ ‘kassapadasabalena desitā gāthā
atk-s0514a1:4782_2: me sutā’ti vadati, tāsaṃ etena āsubhāvena bhavitabbaṃ, ahampi taṃ kathāpetvā tā gāthāyo
atk-s0514a1:4782_3: sossāmi, evaṃ ahampi nibbhayo bhavissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4784: “Na hāyate khāditaṃ mayhaṃ pacchā, citakā ayaṃ tāva sadhūmikāva;
atk-s0514a1:4785: Niddhūmake pacitaṃ sādhupakkaṃ, suṇomi gāthāyo satārahāyo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4786_0: Tattha khāditanti khādanaṃ. Taṃ khādanaṃ mayhaṃ pacchā vā pure vā na parihāyati,
atk-s0514a1:4786_1: pacchāpi hi tvaṃ mayā khāditabbova. Niddhūmake pacitanti niddhūme nijjhāle aggimhi
atk-s0514a1:4787: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ porisādo pāpadhammo, imaṃ thokaṃ niggahetvā lajjāpetvā kathessāmī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4789: “Adhammiko tvaṃ porisādakāsi, raṭṭhā ca bhaṭṭho udarassa hetu;
atk-s0514a1:4790: Dhammañcimā abhivadanti gāthā, dhammo ca adhammo ca kuhiṃ sameti.
atk-s0514a1:4793: Natthi saccaṃ kuto dhammo, kiṃ sutena karissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4794_0: Tattha dhammañcimāti imā ca gāthā navalokuttaradhammaṃ abhivadanti. Kuhiṃ sametīti
atk-s0514a1:4794_1: kattha samāgacchati. Dhammo hi sugatiṃ pāpeti nibbānaṃ vā, adhammo duggatiṃ. Kuto
atk-s0514a1:4794_2: dhammoti vacīsaccamattampi natthi, kuto dhammo. Kiṃ sutenāti tvaṃ etena sutena kiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4794_3: karissasi, mattikābhājanaṃ viya hi sīhavasāya abhājanaṃ tvaṃ dhammassa.
atk-s0514a1:4795: So evaṃ kathitepi neva kujjhi. Kasmā? Mahāsattassa mettābhāvanāya mahattena. Atha naṃ “kiṃ pana samma sutasoma ahameva adhammiko”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4797: “Yo maṃsahetu migavaṃ careyya, yo vā hane purisamattahetu;
atk-s0514a1:4798: Ubhopi te pecca samā bhavanti, kasmā no adhammikaṃ brūsi maṃ tva”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4799_0: Tattha kasmā noti ye jambudīpatale rājāno alaṅkatapaṭiyattā mahābalaparivārā rathavaragatā
atk-s0514a1:4799_1: migavaṃ carantā tikhiṇehi sarehi mige vijjhitvā mārenti, te avatvā kasmā tvaṃ maññeva
atk-s0514a1:4799_2: adhammikanti vadati. Yadi te niddosā, ahampi niddoso evāti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a1:4800: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto tassa laddhiṃ bhindanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4802: “Pañca pañca na khā bhakkhā, khattiyena pajānatā;
atk-s0514a1:4803: Abhakkhaṃ rāja bhakkhesi, tasmā adhammiko tuva”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4804_0: Tassattho – samma porisāda, khattiyena nāma khattiyadhammaṃ jānantena pañca pañca
atk-s0514a1:4804_1: hatthiādayo daseva sattā maṃsavasena na khā bhakkhā na kho khāditabbayuttakā. “Na
atk-s0514a1:4804_2: kho”tveva vā pāṭho. Aparo nayo khattiyena khattiyadhammaṃ jānantena pañcanakhesu
atk-s0514a1:4804_3: sattesu sasako, sallako, godhā, kapi kummoti ime pañceva sattā bhakkhitabbayuttakā,
atk-s0514a1:4804_4: na aññe, tvaṃ pana abhakkhaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ bhakkhesi, tena adhammikoti.
atk-s0514a1:4805: Iti so niggahaṃ patvā aññaṃ nissaraṇaṃ adisvā attano pāpaṃ paṭicchādento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4807: “Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0514a1:4808: Amittahatthaṃ punarāgatosi, na khattadhamme kusalosi rājā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4809_0: Tattha na khattadhammeti tvaṃ khattiyadhammasaṅkhāte nītisatthe na kusalosi, attano
atk-s0514a1:4809_1: atthānatthaṃ na jānāsi, akāraṇeneva te loke paṇḍitoti kitti patthaṭā, ahaṃ pana te
atk-s0514a1:4809_2: paṇḍitabhāvaṃ na passāmi na jānāmi, atibālosīhi vadati.
atk-s0514a1:4810: Atha naṃ mahāsatto, “samma, khattiyadhamme kusalena nāma mādiseneva bhavitabbaṃ. Ahañhi taṃ jānāmi, na pana tadatthāya paṭipajjāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4812: “Ye khattadhamme kusalā bhavanti, pāyena te nerayikā bhavanti;
atk-s0514a1:4813: Tasmā ahaṃ khattadhammaṃ pahāya, saccānurakkhī punarāgatosmi;
atk-s0514a1:4815: Tattha kusalāti tadatthāya paṭipajjanakusalā. Pāyenāti yebhuyyena nerayikā. Ye pana tattha na nibbattanti, te sesāpāyesu nibbattanti.
atk-s0514a1:4819: Sabbaṃ tahiṃ labhasi sāmitāya, saccena kiṃ passasi ānisaṃsa”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4820_0: Tattha pāsādavāsāti, samma sutasoma, tava tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā dibbavimānakappā
atk-s0514a1:4820_1: tayo nivāsapāsādā. Pathavīgavāssāti pathavī ca gāvo ca assā ca bahū. Kāmitthiyoti
atk-s0514a1:4820_2: kāmavatthubhūtā itthiyo. Kāsikacandanañcāti kāsikavatthañca lohitacandanañca. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4820_3: tahinti etañca aññañca upabhogaparibhogaṃ sabbaṃ tvaṃ tahiṃ attano nagare sāmitāya
atk-s0514a1:4820_4: labhasi, sāmī hutvā yathā icchasi, tathā paribhuñjituṃ labhati, so tvaṃ sabbametaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4820_5: pahāya saccānurakkhī idhāgacchanto saccena kiṃ ānisaṃsaṃ passasīti.
atk-s0514a1:4823: “Ye kecime atthi rasā pathabyā, saccaṃ tesaṃ sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4824: Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, taranti jātimaraṇassa pāra”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4825_0: Tattha sādutaranti yasmā sabbepi rasā sattānaṃ saccakāleyeva paṇītā madhurā honti,
atk-s0514a1:4825_1: tasmā saccaṃ tesaṃ sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ, yasmā vā viratisaccavacīsacce ṭhitā jātimaraṇasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0514a1:4825_2: tebhūmakavaṭṭassa pāraṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ taranti pāpuṇanti, tasmāpi taṃ sādutaranti.
atk-s0514a1:4826_0: Evamassa mahāsatto sacce ānisaṃsaṃ kathesi. Tato porisādo vikasitapadumapuṇṇacandasassirikamevassa
atk-s0514a1:4826_1: mukhaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ sutasomo aṅgāracitakaṃ mañca sūlaṃ tacchantaṃ passati, cittutrāsamattampissa
atk-s0514a1:4826_2: natthi, kiṃ nu kho esa satārahagāthānaṃ ānubhāvo, udāhu saccassa, aññasseva vā kassacī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4828: “Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0514a1:4829: Amittahatthaṃ punarāgatosi, na hi nūna te maraṇabhayaṃ janinda;
atk-s0514a1:4833: “Katā me kalyāṇā anekarūpā, yaññā yiṭṭhā ye vipulā pasatthā;
atk-s0514a1:4834: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4836: “Katā me kalyāṇā anekarūpā, yaññā yiṭṭhā ye vipulā pasatthā;
atk-s0514a1:4837: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
atk-s0514a1:4839: “Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4840: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4842: “Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4843: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
atk-s0514a1:4845: “Ñātīsu mittesu katā me kārā, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4846: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4848: “Ñātīsu mittesu katā me kārā, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4849: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
atk-s0514a1:4851: “Dinnaṃ me dānaṃ bahudhā bahūnaṃ, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0514a1:4852: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4854: “Dinnaṃ me dānaṃ bahudhā bahūnaṃ, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0514a1:4855: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisādā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4856_0: Tattha kalyāṇāti kalyāṇakammā. Anekarūpāti dānādivasena anekavidhā. Yaññāti dasavidhadānavatthupariccāgavasena
atk-s0514a1:4856_1: ativipulā paṇḍitehi pasatthā yaññāpi yiṭṭhā pavattitā. Dhamme ṭhitoti evaṃ dhamme
atk-s0514a1:4856_2: patiṭṭhito mādiso ko nāma maraṇassa bhāyeyya. Anānutappanti anānutappamāno. Dhammena
atk-s0514a1:4856_3: me issariyaṃ pasatthanti dasavidhaṃ rājadhammaṃ akopetvā dhammeneva mayā rajjaṃ pasāsitaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4856_4: Kārāti ñātīsu ñātikiccāni, mittesu ca mittakiccāni. Dānanti savatthukacetanā. Bahudhāti
atk-s0514a1:4856_5: bahūhi ākārehi. Bahūnanti na pañcannaṃ, na dasannaṃ, satassapi sahassassapi satasahassassapi
atk-s0514a1:4856_6: dinnameva. Santappitāti gahitagahitabhājanāni pūretvā suṭṭhu tappitā.
atk-s0514a1:4857_0: Taṃ sutvā porisādo “ayaṃ sutasomamahārājā sappuriso ñāṇasampanno madhuradhammakathiko,
atk-s0514a1:4857_1: sacāhaṃ etaṃ khādeyyaṃ, muddhā me sattadhā phaleyya, pathavī vā pana me vivaraṃ dadeyyā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4857_2: bhītatasito hutvā, “samma, na tvaṃ mayā khāditabbarūpo”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4860: Muddhāpi tassa viphaleyya sattadhā, yo tādisaṃ saccavādiṃ adeyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4861: Tattha visanti tattheva māraṇasamatthaṃ halāhalavisaṃ. Jalitanti attano visatejena jalitaṃ teneva uggatejaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ viya carantaṃ āsīvisaṃ vā pana so gīvāya gaṇheyya.
atk-s0514a1:4862_0: Iti so mahāsattaṃ “halāhalavisasadiso tvaṃ, ko taṃ khādissatī”ti vatvā gāthā sotukāmo
atk-s0514a1:4862_1: taṃ yācitvā tena dhammagāravajananatthaṃ “evarūpānaṃ anavajjagāthānaṃ tvaṃ abhājana”nti
atk-s0514a1:4862_2: paṭikkhittopi “sakalajambudīpe iminā sadiso paṇḍito natthi, ayaṃ mama hatthā muccitvā
atk-s0514a1:4862_3: gantvā tā gāthā sutvā dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ katvā nalāṭena maccuṃ ādāya punāgato,
atk-s0514a1:4862_4: ativiya sādhurūpā gāthā bhavissantī”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ sañjātadhammassavanādaro hutvā
atk-s0514a1:4865: Api gāthā suṇitvāna, dhamme me ramate mano”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4866: Tassattho – “samma sutasoma, narā nāma dhammaṃ sutvā kalyāṇampi pāpakampi jānanti, appeva nāma tā gāthā sutvā mamapi kusalakammapathadhamme mano rameyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4867_0: Atha mahāsatto “sotukāmo dāni porisādo, kathessāmī”ti cintetvā “tena hi, samma, sādhukaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4867_1: suṇāhī”ti taṃ ohitasotaṃ katvā nandabrāhmaṇena kathitaniyāmeneva gāthānaṃ thutiṃ
atk-s0514a1:4867_2: katvā chasu kāmāvacaradevesu ekakolāhalaṃ katvā devatāsu sādhukāraṃ dadamānāsu porisādassa dhammaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0514a1:4870: Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahu saṅgamo.
atk-s0514a1:4873: Sataṃ sandhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0514a1:4875: “Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
atk-s0514a1:4876: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
atk-s0514a1:4878: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0514a1:4879: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4880_0: Tassa tena sukathitattā ceva attano paṇḍitabhāvena ca tā gāthā sabbaññubuddhakathitā
atk-s0514a1:4880_1: viyāti cintentassa sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā paripūri, bodhisatte muducittaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4880_2: ahosi, setacchattadāyakaṃ pitaraṃ viya naṃ amaññi. So “ahaṃ sutasomassa dātabbaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4880_3: kiñci hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ na passāmi, ekekāya panassa gāthāya ekekaṃ varaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4882: “Gāthā imā atthavatī subyañjanā, subhāsitā tuyha janinda sutvā;
atk-s0514a1:4883: Ānandi vitto sumano patīto, cattāri te samma vare dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4884: Tattha ānandīti ānandajāto. Sesāni tasseva vevacanāni. Cattāropi hete tuṭṭhākārā eva.
atk-s0514a1:4885: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “kiṃ nāma tvaṃ varaṃ dassasī”ti apasādento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4887: “Yo nattano maraṇaṃ bujjhasi tuvaṃ, hitāhitaṃ vinipātañca saggaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4888: Giddho rase duccarite niviṭṭho, kiṃ tvaṃ varaṃ dassasi pāpadhamma.
atk-s0514a1:4890: “Ahañca taṃ ‘dehi vara’nti vajjaṃ, tvaṃ cāpi datvā na avākareyya;
atk-s0514a1:4891: Sandiṭṭhikaṃ kalahamimaṃ vivādaṃ, ko paṇḍito jānamupabbajeyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4892_0: Tattha yoti yo tvaṃ “maraṇadhammohamasmī”ti attanopi maraṇaṃ na bujjhasi na jānāsi,
atk-s0514a1:4892_1: pāpakammameva karosi. Hitāhitanti “idaṃ me kammaṃ hitaṃ, idaṃ ahitaṃ, idaṃ vinipātaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4892_2: nessati, idaṃ sagga”nti na jānāsi. Raseti manussamaṃsarase. Vajjanti vadeyyaṃ. Na
atk-s0514a1:4892_3: avākareyyāti vācāya datvā “dehi me vara”nti vuccamāno na avākareyyāsi na dadeyyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4892_4: Upabbajeyyāti ko imaṃ kalahaṃ paṇḍito upagaccheyya.
atk-s0514a1:4893: Tato porisādo “nāyaṃ mayhaṃ saddahati, saddahāpessāmi na”nti gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4895: “Na taṃ varaṃ arahati jantu dātuṃ, yaṃ vāpi datvā na avākareyya;
atk-s0514a1:4896: Varassu samma avikampamāno, pāṇaṃ cajitvānapi dassamevā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4898_0: Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ ativiya sūro hutvā katheti, karissati me vacanaṃ, varaṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4898_1: sace pana “manussamaṃsaṃ na khāditabba’nti paṭhamameva varaṃ vārayissaṃ, ativiya
atk-s0514a1:4898_2: kilamissati, paṭhamaṃ aññe tayo vare gahetvā pacchā etaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4900: “Ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyaṃ, paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti;
atk-s0514a1:4901: Passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, etaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4902_0: Tattha ariyassāti ācāraariyassa. Sakhyanti sakhidhammo mittadhammo. Paññāṇavatāti
atk-s0514a1:4902_1: ñāṇasampannena. Sametīti gaṅgodakaṃ viya yamunodakena saṃsandati. Dhātuso hi sattā
atk-s0514a1:4902_2: saṃsandanti. Passeyya tanti sutasomo porisādassa ciraṃ jīvitaṃ icchanto viya paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4902_3: attano jīvitavaraṃ yācati. Paṇḍitassa hi “mama jīvitaṃ dehī”ti vattuṃ ayuttaṃ, apica
atk-s0514a1:4902_4: so ‘mayhameva esa ārogyaṃ icchatī’ti cintetvā tussissatīti evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4903_0: Sopi taṃ sutvāva “ayaṃ issariyā dhaṃsetvā idāni maṃsaṃ khāditukāmassa evaṃ mahāanatthakarassa
atk-s0514a1:4903_1: mahācorassa mayhameva jīvitaṃ icchati, aho mama hitakāmo”ti tuṭṭhamānaso vañcetvā
atk-s0514a1:4903_2: varassa gahitabhāvaṃ ajānitvā taṃ varaṃ dadamāno gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4905: “Ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyaṃ, paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti;
atk-s0514a1:4906: Passāsi maṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, etaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4911: Na tādise bhūmipatī adesi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4912: Tattha katanāmadheyyāti muddhani abhisittattāva “muddhābhisittā”ti katanāmadheyyā. Na tādiseti tādise khattiye na adesi mā khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4913: Iti so dutiyaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto parosatānaṃ khattiyānaṃ jīvitavaraṃ gaṇhi. Porisādopissa dadamāno āha –
atk-s0514a1:4916: Na tādise bhūmipatī ademi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4917_0: Kiṃ pana te tesaṃ saddaṃ suṇanti, na suṇantīti? Na sabbaṃ suṇanti. Porisādena hi
atk-s0514a1:4917_1: rukkhassa dhūmajālaupaddavabhayena paṭikkamitvā aggi kato, aggino ca rukkhassa ca
atk-s0514a1:4917_2: antare nisīditvā mahāsatto tena saddhiṃ kathesi, tasmā sabbaṃ asutvā upaḍḍhupaḍḍhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4917_3: suṇiṃsu. Te “idāni sutasomo porisādaṃ damessati, mā bhāyathā”ti aññamaññaṃ samassāsesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4919: “Parosataṃ khattiyā te gahītā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
atk-s0514a1:4920: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāhi, etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4921: Tattha parosatanti atirekasataṃ. Te gahītāti tayā gahitā. Talāvutāti hatthatalesu āvutā.
atk-s0514a1:4922_0: Iti mahāsatto tatiyaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ sakaraṭṭhaniyyātanavaraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:4922_1: Kiṃkāraṇā? So akhādantopi verabhayena sabbe te dāse katvā araññeyeva vāseyya, māretvā
atk-s0514a1:4922_2: vā chaḍḍeyya, paccantaṃ netvā vā vikkiṇeyya, tasmā tesaṃ sakaraṭṭhaniyyātanavaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4924: “Parosataṃ khattiyā me gahītā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
atk-s0514a1:4925: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāmi, etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4926: Catutthaṃ pana varaṃ gaṇhanto bodhisatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4928: “Chiddaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ byathitā bhayā hi, puthū narā leṇamanuppaviṭṭhā;
atk-s0514a1:4929: Manussamaṃsaṃ viramehi rāja, etaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4930_0: Tattha chiddanti na ghanavāsaṃ tattha tattha gāmādīnaṃ uṭṭhitattā savivaraṃ. Byathitā
atk-s0514a1:4930_1: bhayāhīti “porisādo idāni āgamissatī”ti tava bhayena kampitā. Leṇamanuppaviṭṭhāti
atk-s0514a1:4930_2: dārake hatthesu gahetvā tiṇagahanādinilīyanaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. Manussamaṃsanti duggandhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4930_3: jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ pajaha. Nissakkatthe vā upayogaṃ, manussamaṃsato viramāhīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4931: Evaṃ vutte porisādo pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasanto “samma sutasoma kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi, kathāhaṃ tumhākaṃ etaṃ varaṃ dassāmi, sace gaṇhitukāmo, aññaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4933: “Addhā hi so bhakkho mama manāpo, etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho;
atk-s0514a1:4934: Sohaṃ kathaṃ etto upārameyyaṃ, aññaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4935: Tattha vananti rajjaṃ pahāya imaṃ vanaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0514a1:4936: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “tvaṃ ‘manussamaṃsassa piyatarattā tato viramituṃ na sakkomī”ti vadasi. Yo hi piyaṃ nissāya pāpaṃ karoti, ayaṃ bālo”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4938: “Na ve ‘piyaṃ me’ti janinda tādiso, attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati;
atk-s0514a1:4939: Attāva seyyo paramā ca seyyo, labbhā piyā ocitatthena pacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4940_0: Tattha tādisoti janinda tādiso yuvā abhirūpo mahāyaso “idaṃ nāma me piya”nti piyavatthulobhena
atk-s0514a1:4940_1: tattha attānaṃ niraṃkatvā sabbasugatīhi ceva sukhavisesehi ca cavitvā niraye pātetvā
atk-s0514a1:4940_2: na ve piyāni sevati. Paramā ca seyyoti purisassa hi paramā piyavatthumhā attāva varataro.
atk-s0514a1:4940_3: Kiṃkāraṇā? Labbhā piyāti, piyā nāma visayavasena ceva puññena ca ocitatthena vaḍḍhitatthena
atk-s0514a1:4940_4: diṭṭhadhamme ceva parattha ca devamanussasampattiṃ patvā sakkā laddhuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4941: Evaṃ vutte porisādo bhayappatto hutvā “ahaṃ sutasomena gahitaṃ varaṃ vissajjāpetumpi manussamaṃsato viramitumpi na sakkomi, kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti assupuṇṇehi nettehi gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4944: Namhi sakkā nivāretuṃ, aññaṃ varaṃ samma varassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4948: “Yo ve ‘piyaṃ me’ti piyānurakkhī, attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati;
atk-s0514a1:4949: Soṇḍova pitvā visamissapānaṃ, teneva so hoti dukkhī parattha.
atk-s0514a1:4951: “Yo cīdha saṅkhāya piyāni hitvā, kicchenapi sevati ariyadhamme;
atk-s0514a1:4952: Dukkhitova pitvāna yathosadhāni, teneva so hoti sukhī paratthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4953_0: Tattha yo veti, samma porisāda, yo puriso “idaṃ me piya”nti pāpakiriyāya attānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4953_1: niraṃkatvā piyāni vatthūni sevati, so surāpemena visamissaṃ suraṃ pitvā soṇḍo viya
atk-s0514a1:4953_2: tena pāpakammena parattha nirayādīsu dukkhī hoti. Saṅkhāyāti jānitvā tuletvā. Piyāni
atk-s0514a1:4954: Evaṃ vutte porisādo kalūnaṃ paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4956: “Ohāyahaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, manāpiye kāmaguṇe ca pañca;
atk-s0514a1:4957: Etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4958: Tattha etassāti manussamaṃsassa. Kinti mahanti kinti katvā ahaṃ taṃ varaṃ demi.
atk-s0514a1:4961: “Na paṇḍitā diguṇamāhu vākyaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
atk-s0514a1:4962: ‘Varassu samma’ iti maṃ avoca, iccabravī tvaṃ na hi te sametī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4963_0: Tattha diguṇanti, samma porisāda, paṇḍitā nāma ekaṃ vatvā puna taṃ visaṃvādentā dutiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4963_1: vacanaṃ na kathenti. Iti maṃ avocāti, “samma sutasoma varassu vara”nti evaṃ maṃ abhāsasi.
atk-s0514a1:4963_2: Iccabravīti tasmā yaṃ tvaṃ iti abravi, taṃ te idāni na sameti.
atk-s0514a1:4966: “Apuññalābhaṃ ayasaṃ akittiṃ, pāpaṃ bahuṃ duccaritaṃ kilesaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4967: Manussamaṃsassa kate upāgā, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadeyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4968_0: Tattha pāpanti kammapathaṃ appattaṃ. Duccaritanti kammapathappattaṃ. Kilesanti dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4968_1: Manussamaṃsassa kateti manussamaṃsassa hetu. Upāgāti upagatomhi. Taṃ teti taṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4968_2: kathāhaṃ varaṃ demi, mā maṃ vārayi, anukampaṃ kāruññaṃ mayi karohi, aññaṃ varaṃ gaṇhāhīti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4971: “Na taṃ varaṃ arahati jantu dātuṃ, yaṃ vāpi datvā na avākareyya;
atk-s0514a1:4972: Varassu samma avikampamāno, pāṇaṃ cajitvānapi dassamevā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4973: Evaṃ tena paṭhamaṃ vuttagāthaṃ āharitvā dassetvā varadāne ussāhento gāthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4975: “Pāṇaṃ cajanti santo nāpi dhammaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
atk-s0514a1:4976: Datvā varaṃ khippamavākarohi, etena sampajja surājaseṭṭha.
atk-s0514a1:4978: “Caje dhanaṃ aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
atk-s0514a1:4979: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4980_0: Tattha pāṇanti jīvitaṃ. Santo nāma api jīvitaṃ cajanti, na dhammaṃ. Khippamavākarohīti
atk-s0514a1:4980_1: idha khippaṃ mayhaṃ dehīti attho. Etenāti etena dhammena ceva saccena ca sampajja
atk-s0514a1:4980_2: sampanno upapanno hohi. Surājaseṭṭhāti taṃ paggaṇhanto ālapati. Caje dhananti, samma
atk-s0514a1:4980_3: porisāda, paṇḍito puriso hatthapādādimhi aṅge chijjamāne tassa rakkhaṇatthāya bahumpi
atk-s0514a1:4980_4: dhanaṃ cajeyya. Dhammamanussarantoti aṅgadhanajīvitāni pariccajantopi “sataṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4981: Evaṃ mahāsatto imehi kāraṇehi taṃ sacce patiṭṭhāpetvā idāni attano gurubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4983: “Yasmā hi dhammaṃ puriso vijaññā, ye cassa kaṅkhaṃ vinayanti santo;
atk-s0514a1:4984: Taṃ hissa dīpañca parāyaṇañca, na tena mittiṃ jirayetha pañño”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4985_0: Tattha yasmāti yamhā purisā. Dhammanti kusalākusalajotakaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Vijaññāti vijāneyya.
atk-s0514a1:4985_1: Taṃ hissāti taṃ ācariyakulaṃ etassa puggalassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena dīpaṃ, uppanne bhaye
atk-s0514a1:4985_2: gantabbaṭṭhānaṭṭhena parāyaṇañca. Na tena mittinti tena ācariyapuggalena saha so
atk-s0514a1:4985_3: paṇḍito kenacipi kāraṇena mittiṃ na jīrayetha na vināseyya.
atk-s0514a1:4986_0: Evañca pana vatvā, “samma porisāda, guṇavantassa ācariyassa vacanaṃ nāma bhindituṃ
atk-s0514a1:4986_1: na vaṭṭati, ahañca taruṇakālepi tava piṭṭhiācariyo hutvā bahuṃ sikkhaṃ sikkhāpesiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4986_2: idānipi buddhalīlāya satārahā gāthā te kathesiṃ, tena me vacanaṃ kātuṃ arahasī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4986_3: āha. Taṃ sutvā porisādo “ayaṃ sutasomo mayhaṃ ācariyo ceva paṇḍito ca, varo cassa
atk-s0514a1:4986_4: mayā dinno, kiṃ sakkā kātuṃ, ekasmiṃ attabhāve maraṇaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ, manussamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4986_5: na khādissāmi, dassāmissa vara”nti assudhārāhi pavattamānāhi uṭṭhāya sutasomanarindassa
atk-s0514a1:4986_6: pādesu patitvā varaṃ dadamāno imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4988: “Addhā hi so bhakkho mama manāpo, etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho;
atk-s0514a1:4989: Sace ca maṃ yācasi etamatthaṃ, etampi te samma varaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4990_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto evamāha – “samma, sīle ṭhitassa maraṇampi varaṃ, gaṇhāmi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:4990_1: tayā dinnaṃ varaṃ, ajja paṭṭhāya ariyapathe patiṭṭhitosi, evaṃ santepi taṃ yācāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4990_2: sace te mayi sineho atthi, pañca sīlāni gaṇha, mahārājā”ti. “Sādhu, samma, dehi me
atk-s0514a1:4990_3: sīlānī”ti. “Gaṇha mahārājā”ti. So mahāsattaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4990_4: nisīdi. Mahāsattopi naṃ pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tattha sannipatitā
atk-s0514a1:4990_5: bhummā devā mahāsatte pītiṃ janetvā “avīcito yāva bhavaggā añño porisādaṃ manussamaṃsato
atk-s0514a1:4990_6: nivāretuṃ samattho nāma natthi, aho sutasomena dukkarataraṃ kata”nti mahantena saddena
atk-s0514a1:4990_7: vanaṃ unnādentā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu. Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikāti evaṃ yāva
atk-s0514a1:4990_8: brahmalokā ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Rukkhe laggitarājānopi taṃ devatānaṃ sādhukārasaddaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4990_9: suṇiṃsu. Rukkhadevatāpi sakavimāne ṭhitāva sādhukāramadāsi. Iti devatānaṃ saddova
atk-s0514a1:4990_10: sūyati, rūpaṃ na dissati. Devatānaṃ sādhukārasaddaṃ sutvā rājāno cintayiṃsu – “sutasomaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4990_11: nissāya no jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ, dukkaraṃ kataṃ sutasomena porisādaṃ damentenā”ti bodhisattassa
atk-s0514a1:4990_12: thutiṃ kariṃsu. Porisādo mahāsattassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ bodhisatto
atk-s0514a1:4990_13: – “samma, khattiye mocehī”ti āha. So cintesi “ahaṃ etesaṃ paccāmitto, ete mayā mocitā
atk-s0514a1:4990_14: ‘gaṇhatha no paccāmitta’nti maṃ hiṃseyyuṃ, mayā jīvitaṃ cajantenapi na sakkā sutasomassa
atk-s0514a1:4990_15: santikā gahitaṃ sīlaṃ bhindituṃ, iminā saddhiyeva gantvā mocessāmi, evaṃ me bhayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4990_16: na bhavissatī”ti. Atha bodhisattaṃ vanditvā, “sutasoma, ubhopi gantvā khattiye mocessāmā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4992: “Satthā ca me hosi sakhā ca mesi, vacanampi te samma ahaṃ akāsiṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4993: Tuvampi me samma karohi vākyaṃ, ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4994: Tattha satthāti saggamaggassa desitattā satthā ca, taruṇakālato paṭṭhāya sakhā ca.
atk-s0514a1:4997: “Satthā ca te homi sakhā ca tyamhi, vacanampi me samma tuvaṃ akāsi;
atk-s0514a1:4998: Ahampi te samma karomi vākyaṃ, ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5002: Na jātu dubbhetha imassa rañño, saccappaṭiññaṃ me paṭissuṇāthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5003_0: Tattha kammāsapādenāti idaṃ mahāsatto “ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāmā”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0514a1:5003_1: “khattiyā nāma mānathaddhā honti, muttamattāva ‘iminā mayaṃ viheṭhitamhā’ti porisādaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5003_2: potheyyumpi haneyyumpi, na kho panesa tesu dubbhissati, ahaṃ ekakova gantvā paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5003_3: tāva nesaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā tattha gantvā te hatthatale āvunitvā aggapādaṅgulīhi
atk-s0514a1:5003_4: bhūmiṃ phusamānāhi rukkhasākhāsu olaggite vātappaharaṇakāle nāgadantesu olaggitakuraṇḍakadāmāni
atk-s0514a1:5003_5: viya samparivattante addasa. Tepi taṃ disvā “idānimhā mayaṃ arogā”ti ekappahāreneva
atk-s0514a1:5003_6: mahāviravaṃ raviṃsu. Atha ne mahāsatto “mā bhāyitthā”ti assāsetvā “mayā porisādo
atk-s0514a1:5003_7: damito, tumhākaṃ abhayaṃ gahitaṃ, tumhe pana me vacanaṃ karothā”ti vatvā evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:5003_8: Tattha na jātūti ekaṃseneva na dubbhetha.
atk-s0514a1:5007: Na jātu dubbhema imassa rañño, saccappaṭiññaṃ te paṭissuṇāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5008_0: Tattha paṭissuṇāmāti “evaṃ paṭiññaṃ adhivāsema sampaṭicchāma, apica kho pana mayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5008_1: kilantā kathetuṃ na sakkoma, tumhe sabbasattānaṃ saraṇaṃ, tumheva kathetha, mayaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5009: Atha ne bodhisatto “tena hi paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:5011: “Yathā pitā vā atha vāpi mātā, anukampakā atthakāmā pajānaṃ,.
atk-s0514a1:5012: Evameva vo hotu ayañca rājā, tumhe ca vo hotha yatheva puttā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5013: Atha naṃ tepi sampaṭicchamānā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a1:5015: “Yathā pitā vā atha vāpi mātā, anukampakā atthakāmā pajānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5016: Evameva no hotu ayañca rājā, mayampi hessāma yatheva puttā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5017: Tattha tumhe ca voti vo-kāro nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5018_0: Iti mahāsatto tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā porisādaṃ pakkositvā “ehi, samma, khattiye mocehī”ti
atk-s0514a1:5018_1: āha. So khaggaṃ gahetvā ekassa rañño bandhanaṃ chindi. Rājā sattāhaṃ nirāhāro vedanappatto
atk-s0514a1:5018_2: saha bandhanachedā mucchito bhūmiyaṃ pati. Taṃ disvā mahāsatto kāruññaṃ katvā, “samma
atk-s0514a1:5018_3: porisāda, mā evaṃ chindī”ti ekaṃ rājānaṃ ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ gahetvā ure katvā
atk-s0514a1:5018_4: “idāni bandhanaṃ chindāhī”ti āha. Porisādo khaggena chindi. Mahāsatto thāmasampannatāya
atk-s0514a1:5018_5: naṃ ure nipajjāpetvā orasaputtaṃ viya muducittena otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:5018_6: Evaṃ sabbepi te bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā vaṇe dhovitvā dārakānaṃ kaṇṇato suttakaṃ viya
atk-s0514a1:5018_7: saṇikaṃ rajjuyo nikkaḍḍhitvā pubbalohitaṃ dhovitvā vaṇe niddose katvā, “samma porisāda,
atk-s0514a1:5018_8: ekaṃ rukkhatacaṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā āharā”ti āharāpetvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā tesaṃ hatthatalāni
atk-s0514a1:5018_9: makkhesi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva vaṇo phāsukaṃ ahosi. Porisādo taṇḍulaṃ gahetvā taralaṃ paci,
atk-s0514a1:5018_10: ubho janā parosataṃ khattiye pāyesuṃ. Iti te sabbeva santappitā, sūriyo atthaṅgato.
atk-s0514a1:5018_11: Punadivase pāto ca majjhanhike ca sāyañca taralameva pāyetvā tatiyadivase sasitthakayāguṃ
atk-s0514a1:5019_0: Atha ne mahāsatto “gantuṃ sakkhissathā”ti pucchitvā “gacchāmā”ti vutte “ehi, samma
atk-s0514a1:5019_1: porisāda, sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gacchāmā”ti āha. So rodamāno tassa pādesu patitvā “tvaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:5019_2: samma, rājāno gahetvā gaccha, ahaṃ idheva vanamūlaphalāni khādanto vasissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:5019_3: “Samma, idha kiṃ karissasi, ramaṇīyaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ, bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārehī”ti. “Samma
atk-s0514a1:5019_4: kiṃ kathesi, na sakkā mayā tattha gantuṃ, sakalanagaravāsino hi me verino, te ‘iminā
atk-s0514a1:5019_5: mayhaṃ mātā khāditā, mayhaṃ pitā, mayhaṃ bhātā’ti maṃ paribhāsissanti, ‘gaṇhatha
atk-s0514a1:5019_6: imaṃ cora’nti ekekadaṇḍena vā ekekaleḍḍunā vā maṃ jīvitā voropessanti, ahañca tumhākaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5019_7: santike sīlesu patiṭṭhito, jīvitahetupi na sakkā mayā paraṃ māretuṃ, tasmā nāhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5019_8: gacchāmi, ahaṃ manussamaṃsato viratattā kittakaṃ jīvissāmi, idāni mama tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5019_9: natthī”ti roditvā “gacchatha tumhe”ti āha. Atha mahāsatto tassa piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā,
atk-s0514a1:5019_10: “samma porisāda, mā cintayi, sutasomo nāmāhaṃ, mayā tādiso kakkhaḷo pharuso vinīto,
atk-s0514a1:5019_11: bārāṇasivāsikesu kiṃ vattabbaṃ atthi, ahaṃ taṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpessāmi, asakkonto
atk-s0514a1:5019_12: attano rajjaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā dassāmī”ti vatvā “tumhākampi nagare mama verino atthiyevā”ti
atk-s0514a1:5019_13: vutte “iminā mama vacanaṃ karontena dukkaraṃ kataṃ, yena kenaci upāyena porāṇakayase
atk-s0514a1:5019_14: patiṭṭhapetabbo esa mayā”ti cintetvā tassa palobhanatthāya nagarasampattiṃ vaṇṇento āha –
atk-s0514a1:5021: “Catuppadaṃ sakuṇañcāpi maṃsaṃ, sūdehi randhaṃ sukataṃ suniṭṭhitaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5022: Sudhaṃva indo paribhuñjiyāna, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
atk-s0514a1:5025: Indaṃva devesu pamodayiṃsu, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
atk-s0514a1:5031: “Pāṇissaraṃ kumbhathūṇaṃ nisīthe, athopi ve nippurisampi tūriyaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5032: Bahuṃ sugītañca suvāditañca, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
atk-s0514a1:5035: Hayehi nāgehi rathehupetaṃ, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5036_0: Tattha sukatanti nānappakārehi suṭṭhu kataṃ. Suniṭṭhitanti nānāsambhārayojanena suṭṭhu
atk-s0514a1:5036_1: niṭṭhitaṃ. Kathekoti kathaṃ eko. Ramasīti mūlaphalādīni khādanto kathaṃ ramissasi,
atk-s0514a1:5036_2: “ehi, mahārāja, gamissāmā”ti. Vellivilākamajjhāti ettha vellīti rāsi, vilākamajjhāti
atk-s0514a1:5036_3: vilaggamajjhā. Uttattaghanasuvaṇṇarāsipabhā ceva tanudīghamajjhā cāti dasseti. Devesūti
atk-s0514a1:5036_4: devalokesu accharā indaṃ viya ramaṇīye bārāṇasinagare pubbe taṃ pamodayiṃsu, tā hitvā
atk-s0514a1:5036_5: idha kiṃ karissasi, “ehi, samma, gacchāmā”ti. Tambūpadhāneti rattūpadhāne. Sabbassayanamhīti
atk-s0514a1:5036_6: sabbattharaṇatthate sayane. Saṅgeti anekabhūmike dassetvā addharattaaṅgayutte tattha
atk-s0514a1:5036_7: tvaṃ pubbe sayīti attho. Sukhanti tādisassa sayanassa majjhamhi sukhaṃ sayitvāna
atk-s0514a1:5036_8: idāni kathaṃ araññe ramissasi, “ehi gacchāma, sammā”ti. Nisītheti rattibhāge. Hitvāti
atk-s0514a1:5036_9: evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ chaḍḍetvā. Uyyānasampannaṃ pahūtamālyanti, mahārāja, tava uyyānasampannaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5036_10: nānāvidhapupphaṃ. Migājinūpetaṃ puraṃ surammanti taṃ uyyānaṃ migājinaṃ nāma nāmena,
atk-s0514a1:5036_11: tena upetaṃ purampi te suṭṭhu rammaṃ. Hitvāti evarūpaṃ manoramaṃ nagaraṃ chaḍḍetvā.
atk-s0514a1:5037_0: Iti mahāsatto “appeva nāmesa pubbe upabhuttaparibhogarasaṃ saritvā gantukāmo bhaveyyā”ti
atk-s0514a1:5037_1: paṭhamaṃ bhojanena palobhesi, dutiyaṃ kilesena, tatiyaṃ sayanena, catutthaṃ naccagītavāditena,
atk-s0514a1:5037_2: pañcamaṃ uyyānena ceva nagarena cāti imehi ettakehi palobhetvā “ehi, mahārāja, ahaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5037_3: taṃ ādāya gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā pacchā sakaraṭṭhaṃ gamissāmi, sace bārāṇasirajjaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5037_4: na labhissasi, upaḍḍharajjaṃ te dassāmi, kiṃ te araññavāsena, mama vacanaṃ karohī”ti
atk-s0514a1:5037_5: āha. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gantukāmo hutvā “sutasomo mayhaṃ atthakāmo anukampako,
atk-s0514a1:5037_6: paṭhamaṃ maṃ kalyāṇe patiṭṭhāpetvā ‘idāni porāṇakayaseva patiṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vadati,
atk-s0514a1:5037_7: sakkhissati cesa patiṭṭhāpetuṃ, iminā saddhiṃyeva gantuṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ me araññavāsenā”ti
atk-s0514a1:5037_8: cintetvā tuṭṭhacitto tassa guṇaṃ nissāya vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo “samma, sutasoma, kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggato
atk-s0514a1:5037_9: sādhutaraṃ, pāpamittasaṃsaggato vā pāpataraṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:5043: Akāsiṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yena gacchāmi duggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5049: Kāhāmi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, yena gacchāmi suggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5051: “Thale yathā vāri janinda vuṭṭhaṃ, anaddhaneyyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitīkaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5052: Evampi hoti asataṃ samāgamo, anaddhaneyyo udakaṃ thaleva.
atk-s0514a1:5054: “Sare yathā vāri janinda vuṭṭhaṃ, ciraṭṭhitīkaṃ naravīraseṭṭha;
atk-s0514a1:5055: Evampi ve hoti sataṃ samāgamo, ciraṭṭhitīko udakaṃ sareva.
atk-s0514a1:5057: “Abyāyiko hoti sataṃ samāgamo, yāvampi tiṭṭheyya tatheva hoti;
atk-s0514a1:5058: Khippañhi veti asataṃ samāgamo, tasmā sataṃ dhammo asabbhi ārakā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5059_0: Tattha suve suveti divase divase. Anaddhaneyyanti na addhānakkhamaṃ. Sareti samudde.
atk-s0514a1:5059_1: Naravīraseṭṭhāti naresu vīriyena seṭṭha. Udakaṃ sarevāti samudde vuṭṭhaudakaṃ viya.
atk-s0514a1:5059_2: Abyāyikoti avigacchanako. Yāvampi tiṭṭheyyāti yattakaṃ kālaṃ jīvitaṃ tiṭṭheyya, tattakaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5059_3: kālaṃ tatheva hoti, na jīrati sappurisehi mittabhāvoti.
atk-s0514a1:5060_0: Iti porisādo sattahi gāthāhi mahāsattasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Mahāsattopi porisādañca
atk-s0514a1:5060_1: te ca rājāno gahetvā attano paccantagāmaṃ agamāsi. Paccantagāmavāsino mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5060_2: disvā nagaraṃ gantvā amaccānaṃ ācikkhiṃsu. Amaccā balakāyaṃ ādāya gantvā parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5060_3: Mahāsatto tena parivārena bārāṇasirajjaṃ agamāsi. Antarāmagge janapadavāsino bodhisattassa
atk-s0514a1:5060_4: paṇṇākāraṃ datvā anugacchiṃsu, mahanto parivāro ahosi, tena saddhiṃ bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:5060_5: Tadā porisādassa putto rājā hoti, senāpati kāḷahatthiyeva. Nāgarā rañño ārocayiṃsu
atk-s0514a1:5060_6: – “mahārāja, sutasomo kira porisādaṃ dametvā ādāya idhāgacchati, nagaramassa pavisituṃ
atk-s0514a1:5060_7: na dassāmā”ti sīghaṃ nagaradvārāni pidahitvā āvudhahatthā aṭṭhaṃsu. Mahāsatto dvārānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5060_8: pihitabhāvaṃ ñatvā porisādañca parosatañca rājāno ohāya katipayehi amaccehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:5060_9: āgantvā “ahaṃ sutasomarājā, dvāraṃ vivarathā”ti āha. Purisā gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5060_10: So “khippaṃ vivarathā”ti vivarāpesi. Mahāsatto nagaraṃ pāvisi. Rājā ca kāḷahatthi
atk-s0514a1:5060_11: cassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā ādāya pāsādaṃ āropayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5061_0: So rājapallaṅke nisīditvā porisādassa aggamahesiṃ sesāmacce ca pakkosāpetvā kāḷahatthiṃ
atk-s0514a1:5061_1: āha – “kāḷahatthi, kasmā rañño nagaraṃ pavisituṃ na dethā”ti? “So rajjaṃ kārento
atk-s0514a1:5061_2: imasmiṃ nagare bahū manusse khādi, khattiyehi akattabbaṃ kari, sakalajambudīpaṃ chiddamakāsi,
atk-s0514a1:5061_3: evarūpo pāpadhammo, tena kāraṇenā”ti. “Idāni ‘so evarūpaṃ karissatī’ti mā cintayittha,
atk-s0514a1:5061_4: ahaṃ taṃ dametvā sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesiṃ, jīvitahetupi kañci na viheṭhessati, natthi
atk-s0514a1:5061_5: vo tato bhayaṃ, evaṃ mā karittha, puttehi nāma mātāpitaro paṭijaggitabbā, mātāpituposakā
atk-s0514a1:5061_6: hi saggaṃ gacchanti, itare niraya”nti evaṃ so nicāsane nisinnassa puttarājassa ovādaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5061_7: datvā, “kāḷahatthi, tvaṃ rañño sahāyo ceva sevako ca, raññāpi mahante issariye patiṭṭhāpito,
atk-s0514a1:5061_8: tayāpi rañño atthaṃ carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti senāpatimpi anusāsitvā, “devi, tvampi kulagehā
atk-s0514a1:5061_9: āgantvā tassa santike aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ patvā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhippattā, tayāpi tassa
atk-s0514a1:5061_10: atthaṃ carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti deviyāpi ovādaṃ datvā tamevatthaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ dhammaṃ desento gāthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:5063: “Na so rājā yo ajeyyaṃ jināti, na so sakhā yo sakhāraṃ jināti;
atk-s0514a1:5064: Na sā bhariyā yā patino na vibheti, na te puttā ye na bharanti jiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5066: “Na sā sabhā yattha na santi santo, na te santo ye na bhaṇanti dhammaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5067: Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, dhammaṃ bhaṇantāva bhavanti santo.
atk-s0514a1:5073: Subhāsitaddhajā isayo, dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5074_0: Tattha ajeyyanti ajeyyā nāma mātāpitaro, te jinanto rājā nāma na hoti. Sace tvampi
atk-s0514a1:5074_1: pitu santakaṃ rajjaṃ labhitvā tassa paṭisattu hosi, akiccakārī nāma bhavissasi. Sakhāraṃ
atk-s0514a1:5074_2: jinātīti kūṭaḍḍena jināti. Sace tvaṃ, kāḷahatthi, raññā saddhiṃ mittadhammaṃ na pūresi,
atk-s0514a1:5074_3: adhammaṭṭho hutvā niraye nibbattissasi. Na vibhetīti na bhāyati. Sace tvaṃ rañño
atk-s0514a1:5074_4: na bhāyasi, bhariyādhamme ṭhitā nāma na hosi, akiccakārī nāma bhavissasi. Jiṇṇanti
atk-s0514a1:5074_5: mahallakaṃ. Tasmiñhi kāle abharantā puttā puttā nāma na honti.
atk-s0514a1:5075_0: Santoti paṇḍitā. Ye na bhaṇanti dhammanti ye pucchitā saccasabhāvaṃ na vadanti, na
atk-s0514a1:5075_1: te paṇḍitā nāma. Dhammaṃ bhaṇantāvāti ete rāgādayo pahāya parassa hitānukampakā hutvā
atk-s0514a1:5075_2: sabhāvaṃ bhaṇantāva paṇḍitā nāma honti. Nābhāsamānanti na abhāsamānaṃ. Amataṃ padanti
atk-s0514a1:5075_3: amatamahānibbānaṃ desentaṃ “paṇḍito”ti jānanti, teneva porisādo maṃ ñatvā pasannacitto
atk-s0514a1:5075_4: cattāro vare datvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhito. Bhāsayeti paṇḍito puriso dhammaṃ bhāseyya
atk-s0514a1:5075_5: joteyya, buddhādayo isayo yasmā dhammo etesaṃ dhajo, tasmā subhāsitaddhajā nāma subhāsitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5075_6: paggaṇhanti, bālā pana subhāsitaṃ paggaṇhantā nāma natthīti.
atk-s0514a1:5076_0: Imassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā rājā ca senāpati ca devī ca tuṭṭhā “gacchāma, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:5076_1: ānemā”ti vatvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā nāgare sannipātetvā “tumhe mā bhāyittha, rājā
atk-s0514a1:5076_2: kira dhamme patiṭṭhito, etha naṃ ānemā”ti mahājanaṃ ādāya mahāsattaṃ purato katvā
atk-s0514a1:5076_3: rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā kappake upaṭṭhāpetvā kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittapasādhitaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5076_4: rājānaṃ ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisiñcitvā nagaraṃ pavesesuṃ. Porisādo rājā hutvā
atk-s0514a1:5076_5: parosatānaṃ khattiyānaṃ mahāsattassa ca mahāsakkāraṃ kāresi. “Sutasomanarindena kira
atk-s0514a1:5076_6: porisādaṃ dametvā rajje patiṭṭhāpito”ti sakalajambudīpe mahākolāhalaṃ udapādi. Indapatthanagaravāsinopi
atk-s0514a1:5076_7: “rājā no āgacchatū”ti dūtaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. So tattha māsamattaṃ vasitvā, “samma, gacchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:5076_8: tvaṃ appamatto hohi, nagaradvāresu ca majjhe cāti pañca dānasālāyo kārehi, dasa rājadhamme
atk-s0514a1:5076_9: akopetvā agatigamanaṃ pariharā”ti porisādaṃ ovadi. Parosatāhi rājadhānīhi balakāyo
atk-s0514a1:5076_10: yebhuyyena sannipati. So tena balakāyena parivuto bārāṇasito nikkhami. Porisādopi
atk-s0514a1:5076_11: nikkhamitvā upaḍḍhapathā nivatti. Mahāsatto avāhanānaṃ rājūnaṃ vāhanāni datvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:5076_12: Tepi rājāno tena saddhiṃ sammoditvā mahāsattaṃ vandanādīni katvā attano attano janapadaṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5077_0: Mahāsattopi nagaraṃ patvā indapatthanagaravāsīhi devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkatanagaraṃ
atk-s0514a1:5077_1: pavisitvā mātāpitaro vanditvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā mahātalaṃ abhiruhi. So dhammena
atk-s0514a1:5077_2: rajjaṃ kārento cintesi – “rukkhadevatā mayhaṃ bahūpakārā, balikammalābhamassā karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5077_3: So tassa nigrodhassa avidūre mahantaṃ taḷākaṃ kāretvā bahūni kulāni pesetvā gāmaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5077_4: nivesesi. Gāmo mahā ahosi asītimattaāpaṇasahassapaṭimaṇḍito. Tampi rukkhamūlaṃ sākhantato
atk-s0514a1:5077_5: paṭṭhāya samatalaṃ kāretvā parikkhittavedikatoraṇadvārayuttaṃ akāsi, devatā abhippasīdi.
atk-s0514a1:5077_6: Kammāsapādassa damitaṭṭhāne nivuṭṭhattā pana so gāmo kammāsadammanigamo nāma jāto.
atk-s0514a1:5077_7: Tepi sabbe rājāno mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne saggaṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5078_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā “na, bhikkhave, idānevāhaṃ aṅgulimālaṃ
atk-s0514a1:5078_1: damemi, pubbepesa mayā damitoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā porisādo rājā
atk-s0514a1:5078_2: aṅgulimālo ahosi, kāḷahatthi sāriputto, nandabrāhmaṇo ānando, rukkhadevatā kassapo,
atk-s0514a1:5078_3: sakko anuruddho, sesarājāno buddhaparisā, mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni, sutasomarājā
atk-s0514a1:5081: Sumukho pana haṃsavaro ca mahā, sudhabhojaniko ca paro pavaro;
